1.content: Before we begin, what form of expansion will be our central theme?
1.title: Choose Your Path

11.content:
Rena the Living Balloon - While visiting the dermatologist, Rena accidentally receives an injection of an experimental substance that makes her skin super stretchy and rubber-like. She soon discovers she can inflate herself with any gas or liquid.


Parade Panic - Rena is working for the local parade committee to help with the balloons for the Thanksgiving Day parade. But when signed up for the job, what she didn't realize is instead of filling the balloons, she's going to be a balloon herself.


Pump it Up.com - Rena wants to be a model, but doesn't have the body for it. One day, she sees an ad for a modeling website that is looking for models of any body type. What she doesn't realize, is that it's for a expansion fetish website, called Pump it Up.com, which specializes in inflation videos and photo shoots.

Get Down With the Sickness - Through whatever means the author may decide, Rena contracts a new disease that slowly causes her body to fill with helium. Can she find a cure before she floats away, or worse, bursts?
11.title: Inflation

choices: .....my manager is coming over to meet you."
112.content:
"Alan's Great Parade Floats; guaranteed to help out anywhere and anytime, Rena said aloud, well, this must be the place." Taking a step into through the front door, she looked around. A large reception desk was placed in the middle of the room, chairs were scattered at the walls, a TV set played a sports game from somewhere. A door was directly at the side of the desk; big red words that read "No Entrance; Employees Only" were on the frame.Situated at the desk was a receptionist, she was lazily reading from a book and sipping from a cup. Barely glancing upwards, the receptionist suddenly shot upwards when she saw Rena. The receptionist, a dog-girl, snapped to attention and Rena felt an enthusiastic aura, which she didn't possessed before. Jumping over the counter, the dog-girl grabbed Rena's hand and shook it up and down.

         "Whyhellotoyouhoney.MynameTrudy. I. AM. SO. SORRY.Ididn'tthinkwewerehavinganybodyforanotherhourorso.Our clientiscurrentlyalittlelate.Imeanfiveminutesisabore,Iwouldsay.No,offensetoboars mindyou.Pleaseletpullyou seat.I'mgoingtofetchsomewater. HAH,fetch.Doyoulikewater?Wait,noisthatbad?Yourafelinidsothatprobablymeansno" the dog-girl,evidently named Trudy, blared to Rena. Rena was so rattled that she let Trudy lead her to a chair--while having her hand still shook-- sat her down and let Trudy let go of her hand to fetch some water. Rena finally got a hold of herself to take the water Trudy brought to her. Rena looked up to the receptionist's face.Beaming a canine smile to Rena,Trudy asked her question.

         "Sorry about that, so honey who are you representing?"

         Rena shook her head clear and told her "Pardon, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Rena Calico,I'm with the city's PR department. As you know they mayor's second term parade is soon and he would like to acquire one of your blimps. During his first campaign he purchased some of your wares. He says that your previous blimps were 'stupendous' and 'worth the buck, no offense to any bucks'. He also specified to get the, and I quote, 'Largest one in the entire stock, I want something to block the city skies', unquote. He personally sought me out and asked me to purchase what is called the 'Special Surprise' from your catalogue. The city is willing to pay any amount for it. Don't worry of the costs, the city would back him up on anything." Rena looked to Trudy, who for some reason looked particularly analytical after the information was said.

         "The city sent you to us?"

         "Yes"

         "And the Mayor wants the "Special Surprise?"

         "Yes"

         And he wants a, and you quote, "something to block the city skies"

         "Yes"

         Trudy looked at Rena for a few minutes, then abruptly slapped her head. Walking away, Rena heard a small "of course" before going through the door. Rena was puzzled, was her appearance that provoking? She knew she had suit perfectly on: white, steamed, all the buttons sewn on. It couldn't be that, was it her body? She looked down and sighed; bosom as flat as a board, an ass like a carpet, and the curves of straight line. No, that couldn't be it--what type of store called out someone on that? Well, Trudy did seemed to be gifted in the bosom department. Was it because she was a cat? Black cats were considered unlucky, but did it translate towards discrimination? No, Mayor Stein was also a black cat and was the one asking for the blimp! So it couldn't be that and Trudy was nice to Rena. When it crossed her mind Rena instantly sunk, feeling a little shameful for the thought that all canine hated felines. Hearing a creaking noise, Rena looked towards the door. Opening up she saw Trudy standing in the doorway.

         "Oh Rena honey, Trudy called from the door,.....
112.title: Parade Panic

115.content: Hydro Lady- It's the return of the classic Story of Rena as Hydro Lady and She will need help rebuilding her story of saving live, having allies of other heroes, and having fun with water and finding a boyfriend.
115.title: More

1151.content:
(As a fan of the old series, I hated to see it die and I added a few chapters as an alternative path and I wish to take this story to that point. I will need help to get this up to speed. This addition originally by Nameless One.)

It was then that Rena stretched a bit and looked down at the ground. Then, slowly, a somewhat mischievous grin appeared on her face. It was times like this that she did one…of those things.

By most accounts, Rena was a fairly normal girl. She like new clothes, romantic comedies, the usual stuff most girls like. However there were two things about Rena that was a bit peculiar, one quirk that was still acceptable by society's standards and another that she had to…keep secret.

As far back as she could remember, Rena always had a fascination with comic books. Probably when she was still growing up, her uncle would show her his collection and read them to her like they were story books. As Rena got older, she would collect back issues and archives in paper backs. Rena also had a bit of artistic talent in her and learned how to draw rather well in a variety of ways but especially the super hero comic book style. The only thing better than super hero comic books would be if she could be a super hero herself. A bit unusual for a girl but still fairly normal. No, it was that other thing that made her truly strange which she guard most carefully from everyone.

For reasons that not even Rena understood, she always had an obsession with water. Unlike most young kids growing up, she loved bath time and her parents had a hard time getting to come out even when she was cleaned. She swam almost every day and would become depressed in the winter because her pool would always freeze over...at least until she got her YWCA pass so she could swim in the indoor pool. She preferred baths over showers simply for the sake of soaking in water and always tried the swimming pools and hot tubs if she ever had to travel and needed a hotel to stay at. Some of her friends joked that if she kept swimming as much as she did, she might grow gills; even though she would laugh, personally, she thought that would be awesome. And of course, no matter what, she would never, ever let anyone know she was secretly an Aquaphile; after all, it would be rather embarrassing if anyone knew she sometimes got aroused while swimming.

Of course, this obsession had very little of an outlet...that is, until she discovered the internet in all of its corrupting glory. Looking around Rena discovered the concept of "water inflation" and immediately fell in love with the idea. It was one thing to be IN water; what could be better than for water to be INSIDE her? She already had a Deviant art account but using another one under a different name and no personal information, she would soon find herself drawing tons of water inflation pictures under a slightly different art style to hide her tracks, earning numerous page views and several friends with the same fetish. She would even draw herself blissfully undergoing the said inflation, though for the sake of being anonymous, she always drew herself as a white-furred tiger with black hair instead of her usual orange and red self. After all...she didn't want to admit this to anyone in real life...

Though as much fun as drawing and reading about water inflation was, Rena's heart ached with the desire to actually experience it. Growing bulging bellies, massive mammaries, bubble butts, a combination of two or all three or getting large all over; it didn't matter as long as she was filled with water, beautiful water. Even having proportions that were completely impossible and caused brief immobility sounded wonderful as long as she could drain herself later.

Still, pictures and interactive stories ( XD ) were her only outlet and the internet was the only way she could connect with others with minimal flaming. Logging out of her main account and logging into her fetish account, Rena was quite disappointed to find out there were no new pictures...at least no new water inflation pictures. Maybe if she formed an art club that encouraged that kind of stuff...

Sighing, Rena got up and decided a nice bath would make her feel better; after all, she actually forgot to take one last night, of all the things that could have happened. Filling her tub until it was just the right temperature, Rena disrobed and dipped herself inside, feeling every part of her relaxing as she soon had everything except her hair submerged. Sighing loudly, Rena couldn't help but think this was the best....well...almost the best....

===========================

After about thirty-five minutes, just when the tub was starting to get a bit too cold for her, Rena got out and dried herself, throwing some clothes on her, though something bothered her. Feeling around her face, she realized there was some soap she forgot to scrub off. Ugh, how irritating! Nothing is worse than having unwashed soap on one’s face! Normally, Rena would have just used whatever was left from her bath but, of course, that already drained out; still, no use fussing about things you can’t change. Rena let the sink run just enough to produced mildly warm water and pulled the drain, then proceeded to wash her face gently, being sure to get every washed. After she was sure that she didn’t have any soap left on her, Rena grabbed a towel and dried her face off and was just about to pull the plug on the sink drain when she saw something quite odd. Right there, in the sink, was a little bit of water forming a…column? No, wait a minute; if she looked closely enough, it vaguely resembled a female figure, a bit exaggerated in the hips and breast area. Rena rubbed her eyes and looked again. Still there; had her mind finally snapped?

“Hello.” A tiny voice said. This caused Rena to step back in shock. Who was speaking?!? Was it…the water? No, that can’t be, right?

“Don’t be afraid, I’ve come to offer you a gift in exchange for a service to help your fellow man.”

“W-wait…are you talking through the water column?” Rena said, looking around a bit. If this was a dream, it felt very real.

“No, I’m speaking THROUGH the water column. My name is L’acquaser. I am a water spirit.”

“A….water sprit?” Rena asked, stepping forward a bit. She certainly wasn’t expecting this. Perhaps if she wasn’t anxious from fear, she might have been a bit more excited about this.

“Yes. See, I sense unusual thoughts from this house. While I’m not telepathetic, there is very little about water that we do not know and I have sense that you are a woman who loves water, far more than any other mortal. In exchange for a service, I’m willing to give you a gift.”

“What…kind of gift?” Rena asked, not sure what a water spirit…that is what it called itself, right?...could ever offer her.

“Why, your desire to fill yourself with water, of course.”

This certainly got Rena’s attention. Did it just offer to give her the power of water inflation?!? She would do ANYTHING for that!

“You mean you’ll give me the ability to perform water inflation on myself! Whatever it is, I’ll do it!” Rena said, tail wagging furiously. If this wasn’t a dream, then this certainly was the best moment of her life!

“I appreciate the enuthasim but first I am required to explain the conditions. In exchange for your heart’s desire, you must use the power of water in order to fight injustice.”

“You mean, like a superhero? That’s like giving me two gifts!” Rena said, having trouble controlling her excitement.

“Well…yes, but please understand this is a serious undertaking and should not be taken lightly…”

“Yeah, yeah, with great power comes great responsibility. I accept already!”

“But….well…I suppose I can give it to you early if you think you are ready….” The water figure said, holding out smooth, undetailed arms. From its “hands”, a ball of blue light gently floated towards Rena until it sunk inside her chest, a cool sensation billowing inside of her until it was complete gone, leaving Rena with a strange, yet wonderful, power flowing within her.

“So, now what?” Rena asked, anxious to see what she can do now.

“Well, I wasn’t expecting this, but your services are needed already. If you could just draw up some water in that bathtub of yours….maybe about three inches.”

Rena nodded, eagerly plugging her tub and turning on the water. She wasn’t sure what was about to happen but she knew it was going to be awesome. Super hero powers and water inflation? What could be better than that? After Rena quickly got some water inside her tub, not even bothering to adjust the temperature, Rena turned around, waiting for more instruction.

“If you believe you are ready, simply stand inside the tub, place a fist on your chest and concentrate into becoming a great warrior of justice.”
1151.title: Hydro Lady Returns

11511.content:
*original by Namelessone*

It was an odd request to be sure but Rena didn’t hesitate. Oddly enough, even with her bare feet and the cuff of her jeans touching the water, Rena didn’t feel the slightest bit cold…a little wet, but not cold. Still, Rena pushed even these thoughts out of her mind, focusing only on transforming into a superhero capable of fighting crime. As she gathered her thoughts, some of the water from the tub began to creep over her clothes and body, until only her muzzle and part of her hair was left unexposed. A few seconds later and Rena could no longer feel anything wet but instead a vaguely rubber-like mass covering most of her body. Curious and excited at the same time, Rena jumped out of the time, not even noticing the water she was getting everywhere on the floor and stood in front of the bathroom mirror.

Just as she was starting to suspect, Rena’s usual attire of jeans and a black sweater was now replaced by a somewhat form fitting rubber suit, jet black with dark blue trims, dark blue gloves and boots built into the suit, and a few strips of material that covered the space between her legs to her rear and two patches on the front of the breast; Rena could only guess it was to keep herself decent in public. Even more curious was the fact that almost every part of her was covered by the black suit, even her tail, with only her white muzzle and the back of her head exposed, showing her fiery red hair that contrasted with the rest of her suit. While it was still obvious that she was a catgirl underneath, it did a great job of covering her fur pattern, ensuring her identity was safe; even her eyes appeared to be little more than white spots on her head, just like in the comic books and animation adaptations.

“Oooooh, cool…so this is my outfit? Not bad, not bad at all…so what are my powers, anyways? I mean, you mention water, so…”

“We’re running out of time but I’ll guide you as best as possible. Just know that your powers are easy to control as they are accomplished simply by thinking about them.” L’acquaser said, just before the water figure jumped at Rena’s flat stomach and seemed to disappear. However, Rena felt something enter her….did…she just absorbed her?

<Quickly, sit back down in the tub.>

Rena jumped a foot in the air and looked around, trying to find the source of the voice.

<It’s alright, Rena. It’s me. I’m inside your body. Like I said, water absorption is one of your abilities. I’ll stay inside you to guide you.>

Rena nodded, a little surprised, but hearing L’acquaser mention hurrying caused Rena to obey, sitting in about an inch of water.

<Now, imagining yourself melting into the water below, almost becoming a part of it. With just enough water, even a small puddle, you can use water to teleport yourself anywhere.>

Rena looked down, thinking about what she was just told to do. Rena then felt her body become strange and lost all sense of touch as she felt herself getting lower into the water until she was looking from a very small vantage point, seeing the sides of the tub. It was very strange, like being a fish yet she didn’t seem to have a physical body, so “swimming” was so effortless…like...a video game, or at least Rena might have made that comparison if she was actually a gamer. Still, swimming into a certain part of the tub caused everything to become a fog of blue, until Rena found herself in a wondrous place, comprised of nothing but water and millions of bubbles that held suspended in place, stretching out seemingly infinitely.

[Where am I? What is this place?]

<This is a power only you now have. With water, you can connect to any point in the world that has some sizeable amount of water. Anywhere from a dog’s dish to the deepest part of any ocean. While you can explore at your own leisure, that will take too long and we do not have the time. I’ll be your guide when you are here. For now, swimming towards that bubble that I have given a golden glow.>

Indeed, out of all of the bubbles hanging in space, only one had a golden aura around it. Swimming into it, Rena found herself in a very strange place; while still nothing more than water, she could have swore she was inside a water cooler! Rena looked around and saw that she appeared to be inside a bank and, what do you know, a gang of five men were robbing the place. Rena wished her first mission was a bit more…dramatic, but all superheroes have to start somewhere.

[I think I can see my target, but what can I do? I’m stuck by plastic, my mortal enemy!]

<Actually, I think electricity and extreme heat are your mortal enemy now. As water, no, as the human who controls water, you also can control pressure and force, simply swim towards the frame with all of your might, and you will burst out like a mighty stream. With this on your side, you can use as little force as a splash and enough force like fire hose or even a bullet.>

Not sure if that would really work, Rena “swam” back and then move forward, imagining herself with the force of a mighty river or tsunami, anything that could destroy plastic. It worked and Rena felt herself bursting through the container, falling to the ground in a puddle. Several people looked on in surprised at the mess on the floor.

<Now, reform yourself and fight in the name of justice! Do not fear, attack and your instincts will take over!>

Concentrating, Rena felt her level of vision rising until she was first a humanoid mass of water and eventually her clear body quickly became opaque and soon she was once again herself, only still clan in that odd outfit that perfectly hidden her true identity.

“W-what the hell is that thing?”

“S-she came out of the water from the cooler! I knew that thing was processed!”

“Just shut up and shoot already!” one of the men said, firing a bullet while all but one of the others quickly joined in. Rena instinctively shrieked and brought her arms over her face….only…she didn’t feel anything. Opening her eyes and looking behind her, there were several holes in the wall, behind where she was standing…how could she have…? Looking forward, Rena saw shock and horror on the face of the would-be felons, one of them firing again, into her stomach. This time, Rena watched, turning down just fast enough to see her stomach…splash? Water seemingly splash out of her body and feel to the floor but Rena didn’t have hardly a scratch on her. Did…her body automatically turn into water? Rena looking up with a new found confidence. This is what so many superheroes didn’t have that she possessed: invulnerability. The men looked on in confusion and terror at the one thing they could not solve just by shooting at it.

“W-who are you?” one man asked, the one who didn’t shoot and was on the verge of giving up; after all how can you fight against something you can’t shoot?

“I am the Hydraulic Superheroine, the woman of water, the liquid-based dispenser of justice! I am…Hydro Lady! Give up now and I’ll go easy on you.”

While the more curious one fell to his knees and placed his gun on the floor in defeat, the others rushed at Rena, who only laughed; after all, if bullets couldn’t hurt her, how could punches? In fact, that is exactly what happened; as the men tried to punch her, large sections of her body simply turned to water at the last second as some sort of defense mechanism and the men simply found themselves punching water, splashing it on themselves. Now it was Rena’s turn, though just before she made her connections, her fist always turned into water and hit at the men with severe pressure, adding quite a bit of power that her small frame simply lack. Within seconds all men were on the ground, unconscious. Rena then surveyed the location; no one seemed hurt though everyone was understandably scared and confused. One guy was recording the whole thing on his cell phone.

“You there!” Rena said, hand on her hip and pointing at him with her other hand.

“Guah! Y-yeah…”

“Stop trying to make the next big hit on YouTube and call 911 already!”

“Y-yes ma’am.”

“No, it’s Hydro Lady. And you there!” Rena said, pointing to the only gang member that gave up when Rena offered to go easy on them.

“Y-yes….”

“You stay right there and don’t move and I want you to confess everything. Because if I have to chase after you, I can guarantee that you will suffer just as much as your thick-headed friends, got it?”

“Yes…I-I won’t cause any trouble…”

“And just to be sure…” Rena said, grabbing the gun. While she maintained a steel face, it was a bit scary holding a live gun, even if she didn’t have to worry about getting shot. Interestingly enough, he still had the safety on; was he clueless or just hanging out with the wrong crowd? Either way, Rena managed to empty the bullets out and take them with her, then threw the empty gun on the floor and placed the bullets on the counter, telling the bank staff they better keep it behind the counter, as evidence. Looking around for her escape, Rena noticed there was still a bit of water left in the cooler. Thinking about turning into water and hoping her guess was right, Rena defied every imaginable law of physics and wavered into the shallow pool of water, her now watery legs following once her upper body completely disappeared inside the water. It wasn’t long until she found herself swimming again, surrounded by the millions of bubbles that connected this scared place with the rest of the world.
11511.title: Part 2: Hyrdo Lady Debute Fight

115111.content:
*Original by Namelessone*

[So, how was I on my first day?]

<Marvelous! Miss Westfall, you are a natural!>

[What can I say, it’s all the comic books I read. Now, which way is home? Or do we have another mission?]

<No, I do think you can head home for now. I’ll show you the way.>

Rena followed a glow to the right until she soon found herself looking up at her own tub and, after thinking about it, turned back into herself…mostly. Meanwhile, some water flew out of her body and gracefully splashed into her still filled sink.

“Well…not that wasn’t fun and all but how do I get back to normal?”

“Just do as you did before, place your fist over your chest and concentrate.”

Rena did so and, sure enough, the suit turned back into water and fell down into the tub, filling it up more again. Still, Rena couldn’t let out a sad sigh.

“What’s wrong? You’ve received the honor of being a great warrior, something no one else has been chosen for.”

“Oh, don’t get me wrong.” Rena said, looking down at the water in her tub. “But I didn’t get a chance or even an excuse to try water inflation. Well, maybe the next time I have to fight or help out I might have an excuse to-“

“Oh, but Rena, that part of the bargain applies even when you’re not on a mission.”

“….come again?”

“While you do not have your ability to turn into water when you are normal, you still have all of your other powers, meaning-“

“I-I can practice water inflation right here in the privacy of my own home?!?” Rena asked, tail wagging furiously and getting excited.

“Of course, that was the agreement between us.”

“Ooooh, how do I do it?!?”

“P-please settle down, Miss Westfall. Just like most of your powers, you simply need a resource and think about it. You can completely control water, its shape, its speed, even the direction where it flows so long as it is touching a surface. You can’t make water float completely off the ground but if needed, you can cause condensation in humid environments in emergencies. For now, just focus on absorbing the water in the tub. You aren’t a sponge per say, as you have to focus but you can absorb water when desired.”

Grinning broadly, Rena held out her arms and thought about the three or so inches in the tub flowing inside her and watched eagerly as her body started to expand. Since she was only concentrating on absorbing the water, it went inside her almost equally throughout her body. Once all the water was gone, she tried getting out, noting that while she was able to move just fine, it did felt somewhat heavy. Looking in the mirror, Rena could only fun her hands around her body, noting that while she looked like she just gained a few pounds all over, she didn’t quite look fat, just…puffy. But when she pressed against her sides, her body gave in a lot and was rather squishy, a very noticeable “sloshing” sound. Rena could only purr. It wasn’t like she imagined, it was even better! And now she could do this all the time! Odd that her clothes didn’t rip by now but that was something not worth complaining about.

“And….if desired…you can localize the water within your body…”

Rena could only grin mischievously as she thought about sending the water to two points; her breasts. Within seconds, Rena felt all the water quickly flow within her and turned her flat board chest into two large melons that easily broke the cup-size scale. Cupping them, squishing them, pressing them together, Rena could only giggle and laugh. They didn’t feel heavy (at least not too heavy) and while they didn’t feel quite like normal breasts (after all, they were more like water balloons at his point), Rena loved it. She even bend her knees and stuck out her tongue naughtily after letting her breasts lay on the counter, as if she were displaying them for someone. Rena didn’t notice but L’acquaser turned to the side a bit, somewhat embarrassed. Even though this power could only be wielded by someone like Rena, it was a bit silly with how much she was enjoying it.

Rena paid no attention as she put some water in her rear and the rest in her belly, squishing her palms against her butt, feeling it’s softness before drawing it all into her belly, giving herself the appearance of being at least nine-months pregnant, with triplets even. Still, as Rena stood there, hands on her belly, she frowned a bit as she thought of something.

“You know…I probably can’t afford to do this too often…otherwise the water bill would go through the roof…”

“I’ve taken care of that.”

“Huh?”

“After observing you, I knew it would take a lot of water to make you happy and you can’t keep the same old water in the bathtub; otherwise, how will you enjoy the baths you like so much? That’s why I have altered many of your pipes. From now on, all water from your garden hose to your sinks will, instead of using water from your usual service, will mystically pump in water from a fresh water spring. You will never have to worry about ‘running up a bill’ as you humans put it.”

“R-really?!?”

“Yes. And I assure you, while no water will ever be too hot or too cold for you anymore, you can still adjust the temperature with the knob as always. Of course, your dishwasher and washing machine still uses normal water from your utility service; otherwise it would be rather suspicious if you stopped using water at all completely.”

“So, you mean I can get as big as I water with the tub here?!?”

“Within reason. I suggest you keep the blinds closed and stay indoors when you have your…fun…but otherwise, you can so long as you as careful not let others see you; otherwise…that would be problematic for both of us. Now, I must go but I shall return when you are needed. All I ask is that you keep some water close by so I can come forth and communicate with you.”

“I’ll get a bucket for each room in the house!”

“That’s…really not necessary…”

“It’s okay, I’ve got plenty.”

“…very well…I must go. Please, enjoy yourself.”

With that said, L’acquaser melted back inside the water still in the sink and vanished; in fact, it almost seemed some water disappeared. Now that she was alone with the knowledge that she had almost free water for life, Rena grinned as she leaned her belly against the side of the tub and turned the water on. Rena already tried a little water, now she wanted more. Using the water itself to…shut off the water, Rena then proceeded to float a stream upwards to her and then inside her own body, feeling it pumping into her stomach and the rest of body. After refilling and shutting off the tub a few times, Rena squished her large body and proudly looked at herself in the mirror.

Not wanting to overdo it too quickly, she absorbed enough water to look like she might have weighted about….450 lbs? Didn’t matter, she wasn’t fat, she was just filled with water and loved it as she used her large arms to run her chubby hands over her body and squish herself. She developed cheeks on her face like large grape fruits on either side of a muzzle with a little bit of water under her jaw and her large neck almost completely blended in with her soft shoulders. Her arms were at least four inches in diameter near the shoulder, ending in chubby hands with fat little fingers. Her body frame was at least two feet long in width and two beach ball-sized breasts, both about a foot in diameter, were lying neatly on top of a large belly that was about two feet in diameter, hanging in front of her legs just above her knees by a few inches. Turning a bit, she noticed her rear were the almost the size of two medicine balls stuck together, at least three feet wide, and her legs were so large that they were constantly rubbing against each other.

Rena couldn’t help but hop once and let the water jiggle around, purring as she felt like she was getting massaged from the inside. She then tried placing water in various locations with different amounts in different places, and then even experimented with placing them all in just one area. After that, Rena returned the water where it were and tried one more quick thing. Turning on the water and keeping the faucet on, Rena started absorbed more water than she could carry, at least not without stretching her proportions out first. Using the water in the tub to shut off the water after she ungracefully but painlessly fell to the floor, Rena found herself barely able to move, her water bloated limbs blocked by both their size and the size of her body. Seemingly impossibly big, Rena nuzzled the giant breasts that blocked her view and felt her belly. Even in the middle of her bliss, clearly becoming aroused by her fantasy come true, Rena could feel her stomach growling. Sighing, Rena drained enough water out of her breasts so she could see over them, then used the water she just emptied out to pull the plug out, then proceeded to drain herself until finally not one drop was left in her. Even if she didn’t want to quit just yet, she couldn’t ignore the basic needs of her body. And it might be a good idea to close all of the blinds…
115111.title: Part 3: After The Fight

1151111.content:
*Original by Namelesson*

============================================

Forty-five minutes later, Rena had a full stomach, the doors were locked, and all of the blinds were closed. She still had a full day ahead of her and without work today….

Rena had to think. At first, she thought she might drag one of her hoses though a window (the side window, inside the backyard, way from the street) and see just how big she could make herself and test the limits of her powers. It would be fun to see if she could distort her proportions while being filled with water and see just how much she could hold….well, at least while inside her living room, which Ws by far was the largest room in the house aside from her empty garage. And since she had a hose attachment and the water tended to leak, if anywhere, outside and she could just float water straight from her body to the tub if necessary…

But then Rena remembered that she the digital camera she won in that contest a few months ago, the one that came with a tripod. She didn’t have any use for it but now, Rena thought, while not take a few pictures of herself while filled with water at various locations in her body and then use those pictures as references? After all, she has the power of water inflation, so if anyone in the world knew what it was like and how it should look, she would! Hmmm……

====================================================

#1. Rena decides that since she is the ultimate model for water inflation, it’s time to take a few pictures and draw them out.

#2. Rena wants to test the limits of her new powers and see, at least within the confines of her living room, just what she really can do.
1151111.title: Final part: Preparing for Some Fun

11511111.content:
*Original by System_Crash*

After digging in her closet for a time, ending up having to look in another, Rena found the camera and tripod. The camera was still the box, practically unopened except for the few minutes Rena had played with it whens he had first won the blasted thing. Still, after taking the time to familiarize herself with the camera, figuring out the buttons and how to attach the tripod, she was ready.

Still, hardware ready was different from drawing ready. She could draw fairly quickly, especially in her superhero like style, but she had to decide what she wanted to do first. Would she do a single panel, or a comic. Finally, after debating with herself for a time Rena made her decision. She wouldn't do a full comic, just a few panel shots showing the progression of her inflation, with a hose and maybe a few other details in the background. Still, Rena could stand to wait any longer.

After rigging the camera and getting a hold of its remote control, Rena brought the outside house from the backyard through the bushes and the side window, letting it drape across the carpet and eventually into the living room. Rena could have tried to take the picture in the bathroom, but with so many shiny surfaces there would have been a lot of lens flare. So, living room would have to work. With a control valve securely on the end of the hose, Rena gently placed it close to her mouth. She knew she could just pull the water in from outside her body, but she wanted to have the sense of actually swallowing that much water, just having it absorb through her stomach.

Rena began slow at first, her vision of the image series starting to become a solid concept. It would be a simple background with a lion woman, a hose, and some small chibi like thing in the background controlling a valve. Rena would have liked to use a cheetah, but they usually had slightly different proportions then a tiger-like person. Lion-women were far closer in overall body shape and dimensions.

With that Rena began, sucking down the water like it was life air itself. She took picture often at the beginning, that way it could look like the drawn process had started out slow and then had gotten faster. For Rena, however, it was only one speed, but that just meant she could enjoy the whole process.

It started out in her stomach, slowly making her usually flat, athletic form become puffy before the inflation began to spread to other places. Rena could only purr with every step. The water from the hose was very cold, but it felt pretty darn good. Like when you've been in the sun all day and you have a glass of cold water. It felt something like that. Still, the simple sensation of feeling her body expand was driving Rena through the roof. The fact that it was happening so slowly only made it more enjoyable and longer lasting.

The inflation continued, Rena quickly gaining the apperance of someone that looked like they weighed 200, 300, and then 400 pounds. Rena even went a little farther, getting to the point where she could just barely waddle before stopping and closing up the valve on the hose. With that series of pictures done Rena waddled over to the kitchen sink, guiding the water as it slipped out of her and down the drain until she was back to normal.

Still, though Rena had enough to draw with, she wanted to do more inflation. Well, after full body, Rena couldn't help but giggle and hold her very flat chest. Guess she might as well hit every major expansion group. Checking to make sure the camera had enough space on its memory card, thank god for digital, Rena got the hose going again but this time, instead of drinking, she just let the water hit her right in about the center chest, her body drawing in every drop and, per her mental command, began channeling it into her breasts.

Rena giggled as she litterally watched her breasts grow out like a pair of water balloons, getting larger with ever passing moment. Up the scale she went, Rena quickly loosing track when she had gone past any natural size. Still, she kept going, using a button on the camera's remote control to take a picture every once in a while. Eventually, her breasts were the size of those large medicine balls, and Rena had to admit she was having trouble standing up. Still, she kept going, keepingn herself standing until, finally, her breasts reached the floor and all that water weight shifted away from Rena to the houses support beams.

Rena stopped when her breasts were about to couch the roof, unable to see anything in front of her and even the camera had fallen out of view. Her breasts were huge, so big that if Rena could get them to roll she could have easily lain on top of them and had her butt touch the roof of her home. Still, with that expansion sequence done Rena drained herself, a little harder since found her breasts were to heavy to drag closer to to the kitchen sink and she had to carefully float a large portion of water until she was able to move again.

The whole time Rena's clothing seemed to bend and stretch to make room for her growing form. It was peculiar, and Rena began to wonder if her powers somehow let her increase the size of her clothing. Still, if it was in her power to make them grow, she should be able to stop and just let them stretch and break. With that Rena got the urge to do one more breast expansion, quickly going into the room and grabbing a T-shirt she didn't want anymore, putting it one and starting the process over again. This time, however, she also gave her body the silent command to let the shirt rip.

Rena could only smile, she could now tell that her shirt was actually stretching naturally, the fabric becoming tighter across her form as her breasts took up more and more space. It got to the point where Rena began to wonder if the shirt would rip, the seems starting to dig into her skin when, finally, the shirt hit its breaking point, a loud rip down the front indicating the front had broken and, with a bit more expansion the whole top blew off, falling on the floor and leaving Rena giggling and jiggling half naked in front of the camera.

With her breast expansion shots done, Rena went onto just a simple belly only expansion. This time she started sitting down on the ground, hands resting on hers stomach as she let the hose pour into a nearby bucket. She simply placed her tail inside, and using it as a secondary hose she began to fill her stomach up, feeling it expand and push her legs and arms out while taking pictures every once in a while. Rena resting her head on the expanding gut, purring as she rubbed it with her own hands. It felt like she was some crazy water balloon, and it was almost to much enjoyment for Rena to take in. She was living a dream, and she would for many years to come.

Once her stomach was nearly four times larger than the rest of her body, Rena let the water drain and went onto the final area of her body. Using her tail as a hose again, Rena put the bucket up on a stool so she could stand, her back to the camera as she let the water come up her tail and down into her butt. This was the expansion that really started, for lack of better term, to turn Rena on. She was an Aquaphile file after all, and after having every part of her body filled with water Rena was somewhat surprised it hadn't started earlier.

Still, Rena kept herself under control, rubbing her but as it ballooned. Each cheek became larger, spreading out like a pair of oddly shaped balloons. Rena bounced a little on her heels, laughing as she felt the water in her butt bounce up and down. Still, through it all Rena managed to keep taking pictures, and after her butt was so big her feet were lifted off the ground she stopped, drug her big behind to the kitchen, and drained herself out.

With pictures at hand Rena got to work, but quickly changed her idea to use other characters to use her online representation, the white furred tiger with black hair, as the model for all this. It made sense after all, they would were exactly the same body wise after all. Rena spent the rest of the day drawing, her hand flying across the tablet drawing tool she had gotten for her computer. She had never worked of fast, but then again she had never been more inspired. She finished all the sketching and black lining she needed that day, stopping when it got close to dinner time. She'd finish the coloring later, a process that would take much longer. Still, it was an amazing start.

After making a quick something Rena sat down, chewing her food at the table with a glass of water meant for drinking nearby when...

===============================================================

Option 1: L’acquaser comes up from the glass of water. Hyrdo Lady is needed again.

Option 2: Rena turns on the television, and hears a news report about the bank robbery. She's mentioned, by her correct name thankfully, and Rena can't help giggle. She was a superhero and she could inflate herself with water. Her dreams had come true. Still, as Rena thinks about this she remembers L’acquaser wanted her explore the strange bubble world she used to teleport to different places. Its time to go around the world in an hour.
11511111.title: Modeling Time

choices: Take the first bubble she saw.
115111112.content:
Flicking on the old TV, Rena just wanted something to ease her mind. Nothing would be good on until late night came on. That was until Rena saw something flash through the her channel surfing. Quickly she stopped and turned back a few channels, trying to believe what she was seeing right now.

         "This is Kim Quinton here and i'm the scene of a robbery, which moments ago was taking place.At about two 'o clock a.m to two forty-five, five people walked through the doors of the Paradigm City Bank; usually not something to be alarmed by. However, these weren't normal citizens, but criminals desiring to steal the money from the vault. These Five assailants cut off the exits bank; each armed to the tooth for any police reaction. Forcing most of the patrons of the building down and even injuring three security guards. Thankfully, no casualties have been reported.By some miraculous gift, a prodigious savoir came to the rescue. Now, folks at home may find this hard to believe, but what we are about to show you is all real.

         The video in question showed Rena taking down the robbers. It even showed her getting shot to no avail. Finally it ended with her taking the weapons of the robbers and leaving the scene. It even zoomed in on her exit in the small puddle of water

         "Yes. What we have shown was all real, something by all accounts came like a scene from a comic book. Many eyewitnesses could only guess the good doer was young and eager to help. The only name she gave out was 'Hydro Lady', before disappearing.Now many police....

          Rena ignored the rest of the newscaster's voice, lost in her own little world. She was acknowledged of saving of those people at the bank! She had powers to stop the villainy of the world! She could inflate herself with water! This was a dream come true, she couldn't be any happier.

         Rena hugged herself and squeed in her own mind. If this was a dream, she wished she never awoke again; it wasn't a dream however, but reality that she was living.

          Just then a thought came to her mind, stopping Rena in her thoughts. She was so pre-occupied with her thoughts on of inflation, she forgot her other power: the ability to literally travel anywhere in the world! Well, she couldn't let that go unaddressed.

         " I can't let that be, now could I?" Rena addressed herself. Taking off from the chair she was on, Rena headed towards the bathroom. Turning on the faucet for her bath tub,Rena first put her hand into the tub. Her costume wrapping itself around the cat-girl. Stretching a little, Rena took one look at the tub and jumped in it. Her world swirling by as she traveled into the water world.

****


          Swimming in a large expanse of water, but strangely not absorbing any, Rena saw the world around her. Millions of bubbles floated by her, each one showing a scene from the outside world.

         One bubble showed a woman showering;another showed a cat-man eating fish near the pier of a beach;and another showed a dog-girl and her pups making cake, the perspective from a bowl of water. There were millions of more that Rena couldn't comprehend. However, she did noticed three things.

         One, the closest bubbles showed mainly her city or at least what Rena thought of her city. She recognized famous landmarks, restaurants, and jaunts. The farther bubbles from her city's bubbles were of places she only seen in pictures, news, and other media. Like she saw ,from the perspective of rain, New York City on the eastern coast. Farther from those bubbles were those of different countries and places. Even farther still were of unknown places that she couldn't place as areas of the planet.

         The second thing she noticed was that the bubbles size correlated to the size of the water source. The perspective of lakes had huge bubbles, being eight to nine times bigger than Rena. While the perspective of water bowls and bottles were only the size of her fist. Not that this revelation really mattered, seeing as Rena could go through any liter of liquid.

         The third, and final, thing she noticed was that were crime was happening, the bubbles quaked. She probably didn't notice it when L'acquaser was with her, but without the her guide she received a full view. The bubble violently quaked, looking as though it might pop. And there were seven to eight bubbles currently quaking at her.

          At the moment she could go into one of the bubbles or she could ask L'acqacser for some answers.
115111112.title: Around the World in 80 Days

choices: She goes to the villain bubble
1151111122.content:
Rena stared up at the quaking bubbles and bit her lip, what could this mean? She didn't know the schematic of this place, nor the rules. She worried if she did anything it would do more harm than good.

She shook her head in remembrance, she had someone who could explain this to her!

"How do I call him though?" Rena exclaimed."Do I say his name? L'acquaser! L'acquaser!"

No movement was seen, so Rena took that as a sign that it wasn't an avenue to pursue. He didn't appear when one said his name, so what else could Rena do?

"Maybe I can summon him with a dance? I don't know any, but I can try." Rena said

She flailed her arms up and down, in an effort to mimic a dance. This went on for a good while before Rena stopped herself, she wasn't getting anywhere with that as well. What could she do?

"L'acquaser, where are you?" Rena said. Her mind wandered towards the appearance of the water serpent, her mind doing its best to get his attention. Slowly did she feel something odd happen, it was like her mind was putting all of its attention onto a particular task. Rena could feel her mind doing its best to try and locate L'acquaser. Then she noticed a picture appear in her vision: it was L'acquaser! He appeared to be floating in the water plane, although, he did seem to be in the middle of a task at the moment.

"Weird, I must've been so caught up with my search, I went a little batty! No offense to bats, however" Rena said. She watched the vision of L'acquaser do...something with the water. It looked important enough, though, why did she imagine this scenario?

"Do you require assistance, Rena?" L'acquaser spoke after ten or so minutes.

"Oh, its nothing, i'm sorry that- wait, why did you just speak?" Rena replied.

"Because I have the ability to talk and I'm concerned about why you need me?"

"No,you're a vision, right. A figment of my imagination."

"Rena, I assure you, I am not. You see, a bearer of the water power can formulate a link to me at any time. Now, do you require assistance?"

"Yeah, I do. I'll get over to wherever you are so we can talk."

"Don't worry, I'll come to you. Just focus on me at the moment and then an area in front of you. Combine those two images together and imagine me wherever you focused on."

She focused on the little picture in the vastness of the ocean plane, a shift began to form in front of Rena. She could faintly see the outlines of L'acquaser, his body was darker than the surrounding water. Finally, the guide of Rena had appeared.

"Now, what do you need assistance on?" L'acquaser asked.

"You see those quaking bubbles, what do they mean?" Rena said, she pointed up towards said bubbles. If L'acquaser was a Ani, Rena would swore she saw his jaws drop in horror. The best thing the water serpent could do was bend its "neck" in pure bewilderment. Rena waited as it bobbed gently do to the water plane's current interacting with it.

"Are they bad?" Rena said hesitatingly, that seemed to knock the water serpent out of its stupor.

"The reason that those bubbles are quaking, is because each one represents a major disaster. And not just any disaster, ones that may require the direct intervention of Hydro Lady, herself." L'acquaser answered.

He "flew" up in the air and slowly coiled around each bubble as if to examine them. Whatever he took out of that, Rena did not know; though, he seemed a little more at ease because of it.

"So, here are the things that are happening at the moment." L'acquaser made smaller versions of the quaking bubbles above Rena. The cat-girl swam over to L'acquaser to get a better look." Bubble-one:a drought going on somewhere on the other side of the world. Bubble-two: Cruise liner is sinking, but thankfully not horrible enough that we should be there right now. Bubble-Three: Winter has frozen over an large area of a city and it may need to be dealt with. Bubble- Four: another drought, although, we can purify the water instead of making it. Bubble-Five: inter-city gang fights that are endangering the locals living there. However, its like the cruise liner, we don't need to go at it right now. Bubble-six: a wild-fire is starting to spread and it may need our attention soon."

Rena slumped as she heard all of these news, she had her work cut out for here. This was the life she chose though, she couldn't just sit around all day and blow herself up into a balloon! Just when she was about to choose her option, she saw out of the corner of her eye a miniature bubble L'acquaser went over.

"Hey, L'acquaser, what about this bubble?" Rena held the surprisingly durable bubble up. L'acquaser looked at the thing for a few moments, than shook his head.

"Its probably wrong, ignore it," L'aquaser spoke.

"Why, what is it?"

"I haven't felt a thing like that in a while, and the ones I do feel were always nothing to write home about."

"If it isn't so bad, why don't you tell me."

L'acquaser looked, or more accurately turned it central point, towards Rena. So, it began to speak what the deal was with the bubble: " It feels like, using the modern term, a supervillain.
1151111122.title: Questions for L'acquaser

choices: Back with rena watching through the bubble
11511111222.content:
On the other side of the city, there were crime in a part of that half. The thugs were laughing at some people who couldn't fight back. Suddenly, there was a small fireball hitting the ground just ahead of the thugs and it was starting to feel warmer. Everyone was looking to a person holding a fireball.

“There is reasons why crime exists, but normal people could be heroes if get over the fear and find that inner courage.” The person said in a even tone.

“Who the hell are you?” The leader of the thugs asked feeling brave or stupid.

“To people like you, I'm your worst nightmare. For these people, I'm a light in the darknessess and a pillar of hope.” The person said as the bystanders were feeling the said feeling and had hope for the new hero.

“You? A pillar of hope for these weakings? You are like nothing more than a firebug.” He said as the person sighed before vanishing in a small pile of flames.

“I really, really hate people like you.” The person said behind the leader while the other gang members turned to see him behind their boss.

“How he move that fast?” One of the other thug lackies asked.

The person just fought off the gang before melting the guns minus the bullets. The person stepped into the light. The person is wear a red, orange, and white suit with flames motif, a yellow mask on over his face, red like ember eyes, and black as smoke hair.

“Who are you great stranger?” an old man asked the peron that saved them.

“I'm just a person passing by and wanted to help.” He said gently

“We know that. What is your name?” A teen boy asked impatiently.

“You can call me, Blazeman.” Blazeman said with a chuckle.

Blazeman looked over to the thugs and took everything before giving it back to the good people of the city.

(AN: Not my first choice of a name for a hero, but it was funny because I was thinking of hydro lady)

Blazeman smiled to the people before leaving the group as police was arriving looking at the cheering folks and the downed thugs. He left in a pillar of fire without leaving a scorch mark on the cement. He appeared in from a fire in his living room before putting it out with a bucket of water.

“Flame in.” He said as his suit was sucked into his body leaving him in a red shirt, brown pants, burnt orange socks, and black shoes.

“Hmm, seems like there like another hero besides me making an appearance.” He said sitting on a couch.

He was thinking back on the news reel that was talking about the new hero, hydro lady.

Blazeman's real name is Ryan 'Rick' James, a normal person in the society and a jack-of-all-trades in the city.

“I hate dumbasses like that.” He said thinking about the other gangs he put down before in that fight.

Flashback:

Blazeman was looking at the gangs fighting in an inter-city gang war.

'This is just stupid and I have to get this handled before the good officers show up and make it worse.' He thought before looking around.

'Hello. I have an idea.' He thought before making balls of fire with little heat.

Soon he was throwing the balls at the ground as they explode like flashbangs. Jumping off the low building, he brought down most of the gangs within seconds. He had one left gang left as the flashbang worn off.

“Who the hell are you?” One of the minions asked pointing his gun at the hero.

“Just a person passing through and stopping idiots like you killing innocent people.” Blazeman said.

“How about you work for us since you took down the other gangs with ease.” The leader said.

“No thanks, working for you is against my morals.” He said as he vanished in flames and appeared behind the leader.

“Call off your men and you will saved from my hands. If you don't then your gang will be the first I kill.” He said with a hot edge in his tone.

To make his point, blazeman made a fireball the size of cannonball and the heat of one near exploding.

“Do you really want to try me, boys?” he asked

“Okay, okay. Boys standdown.” The leader said as he nodded.

The lackies ever knew that the hero made couple of fire clones as the main hero knocked out the leader.

“Thanks boys.” Blazeman said as he suck the flames back into his body to refill his energy a bit.

He melted the guns minus the bullets and went to find that last gang before calling it a night and go home.

Flashback: end

“Rough night?” a voice asked as a female humanoid cat mixed with a dragon appeared from a candle of fire.

“Something like that.” Ryan said sweeping a hand through his chocolate brown hair.

“You are still mid way with your powers, but your control is getting better.” She said putting a clawed hand on his shoulder.

“Thanks, my Lady Heat.” He said and she nodded as they cuddled.

“Still been 8 years since you came into my life as a mother figure and our fire lord as a father figure.” Ryan said looking a photo of a kid looking version of him with the woman in her arms like she was his mother.

“Even without your gift I still would have chosen to take care of you to make sure you were ready for your gift.” She said and he nodded.

“Thanks, mama Saphira.” He said revealing her name and she nodded before he drifted off on the couch.
11511111222.title: Meanwhile

choices: Hydro Lady deals with more thugs of the city.
Hydro Lady meets her first villain! Yah, or, ahhhh
115111112221.content:
Hydro Lady watched as the thugs were beaten down by the fire themed superhero, her mouth aghast at what she had witnessed. She turned her head to L'acquser and asked him simply: "Who was that?"

L'acquser seemed to be contemplating something, his "tail" swiveled to touch his "chin". He floated for a few moments then answered Rena's question. "He is empowered by something that, you could say, belongs to my species."

Hydro Lady's thoughts briefly went through a scenario of her mind, where the hero grew just like her. Especially growing around the crotch area and breaking right through his-

"I'll monitor that, but hopefully it shall not be a problem. She could be more trusted than the others." L'acquser broke through to Hydro Lady's lewd thoughts. She shook a little and went back to the subject at hand. That little scene was only a "drop" in the bucket of crime that was going on in the city.

"What even is this place?" Hydro Lady announced.

"A look into what happens when a economy crashes or what a producer that can't diversify becomes eventually." L'acquser responded. Hydro Lady looked at the water elemental in confusion, who only gave back another in response. "What?"

"Sorry, just weird a water elemental knew so much of the economy and infrastructure."

"I don't just float around doing nothing, I go out and scout some areas first, Not this place, but when you see one derelict city, you've seen all."

"So what can I do to help?"

"Well, we can stomp out the worse aspects of the place. Currently a gang war between six rival factions have been tearing this city apart for the last week."

"How'd you know that?"

"I just intercepted a television stream" L'acquser answered, Hydro Lady swam over to his side. They watched through a cup full of water as a reporter was at the scene of a recent gang fight. The dog-girl on stream seemed distressed as she reported the innocents injured during the fight. The scene cut to a helicopter overview of four fleeing rhino thugs as they rumbled out of the area.They were tearing through the backyards of some innocent people. Hydro-Lady felt something inside her start to figuratively burn.

"Hey, L'acquser. You see that puddle coming up ahead of those thugs?" Hydro-Lady said.

"Yes."

"Can we get there right now?"

===

"Keep it up, J" One of the bigger rhino anthros screamed as they barreled through a fence. The subject of the warning sped a little faster to outrun the cops behind him.

"I'm dong my best br- I mean 'T'" 'J' said as he catched up with the third rhino from "T", who looked at J with a little bit of annoyance. The four thugs had their heads covered and people would be surprised that even with their large bodies, it would be hard to recognize a disguised rhino anthro.

The stampede reached another backyard, which seemed to be recently cleaned. Water was everywhere and large puddles seemed to be covering the ground. Two of the rhinos managed to cross over to the other side, while the one who was beside "J" over took him again. Unlike the others though, he seemed to want to stomp through the puddles.

This was his mistake.

Instantly a his leg was sucked into the ground, the rhino shrieked out. The leading two turned around, while "J" watched in scared confusion. Instantly the nimble form of Hydro-Lady popped out of the puddle to climb her way to the top of the rhino she had gotten.

"Wait, isn't that the 'Water-Lass' from outta state?" The thug beside "K" whispered. "J" meanwhile was doing his best to get Hydro-Lady off of his friend's head. Hydro-Lady, jumped off, right in time to see J deliver a teeth rattling punch to her impromptu jumping board. The figure instantly went down for the count. J looked down at his fist and muttered out a quick sorry to his friend. Which he followed by going into a rampage against the one who inadvertently made him hit his friend.

"Shit, we gotta go, K" The rhino besides K said.

"Lets give time for J to come over.You go over and get 'Z'." K whispered, right before using his hands to microphone what he wanted J to do. "J, get over here!"

J wasn't having any of that, as he charged at Hydro-Lady. She laughed and slipped like water through his hands. She twisted around J's grasp and moved towards his head like she did the other one. J seemed not to remember the first time he did it and banged his own fist against his noggin. However, this didn't seem to knock him unconscious like the other.

"You guys usually this hard-headed or am I thinking of bulls?" Hydro-Lady joked.This seemed to only incite J, who now looked like he wanted to rip Hydro-Lady apart. K seemed to realize that J seemed to be in one of his "rages" at the moment.

The third rhino came over to the downed "Z" and began to pick him up. Hydro-Lady saw this and began to prod "J". She reached over his vision and began to speak to him.

"Hey, I'm right here. Are you blind or am I that good at fooling you?"Hydro-Lady jostled him. "J" took that as response to charge forward, a rhino's natural imperative, and did so with Hydro-Lady covering his eyesight.

"'J', you're going to hit" K spoke too late. "Z" seemed to be helped out by the third rhino and was about to get back onto his feet. Right until the charging form of "J" knocked him and the other right back down. Like bowling pins, the two flew through the air. "J" tumbling right through a fence and heading downslope to who knows where. Hydro-Lady thankfully watched this scene, for she had jumped right off of the rhino before he fell.

"Is that all you got, because I just showed you what I had!" Hydro-Lady proclaimed, her back turned. Which was ample time for a large shape to "bearhug" her.

"That was my little brother, you bitch, If he is dead, I'm going to enjoy doing this." K whispered in Hydro-Lady's ear. She struggled for breath, her concentration keeping her from turning into water and keeping her subconscious from doing it for her.

"Crushing me. How am I going to get out of this? Hes stronger than me. He gonna crush me like a tin can! Damn, is his breath heavy on my-wait, heavy. I think I have an idea."

"Okay, first off....i'm a cat...not a dog." Hydro-Lady said through strained breathes."Second off,make sure you get a deep breath."

"What?" K said dumbly as he loosen his "hug" a little bit.

Hydro-Lady took this lapse in judgement to begin to call up all the water in the backyard. It flowed towards her like hungry snakes, flowing towards any open area on her. "K" only had a little moment of confusion as he saw the once petite Hydro-Lady turn into a giant blob of a cat. His bound around broke from this action.

"Timber!" She yelled, her normal voice strangely contrasting with her rotund body. She dropped straight ontop of "K", she felt her skin ripple as he banged against her large form. She laughed, it felt like he was tickling her.

"Looks like Hydro-Lady has gotten her catch!" She announced, the crew inside the helicopter could only look slackjawed at the mountain of flesh the was currently Hydro-Lady.
115111112221.title: Back With L'acquser

choices: Hydro Lady fights her first super villain
1151111122211.content:
Waking up still feeling groggy he heard the news report talking about the new greenhorn hero, hydro lady, taking out some thugs. He noticed his mother figure went to sleep in her room. Looking in the mirror, ryan looks like a human with patches of red fur and scales of rose red color. His eyes are amber orange, but his body is still developing the other traits. He has a job of writing series of books and one of the series is being hold at the local library where a certain catgirl works.

'Need to get back to working on those stories.' He thought.

He drank some spicy tea to wake him up before watching more news reports and he was looking at the room his mother figure was sleeping peacefully. He lit the candle again with his lighter before taking a pose on the couch.

'Let my mother sleep and let me use the flames for the night without her worry.' He thought has he had changed into his hero suit.

'I have to use my own power this time.' was added as an afterthought.

He left the home through the fireplace again before jumping to the highest point in the city. He was focusing his power into an orb of fire before it was growing in size. He threw it into the sky as it was growing bigger. A few minutes later, it was the size of the sun and he went to the tv station.

“Excuse me, but I have a message to deliver to the gangs of the city.” He said to the people in charge of the station. After 10 minutes passed, he was standing with a mic in his hand.

“Sorry to impede on your programs, but I'm here to send a message to all of the remain gangs who soon will get a visit from me and the police. Outside in space is a ball of fire the size of the sun. By the time its disappears, all of you will be caught, stopped, and maybe for the stupid ones, slightly burned. The time has come for all of you to be in jail or prison.” He said with a nod to the crew before leaving the building to his spot.

He made a squad of fire clones with a plan in mind.

“Each of you will take out a gang before moving on the next gang. If you run into the greenhorn, lead her to me and I think we can work together. Disarm the gangs, melt the gun, avoid the bullets. Most of all knock them out hard.” He explained and they nodded before fire flashing away. He looked up and the fireball before watching it shrink a bit. He went after a select group of gangs that his clones aren't gunning after.

After the span of 2 hours, he and his squad of clones rounded up almost most of the gangs except for one and the ball of fire was almost gone.

“I have to get to watergirl so we can think of a plan before the last of my energy is gone.” He said before taking the clones back into his body and ball grew by a chunk. He went off to find where she was from what he read on the news report.
1151111122211.title: A Wild Blazeman Appeared

choices: The Coffins fight back;Hydro-Lady and Blazeman argue.
The Coffins fight back;Hydro-Lady and Blazeman go over what to do.
11511111222112.content:
"The hell was that?" Hydro Lady proclaimed as she watched Blazeman recite his speech. Watching various videos from different aquatic viewpoints;each one showed off a clone of the fire-themed hero taking on the gangs of the city.

"Can I do that?" Hydro-Lady exclaimed as she saw one scene of a bison beating down a clone, only for two more to come rushing in to take him down. "It almost makes me want to give up my expanding powers."

She looked down at her breasts, frowning, she allowed a few pints of water to expand them. They grew heavy on her chest and Hydro-Lady purred a little but."Almost."

"Hey now, lets focus on the task at hand." L'acquser popped into existence right beside Hydro-Lady, who yelped in shock." Hothead may have some of this place covered, but we still have our work cut out for us. Remember this place was considered so bad that it needed you to come down here."

Shaking her head, Hydro-Lady shot off towards any water sources. First, arriving at a lake of some sort, she saw a few jaguars run down the bank. Smiling to herself, Hydro-Lady shot out of the lake at high speeds. She landed on the bank and posed, a few large drops of water covered her, expanding her curves by a noticeable margin.

"Halt, evildoers!' She announced and was quickly shocked as the jaguars were gathered into a pile overseen by some of Blazeman's clones. She raised an eye at that, but quickly left her spot to see if their were others in need of her help.

===

"Oooh, I think I made a wrong turn in Albuquerque." Hydro-Lady exclaimed as she sat on the rail of a bridge. A cheetah and a parrot opened their mouths in shock before they collapsed abruptly in Hydro-Lady's view. She turned around and saw a clone of Blazeman holding his arm outwards. Turning back around, Hydro-Lady saw an aura of sizzling heat around the two gang members.

"Okay, point two for you." She said crossly at the clone, who only stared at her blankly. She laid back and let herself fall into the river with a splash.

===

"Ahhh! Oh, thought you were Blazeman for a second." A Wolf said as Hydro-Lady appeared around a corner of an alleyway." I mean, I know its insane, but the boys and I have been on edge for the past hour o-" He was quickly stopped by a fist into the jaw, followed by being blown into a wall by a blast of water.

"Okay, baddies, I got you now!" Hydro-Lady proclaimed and bashed her foot into a door. She quickly yelped in pain, remembering that she only had super strength when expanded. Grumbling, she willed some water around her to travel up her body. She waited for a few moments, before she had gotten a good pair of thighs and calves, although, they did appear to be fat more than muscle.

Kicking the door again, she smiled in satisfaction, only to frown as she saw all of the other wolves unconscious.She looked up to see the flying form of a Blazeman clone disappear over the horizon.

"3-1,gah!" Hydro-Lady exclaimed before running into a puddle of rainwater.
==

"Did he seriously take on the entire city and win? Hydro-Lady asked L'acquser as they traveled through the watery lands."If he was so powerful, where was he before now?"

"Probably preparing for a day like this." L'acquser replied back.

"He just wanted to show off,that's probably what." Hydro-Lady muttered, the two had searched far and wide, but it seemed that only one thing was clear: almost all of gangs were gone. Except one that was.

"So, tell me about the Coffins again?"

"The Coffins; another of the 'pure' animal races, but this time only accepting arachnids into their ranks." L'acquser replied."Mostly they deal with 'burying the evidence' and contraband. But they do know how to keep under the radar, thats for sure."

The two arrived at a port and Hydro-Lady saw a few dozen police cruiser blocking every single road. She smiled as she realized that Blazeman hadn't appeared yet, but her gaze hardened as she saw a couple of the officers being tended to at the moment. Popping out of the water, she slowly slinked her way into an alley and watched as the officers began speaking to some of The Coffins.

"You here for them too?" A voice spoke into Hydro-Lady's ear, she turned around and disappeared into a puddle. Slowly did she see who the figure that spoke to her was: Blazeman. Who appeared at the moment confused on wear his companion disappeared to.
11511111222112.title: Hydro lady fight more thugs

115111112221121.content:
He looked around for the lady of water before clicking his teeth.

“If she isn't here than I guess I have to look for her later for a proper team up.” He said before doing a quick check of his energy.

“Damn, only enough for one big attack or one shot with a team attack.” He said to himself

He turned around went to get the last gang to of the night.

“Game, set, match.” He said before leaving the alleyway.

“Wait.” A voice stopped him and it was the same person he was looking for.

“Were you showing off?” Hydro lady asked him

He turned to her and she noticed him having a serious look.

“When I saw you on the news, I thought of teaming up with you for this; but it might not happen. I know what you said to my clones. When I first saw you, I thinking of giving you advice for training your powers and maybe training sessions, but I don't show off like that.” He said

“Then why did you wait till it this bad?” She asked getting closer to him.

“Wait till you have to balance two lives and find out you have too get stronger to protect not only the innocent, but your love ones.” He said in a dark tone that kill anything next she had next to say to him.

“We can talk about things like this later, cause this gang needs to go down.” He added and she nodded her head.

“If an argument was going to get worse then we would end it so you two can get back to the issue at hand.” A voice said behind him and he knew it was his mother figure.

“Both her and me.” Laq'caster said behind hydro lady.

The two mentors flowed into their respective chosen, but blazeman felt his energy was refilled about halfway.

“Not full, but I dont need it to be.” He said before looking at his partner. Blazeman turned walking out of the alleyway.

“We need a plan.” She said and he smirked.

“They know I would be coming for them, but you....they don't know about so use that to surprise them.” He said before continuing his walk.

“Don't mind me guys and girls, I'm here on business.” He said to the cops before turning his attention to the last gang hiding out. He walked to the building as he was heating up. He fired small fire blasts stopping the bullets. He spartan kick the door like a boss as he sent a wave of fire destroying the guns by melting them. He noticed a sink in the back so he destoryed that giving his new friend a way in.

'Tomorrow will be a pain in the ass.' Was his thought fighting the thugs of the gang.
115111112221121.title: The Coffins fight back;Hydro-Lady and Blazeman ...

choices: Different scene showing the aftermath of the gang destruction
1151111122211211.content:
The spider-anthros dropped their weaponry, the molten material scorching their hands. Behind the group of defenders were the rest of the gang, who stopped packing all of the contraband the Coffins had brought to the warehouse.

"Okay, show is over!" Blazeman proclaimed. A crash made all occupants look around, before noticing the source of the sound.

From up above came a shadowy mass,a rope of webbing crashed down onto the floor. This startled one of the gang members who dropped a pile of weapons onto the floor.What crawled down a string of web was probably the leader of the Coffins.

It was of course another spider-anthros,but by far the largestthat Blazeman had ever seen before. He could've laid himself flat---he was six foot three--- and he still would be short by twr feet. How the leader of the Coffins wasn't caught already was anyone's guess.Strangely, the thing was slender and not bulky. Besides the height, the Coffin leader was colored a vivid, dark blue, unlike the black carapace of its gang. It gave the leader an almost mesmerizing look as it crawled down its web.

It blinked and waved one of its legs(or was it hands?) around the warehouse. From the mandible throat came a sultry, feminine voice.

"So its a girl." Blazeman thought.

"Start packing up!" The leader screamed, the workers suddenly seemed to have regained their senses and quickly began doing just that. Apparently ore scared of their leader than the multiplying fire summoner.

The group of spider who once seemed wary of Blazeman, now came rushing at him. He was about to summon more of his clones, before he saw his group being blasted away by a gout of water.

He turned to look at the sink he blasted open at the beginning of the fight, their stood Hydro-Lady with her arm pointed forward.

"Greetings everyone, its me: HYDRO-L-argh!" Hydro-Lady didn't finish her question as a piece of machinery came flying at her. The duo turned their heads to the Coffin's leader as she bombarded them with machinery.

Blazeman and Hydro-Lady dodged to the side as the machinery came down onto them. Moving and weaving around columns, right until the bumped right into each other.

"Hey! Why aren't you melting those things she's throwing at us?" Hydro-Lady said, jumping a little as another piece of artillery crashed somewhere in their general area.

"I would, but their being thrown to fast! If I were to bring the heat up to the point I could instantly melt them, I would set this place on fire!" Blazeman shot back.

'Why not your clones?" Hydro-Lady questioned, Blazeman pointed down onto the currently wet floor and then to the sprinkling sink. Hydro-Lady slapped her head.

"Wait, this ismyenvironment! Its my turn to shine!" Hydro-Lady happily stated, before a large piece of concrete crashed besides her. Sitting back down, Hydro-Lady closed her eyes as she summoned the water towards her.

"Are you doing that balloon thing I saw on-" Blazeman was cut off as he was bounced to the side by the growing mass of water Hydro-Lady was being filled with.

"Sorry, that was a lot faster than I expected!" She apologized. Now bigger than Blazeman, she sumo stomped her way over to the Coffin's leader. The girl spider dropped what she was holding, gaping at the large Hydro-Lady.

"You think you have a large caboose? Well guess again!" Hydro-Lady announced as she butt bumped the spider to the back of the place. She flew, crashing into multiple crates, which caused a shock wave knocking the last few of the Coffins over.. A group workers dropped some of their stuff and quickly made haste, with what they had left, into a side room. Blazeman, meanwhile, was gaping at Hydro-Lady corpulent form, doing his best to hide his...blazerod.

"Dammit, its one thing to see it on TV, but seeing it here is another thing." Blazeman thought, his face "heating" up in embarrassment.
