1253322232212222222222.title: The Trainer

12533222322122222222221.content:
“Alright, girls,” Rena said. “I’ve brought you here for a special announcement.”

Rena Westfall was a personal trainer in the small town of Innston. She was one of the best personal trainers in town, and many, many girls of all shapes and sizes looked to her for help for both getting in shape and staying in shape. Rena’s slimmer trainees reported amazing results, and they said it was because Rena really knew what to say. Rena was 5’7”, weighing in at 140 pounds. Her chest was as flat as a wall, and the rest of her body was as straight as could be, with only some small bulges where her muscles were.

Rena’s method of training really involved her getting inside the heads of the girls she was training. For the slimmer girls, she knew what to say because Rena herself had never weighed a pound over 150 in her life. This frustrated not only her fatter clients, but also Rena, as Rena had no idea what to say to motivate her fatter clients. And so, Rena made a decision. She called her three fattest girls, a wolfgirl named Emma, a foxgirl named Lucy, and a cowgirl named Bailey, all of which mystified Rena as to how they were even alive, much less walking, for a special announcement.

“What’s your announcement?” Emma asked. Emma had light gray fur coating her body, and she weighed the least of the three at 18,020 pounds. Her breasts were each almost three times longer than Rena was tall, and weighed eight times more than Rena’s entire body weight! Her hips were almost one and a third times wider than Rena was tall, and her waist was actually more than one and a third as wide as Rena was tall. Her butt was more than ten feet wide, and each cheek weighed ten times more than Rena. Each of Emma’s thighs were five times wider than Rena’s entire body. One time, with each of the three’s permission, Rena had tried to see how far in she could push into their bellies before she hit their stomachs. With Emma, Rena, with her hands over her head, had been swallowed all the way up to just past her knees.

“Yeah, it better be important. The trip here took way too much energy from me,” Lucy said. Lucy was the second heaviest of the three, with light red fur. Although she was the second heaviest, weighing in at 63,962 pounds, she looked slightly less massive due to being seven feet tall. Lucy’s breasts were almost four times longer than Rena was tall, and each weighed 134 times more than Rena did, due to her allegedly having I-cup breasts before gaining her insane amount of weight. Her hips were ten feet wide, and her waist was almost a foot wider than that. Her butt was fifteen feet wide, and each cheek weighed almost twenty-seven times Rena. Each of her thighs were slightly more than seven times the width of Rena’s body. When Rena had done the same as she did with Emma to Lucy, she was actually buried an inch deep into Lucy’s stomach.

Bailey didn’t say anything, due to the fact that she was currently cramming hundreds of candy bars into her face. Bailey had pitch black fur, and was the largest of the three at an impossible 1,552,718 pounds. Each of Bailey’s breasts were almost twenty four times longer than Rena was tall, and each weighed slightly more than 986 times Rena. Her hips were a little more than eleven and a half times as wide as Rena was tall, and her waist was twenty six and a half times wider than Rena’s entire body. Her butt was almost ninety eight times wider than Rena’s body, and each cheek weighed almost 945 times more than Rena. Her thighs were each almost 105 times wider than Rena’s own. When Rena had done what she did to Emma and Lucy, she was literally buried six feet under in Bailey’s flab.

“Well, I’ve been thinking,” Rena said. “And I really want to get into your minds to help you lose all of this weight. I want to know firsthand how it feel to be even more massive than you three.”

Emma nodded. “Right. And I guess you want our help?”

“That’s right,” Rena said, nodding.

Bailey let out an ear-splitting belch. “I guess we could help you out,” she said.

“And I want to get to your weights in a year,” Rena said.

The three fatties let out low whistles, the end of which Bailey punctuated by beginning to stuff her face again.

“That’s gonna be significantly harder,” Lucy said. “I started gaining pretty much the instant my boobs stopped growing when I hit 18, and it still took me ten years of pigging out almost every day to get where I am now.”

“I guess it’s technically possible to do that in a year,” Emma continued. “But you weigh 140 pounds, right?”

Rena nodded.

“If you wanted to get to where I’m at,” Emma continued, “you’d have to put on an average of 49 pounds a day. But I’m guessing being my weight’s not where you wanna end up?”

Rena nodded again. “I want to weigh more than Bailey.”

“Jeeze, Rena,” Lucy said. “You’ve got some lofty goals. Again, we can do that, but do you have any idea how much weight you’d be putting on a day? At least 4,254 pounds!”

“I know,” Rena said. “I did the math, and I know how much I’ll have to gain per day to reach the goal I have in mind.”

Bailey let out another ear-splitting belch. “Well, let’s go,” she said. “No time like the present, right? And the three of us live together, so just pack some things and come on over.”
12533222322122222222221.title: Anyone Can Do It!

choices: How're the other three girls doing?
125332223221222222222211.content:
In the evening, Rena walked up to the house the three others lived in. She had changed out of her workout clothes- a blue tank top and a pair of black shorts- and into something more comfortable- a white T-shirt and a pair of denim hot pants. She had a backpack slung over her shoulder, with a spare pair of clothes, a pair of pajamas, and some toiletries in it. She didn’t bring much, figuring that she would soon outgrow them. Yet the other three always had perfectly fitting clothes, so maybe they had something to fix the issue of outgrowing things.

Looking at the house, it was easy to see that three hyper-massive women lived there. The house was more akin to a warehouse than anything else, with the main doorway being 100 feet wide to accommodate even Bailey’s titanic mass. The house was extremely wide, and would have stretched into quite a few neighboring yards had it not been in the middle of nowhere.

Rena rang the doorbell, which was on a post next to her. After a few minutes, she could hear thumping getting closer. The thumping soon arrived at the door, and the door swung up to reveal Emma, a huge burger in hand. She was wearing a green tank top and black shorts.

“Come on in!” She said, taking a bite out of the burger. She turned around and thumped off into the home, with Rena following.

“You’re just in time for dinner!” Emma said.

“Dinner?” Rena asked. “Then what’s the burger?”

Emma looked at the burger in surprise, like she’d forgotten she was eating it. “A snack,” Emma said.

“That’s a snack?!” Rena asked, dumbfounded. “It’s bigger than my head!”

“And I weigh nine tons,” Emma countered.

“Fair point,” Rena said. “I guess I’m just used to a snack being a single granola bar, not something that would take me three days to finish.”

Emma laughed. “Welcome to the world of the hyper-massive, where your feasts are our light meals. Speaking of…”

Emma and Rena entered what was clearly the most important room in the house: the dining room. In the center of the room was a table stacked high with fatty food. Burgers, hot dogs, pizzas, and more, all at least as wide as Rena’s entire body. Sitting at the table, patiently waiting, were Lucy and Bailey, who were wearing the same outfit Emma was, just in their own sizes, and in red and blue, respectively.

“Good, you showed up,” Bailey said. “I haven’t had anything to eat in twenty minutes, and I’m starving!”

Rena sat down at the stop at the table that was set out for her, Emma having already rushed to her spot. Once Rena’s ass made contact with her comically over-sized chair, the other three started shoveling food into their mouths. Rena, meanwhile, looked somewhat intimidated by the huge pile of food on her plate.

And to think I’ll be eating this much every day, if not more! Rena thought. Shrugging, she grabbed a hot-dog and began eating. Said hot-dog was as long as her leg, and it took both hands at different points along the bun to keep it together. And she felt disgusting wolfing the entire thing down, but she remembered that this was nothing compared to how much she would be eating in the future. Rena managed to get down two more gigantic hot-dogs before throwing in the towel.

“I can’t eat anymore,” Rena groaned. “I’m completely stuffed.”

Emma paused for a minute to look at Rena. “I’m not surprised,” she said. “You ate three of our giant hot-dogs. If you can’t move, then just stay there and sleep.”

Rena nodded gratefully. She could already feel the sleeping inducing effects of her full belly, even if she was a bit overstuffed. Rena slumped down as far as she could into her chair and fell asleep.

131.content:
It is the year 1345 and a few years since rena was found by her mentor. She is 21 years old tigress with orange fur and black stripes like a tiger, sparkling green eyes, long red hair down to her shoulders, and a skinny figure with a flat chest and butt. She wanted to learn everything that she could, but her mentor barely taught her anything in magic. She knew that her mentor had a reason for not teaching her and she could accept that. Her master was her new family after she lost her parents when she was younger and her master was like her new mother waiting to teacher what she knew.

“When are you going to teach me how to do spells?” Rena had asked her master after completing her daily work.

“When I feel that you are ready to begin your magic lessons. Not before.” Her master said.

“You always say that.” She said with a huff.

“You always ask me the same question.” Her master said with smirk.

“When do you think I’m ready to start learning magic?” she asked her question again in a different way.

“Soon, but you need to trust me.” She said as rena nodded knowing that she must trust her.

“I trust you, but I want to be great like you.” Rena said as her master chuckled giving her a motherly hug.

“You might be better than me when I start teaching you.” She said and rena nodded again smiling.

“I’m just looking out for you.”

“I know.” Rena said returning the hug.

The two had dinner before rena was sent to bed for the night while her master was in her library reading her spell books.

~Rena knows I mean well and I see the potential in her, but she needs to grow more before I start teaching her.~ Her master thought as she was looking at the current spell book.

~Start with the basics before going into the heavy stuff.~ was added as an afterthought.

She spent a few more hours looking for spells to teach rena once she believed she was ready. She turned the lights out with a wave of her wand and she went to her room for a good night sleep. Rena was laying in her bed thinking about learning magic and what she could do with it.

“I know she wants me to trust her, but I feel that I’m ready to learn.” She said to herself.

“Maybe I should learn a spell that would make her proud of me.” She added encouraging herself before leaving her room for her master’s library.

With a plan in mind, rena opened the door of her room and looked around the hallway seeing if her master was waiting for her to try something. Seeing nothing or a trap waiting for her, she made her way to the library and opened the door.

The library is huge with large bookcases filled with books of spells her master have acquired over the number of years she was learning. There is a fireplace with dying embers meaning her master was here doing something.

~I wonder what she was doing in here. Maybe I can find a spell that will think I’m ready to start learning.~ Rena thought looking around before seeing an opened book on the pedestal. Walking over to the open book that has her curiosity, she noticed that the book was open to a certain page.

“Curse of the Titan’s Blessing?” Rena said looking at the page slightly confused.

133.content:
Rena wakes up one morning as if everything is normal. She walks to the bathroom to brush her teeth. Her tail sways back and forth as she walks. She has tiger striped fur all over and red hair that reaches down to her shoulders. Humming to herself she begins to brush her teeth. As she looks into the mirror she notices that they look sharper than usual, but just assumes she's seeing things because she's tired. However her eyes drift upward and widen at what she sees. There are two horns on her head. They aren't very long and curve slightly back. Rena lets out a scream and stumbles backward. "What the hell?!" she says aloud. Feeling the horns she confirms that they are real. She looks herself over and doesn't see anything else wrong with her body. Unknown to her though her teeth and claws are sharper than normal. After numerous attempts she realizes that she can't hide the horns. Trying to remain calm she racks her brain for a way to deal with this.

After ten minutes of pacing Rena decides to call Beth, her best friend. She calls Beth and about twenty minutes later there is a knock on the door. "Rena? Its me." Beth's voice says from the other side of the door. "Okay, I'm letting you in but don't freak out okay?" Rena tells her. "Freak out? Um, okay." Beth says a little confused. The door opens and Beth is quickly yanked inside before Rena slams it shut. Beth is a tabby cat girl with orange fur. She doesn't freak out at her friend's appearance but she is shocked. "Are those horns?" she asks slowly as she gets closer. "Yes! I just woke up and they were there! What do I do!?" Rena says. As she says this she has to bat away Beth, who is in the process of poking and feeling her horns. "You know, you look taller too." Beth says as she looks Rena over. Rena feels herself up and notices that her pajamas aren't as loose as they usually are. "Oh god your right! Whats going on?!" Beth just shrugs, which annoys her larger than normal friend. "Why are you so calm!? I'm in a crisis here!" Rena snaps. As she has this little outburst she feels herself getting larger, as well as her pajamas ripping.. Beth watches with her mouth open and circles her friend, checking her body. "Now I'm bigger! What's going on?" Rena exclaims while trying to calm down. "I don't know, but check your tail." Beth says. Rena feels her furry tail and finds that it is thicker than normal, even in proportion to her new size. Her horns are also a little longer, curving back further. She sits there in a slump while Beth thinks things over.

After a couple of minutes Beth speaks. "Okay, we don't know whats happening but I think we can agree that you need some new clothes. I'm gonna go get you something and then we can try and find out what's going on." Rena watches as her friend leaves and thanks the heavens that she is so reliable. While waiting for her to return she feels a sudden burst of anger at her situation. Why was this happening to her? What did she do to deserve this? Her thoughts are cast aside when Beth comes through the door. "I found some clothes you can wear." she says as she hands them to Rena. Its a simple outfit, just a shirt and some pants, but it looks pretty nice. She even brought big enough undergarments. "Where did you get these?" Rena inquires. "I bought them. You're lucky you didn't get too big, or you wouldn't even fit the plus sized women's clothes." Once she's dressed, Rena puts on a rather large hat that Beth brought to cover her horns. Now that she's ready to head out, where do they go?
133.title: The Transformation Begins

Beth and Rena leave Rena's apartment and head outside. "I guess we should go to a doctor and see if this is some kind of disease." Rena suggests. "Yeah," Beth agrees. "Unless its not a disease and its some kind of magical curse." She wiggles her fingers and speaks mysteriously when she says this. Rena chuckles and gives her a playful shove. Unfortunately she doesn't know her new strength and ends up knocking Beth five feet away. "Oh crap! I'm so sorry!" Rena says as she picks Beth up with one hand. "Its fine." Beth says as they walk down the street. While they head to a clinic Rena can feel the other people on the street staring at her. "Look at the bright side. At least you're getting some attention." Beth says. Rena just rolls her eyes and sighs.

When they reach the clinic they are surprised by what they see. There are two other girls there who have symptoms similar to Rena. There is a girl with pure white fur and blond hair who seems to have grown horns as well. The difference is that her horns point off to the sides and curve downwards. The other girl is a calico with black hair. Although she doesn't appear to have horns, she is constantly looking at her teeth in a hand mirror. They look very sharp, like Rena's. "Wow! Looks like this isn't just happening to you!" Beth says amazed. "Yeah..." Rena says. She's a little relieved to know she's not alone, but at the same time she's worried that her symptoms appear to be worse than the other girls. The white girl's horns aren't as long as hers and Rena's teeth are sharper than the calico's. Not to mention the fact that they're both normal sized and Rena is about seven feet tall.

Rena sits down and feels the chair straining to hold her. Again she feels a surge of frustration at her problem. Looking over she can see that the other two girls are pretty tense as well. When the doctor walks out all three of them converge on him. "You've got to help me! Its an emergency!" the white furred girl says. "Me too!" the calico chimes in. "Well look at me! I've got way more issues than them!" Rena says quite forcefully. The doctor's ears droop a little as the three girls ambush him and timidly ushers them into the examination room. He looks over the other two girls first before Rena. As he does so she folds her arms impatiently with a sour look on her face. When he gets to her she takes off her hat and lets her tail sway freely. "Whoa!" the calico exclaims. "Is that gonna happen to me too?" she says looking at Rena's thick tail. Meanwhile the other girl is staring at Rena's longer horns.

The doctor tells them to wait while he goes into another room. In the meantime the girls talk. The white girl's name is Abby and the other is Callie. "This is crazy right?" Abby sighs. "I know!" Callie agrees. "I wake up and see that my teeth are like razors! Although I guess I don't have it as bad as you guys. No offense." She adds the last part when Rena and Abby shoot her angry looks. "But seriously, look at you. I feel for you." Abby tells Rena. Rena sighs. "Thanks. I gotta say though this whole thing is just so frustrating." Callie nods. "I know what you mean. I've been tense all morning." As the three get to know each other the doctor returns. "Okay girls I'm sorry to say I can't really help you. However I've called some specialists who can. Just return to your homes and they'll call you when they arrive." He explains. How does Rena take this?

When Rena hears the doctor's instructions she feels a surge of anger. "What do you mean go home?! I'm eight feet tall and have horns on my head! I need help!" she yells. The doctor attempts to calm her down but the other girls jump in too. "Yeah! We don't know how long your specialists are gonna take! We're supposed to just ignore this until they show up?" Abby says. "In the time it takes, I could end up with horns too!" Callie adds. In the confusion Rena feels her body changing again. The familiar growing sensation returns and she feels herself getting bigger. This growth spurt is much more intense than the last. She gets bigger and bigger until her clothes tear off and she breaks through the roof of the one story clinic. Now she stands at twenty feet tall, looking down at the others below her. In addition to her growth, the other parts of her body changed as well. Her horns are longer and now curved all the way to the back of her head. Her tail was not only thick like a lizard's, but also pointed as well. Finally, as her body size increased, her bust size did as well. She had a rather nice rack before, but her latest spurt caused them to grow even bigger. Abby and Callie experienced some changes as well, but not nearly as drastic. Abby's horns became longer and sharper while small spikes sprouted down Callie's back and tail. They also grew, but only to about eight feet tall. Either Rena just got a head start, or whatever is happening is affecting her worse than the others.

Soon people begin to gather around and marvel at the giant lizard like cat. Rena feels a surge of embarrassment followed by a burst of anger. This combination of emotions causes her to simply take off. She runs in a random direction while trying to cover her naked form. With her giant size she manages to cover a lot of ground and manages to reach the edge of the town. She runs into the nearby woods and decides to hide there. While sitting in the forest she has nothing but her own thoughts to keep her occupied. Instead of feeling sad about her condition now she is just annoyed. Crying won't help her now that she's twenty feet tall. Leaning back she sighs and feels her horns. They're pretty hard and are longer than before. She looks over the rest of her body. From her huge boobs to her thick tail, she's becoming more like a lizard. Well, being this big she thinks she's more like a dragon. Rena crawls to a large cave nearby and enters. Curling up on the ground she falls asleep hoping she doesn't change any further. When she wakes up someone is there. Who is it?

Rena wakes from her sleep and sits up. After rubbing her eyes she notices two lumps near her on the ground. Looking closer she sees that its the two girls from the clinic, Abby and Callie. They're curled up on the ground sleeping, just like she was. They begin to stir and eventually wake up. As they stand up Rena notices that they're both bigger than the last time she saw them. Now they both stand at about ten feet tall. They're still only half as tall as her though. Abby yawns and stretches before noticing that Rena is awake. When they lock eyes Rena breaks the silence. "What are you two doing here?" she asks. "Well its like this.." she begins as Callie yawns. "After you ran off we tried to adjust like the doctor said. Unfortunately both of us got angry for one reason or another and got bigger. We found each other and then picked up on your scent. All we had to do was follow it here." Callie crawls closer and leans against Rena. "You're something else though." she points out. "You're bigger than us and look more like a dragon." Rena sighs as Callie points this out. "Why did come here though?" Rena asks. Callie and Abby look at each other and shrug. "We don't know, it just felt right since the three of us are in the same boat." Abby says. Rena feels better knowing that she's not going through this alone.

"So what should we do now?" Callie asks. The three of them are sitting on the cave floor in a circle. Rena feels a bit awkward being the biggest one. "I don't know." she answers. "We all kind of just freaked out and ran off." Abby nods. "Yeah, we should probably go and try to talk those experts the doctor mentioned." she suggests. "Yeah, and I should let my friend Beth know that I'm okay. She's probably worried about me." Rena adds. What happens?
133122.title: In This Together

1331221.content:
The three girls exit the cave and head toward the city. "First I'm going to find my friend." Rena says. "You guys don't have to come with me if you don't want to." Callie smiles with a flick of her tail. "Like I said, we're in this together. We'll follow you." she says. "Besides, it kind of feels like you're the leader. You are the biggest after all." Abby adds. "Thanks for reminding me." Rena grumbles. They near the city and their rumbling footsteps draw the attention of some people. Some stare in awe while others retreat to safety. Either way it makes Rena feel like a freak, which also makes her a little angry. Lately a lot of things make her angry. "Whats your problem?" she says in annoyance. All the little people scramble away at her outburst. Callie and Abby aren't as vocal but they also look a little annoyed.

Amidst the small crowd of people retreating one actually is heading for them. Rena immediately sees that its Beth. She crouches down to get a better look. "I guess the doctor couldn't help?" Beth says jokingly. Rena rolls her eyes and offers a paw for her to climb on. "How did you guess?" she asks sarcastically as her friend climbs aboard. "Call it a hunch." Beth says, then spots the other two dragoness cats. "Who are they?" Rena turns to her new friends and introduces them. "This is Callie and Abby. They've got the same thing I do, whatever the hell it is." she explains. "Nice to meet you." Abby tells Beth. "Same here." says Callie. "I see you're the biggest gal around." Beth notices as she compares the girls sizes. Rena again rolls her eyes. "Yeah, well we're on our way back to the doctor. He said there are some experts who can help us." she says. "Why did you leave the city?" Beth wonders. The three dragons blush a little. "We...kind of got mad and ran away." Callie admits. Beth smirks as they head to the doctor's office.

When they arrive they notice that the roof is broken. "What happened?" Beth ask. Rena gives her a look that says "As if you don't know." Beth giggles as they near the building. The doctor appears to be outside talking to a man in a dark suit. When the girls footsteps shake the ground they look up. "Sorry we took off like that." Abby apologizes. "Yeah, but whats with all these guys? I thought you said the experts wouldn't be here until tomorrow." Rena asks, noticing the men surrounding the building. They appear to be some kind of military group. The man in the suit answers her question. "Well, when we learned about your "outburst" we rushed over." he says. The three dragons are getting a little nervous about the men surrounding them. "Whats with the army guys?" Callie asks. "Don't mind them, just come with us. Believe it or not this is happening to girls in a number of places. We've already responded to some reports so we know what we're doing." Beth and Rena share a worried look. "This doesn't feel right." Callie whispers. Rena and Abby nod in agreement. What happens next?
1331221.title: Trouble Brewing

13312212.content:
The men begin to surround Rena and her friends with their weapons raised. "Just come with us ladies." one of them says. "Are you kidding me? We want help and you just want to lock us up?" Rena says angrily. Callie and Abby are also getting mad and it definitely starts to show. "Back off!" Callie shouts and hisses at them. Abby has started to growl, and soon enough all three of them each let out a dragon like roar. Rena then pauses and looks as if she's struggling. Then a pair of leathery wings begin to sprout out of her back. Callie and Abby have both sprouted white wings as well. The men surrounding them raise their weapons defensively as the dragon girls inspect their new wings. They look at each other and decide to try something in the heat of the moment. With some effort they manage to get their wings moving and take off into the sky. Everyone begins shooting but the bullets don't really hurt them that much. Rena makes sure to shield Beth as they fly away into the distance.

The three of them rise higher and higher in an attempt to make distance. They wobble to and fro, still not used to flying, but manage to stay air born. "Where are we going?" Abby shouts to Rena. "I don't know!" she says. "I just wanted to get away from there!" They fly for what seems forever before lowering down toward the ground. They touch down in a forest and rest for a couple of hours. "Well this has turned into a weird day." Beth says. "I'm so sorry for getting you mixed up in this." Rena tells her. Beth pats Rena's big foot. "Don't worry about it, friends stick together." she says. "Yeah!" Callie and Abby both say. Seems like they're fugitives now.

They explore the woods to try and see where they are and come across something. "Come here!" Callie whispers. They all keep hidden and look to see a huge wall with turrets mounted on it. "Whats going on here?" Beth wonders when they see a big truck drive to the gate. Attached to it is a huge cage on wheels containing another dragon girl. She's a tabby with orange fur with black stripes. She's a little bigger than Callie and Abby with horns resembling a steer's. She's restrained and looks pretty sad. Past the gate they also see another girl with gray fur with three horns, like a triceratops. She's about the same size and even has wings. She's in chains and her wings are tethered to the ground. Rena and her fellow fugitives feel a burst of anger once again. "This is what they want to do to us!" Rena says through clenched teeth. "We have to help them!" No one argues so the rescue is initiated.
13312212.title: To The Skies

135.content:
Circus Freak - Rena has a rare medical condition that causes her to never stop growing, and is an exhibit in a sideshow, known as Rena the Amazon. Already at nine feet and ten inches, she continually grows taller every day. A doctor approaches her with what he believes is a cure for her condition, but instead it accelerates her growth tenfold!

Supersized Science - Rena is a lab assistant to a brilliant scientist working on a growth ray. When the machine malfunctions, Rena is caught in the blast, causing her to grow to titanic size.
135.title: More Storylines

choices: Be Careful What You Wish For...
1353.content:
Be Careful What You Wish For... - Rena makes a wish upon a star, genie, etc. to become bigger. She gets her wish...but ends up growing taller as well as curvier due to being a little careless with her wish's wording.

The Encounter with a Goddess. - Rena is minding her own business when she bumps into a woman who turns out to be a goddess. Taking pity on Rena, the goddess bestows her with the power to grow however big she wants. The more kind deeds she performs, the bigger she can become. But every unkind deed she does reduces her maximum size as a penalty. Good thing Rena is naturally a relatively kind catgirl even if life hasn't been so kind to her.
1353.title: More

13533.content: In this option, Rena was living on a specific island that was being used for atomic bomb testing. Somehow the bomb went off on the island, and it killed and destroyed everything on the island. They were no survivors other then Rena, but some how, Rena is now seen as a 200ft kaiju catgirl, who is hell bent on the destruction of the world. Here, she is the Godzilla version of Rena. She is known as Renazilla, a terrible creature that now roams our Earth, causing death and destruction wherever she goes. She can fire an atomic breath from her mouth, and can roar like a monster. Nothing can stop Renazilla, not even the military weapons can do it.
13533.title: Renazilla?

135331.content:
The day happened harmlessly for Rena, Rena smiled and then she let out a yawn. She looked out and saw that her garden was growing rather nicely. She saw wildflowers growing high enough to reach past her head and sniffed one. She saw several birds fly up into the sky and exotic fish swimming in the water underneath her deck. Rena climbed up and reached up to pick a pineapple to eat it. "Everything is wonderful," she said to herself. "This island is paradise."

That's what Rena thought but what she didn't know, nor did anything else on the island know that the military was practicing with atomic weapons. There was a submarine nearby and inside the general was looking at the pilot. "We have our heading General Bader," said the pilot. "The island is in site." The general gave a glare and looks out to the island as another soldier comes forward. "Sir," he said. "I seriously think we should be reconsidering this. These bombs are still in the testing phase." "What do you think we're doing here?" asked General Bader. "Fire the first bomb.

The pilot nodded his head but then he realized something as he zoomed in to see Rena feeding several birds. "Wait a minute General," he said. "I think there's somebody living on the island." The pilot showed an image of Rena and the general looked at the neko on screen. "Who is that?" he asked. "An escapee from our genetic weapons division. Blast the island." "But general," said the pilot. "General, she's a living thing." "She's a freak. Fire away!"

"Y-Yes sir," said the pilot. "I understand." The pilot gulps and then pressed the button to launch a torpedo that went through the water at high speed and released atomic energy. The general watched as the torpedo's energy caused several sharks to go belly up and then the torpedo started to surface as it closed in. Rena got up and heard the sound as she let out a grunt.

The cat girl climbed up a tree and then looked out to see the missile closing in. Before she can react, the bomb struck the island and made it go up in a mushroom cloud. As the smoke and fire cleared up, what was once a tropical paradise has been transformed into a burnt up wasteland, all the birds and fish were dead and Rena was laying down motionless. She was holding her chest in pain as fallout came down from the air.

Rena coughed and struggled to get up, she had no idea how she survived such a terrible fate and even coughed up what looked like green vomit. However as Rena felt her shoulder, she learned that she was bleeding the same green liquid. She opened her eyes and they flashed yellow as she let out a grunt. That's when her muscles begin to bulged out and she let out a frantic meow as her fangs grew sharper.

General Bader and his men homed in on the destroyed island and the pilot looked on in surprise. "General," said the pilot. "It's that cat girl. She somehow survived the bombing." "So the bomb didn't quite work." Said the general in disappointment. "And I'm afraid there's more bad news." Said a technician.

Something was coming over Rena. First she started to grow spikes down her back and a large hump on her neck. Then she lost patches of her fur as she held out her hands and then her claws extended and she sprouted a second set from the knuckles on each of her hands. She sprouted a lizard like spin on her back and then she started to grow.

"No!" yelled General Bader as he looked on. "This isn't possible. This kind of anomaly shouldn't be happening in real life. However, the anomaly was happening and Rena kept on growing until she was 200ft tall. Rena let out a loud roar and then breathed out atomic fire. She then walked out into the water and saw the submarine. "Destroy her!" yelled the general.

The sub shot all the torpedoes it could but they explosions didn't even dent Rena's new body. Rena instead dove into the water, grabbed the sub with her mouth and crushed it between her jaws. The sub blew up and the crew perished. But now Rena was mad at the world and out for destruction. Where does she start?
135331.title: Renazilla Arise

choices: The military arrives to stop her
1353312.content:
We now go to a famous city in the world that is known as Tokyo. It is home to many great people, tons of commercial stuff that would make the most dedicated person of history, and a language that pretty much many of us people have no idea what the hell it is? (Sorry to be offensive, but we really don’t have a clue what it is)? It is like the Japan or Asian version of New York City, as it is tons of vehicles, people, trains, buildings, and the metro life here is truly epic. It is like nothing we have ever seen before.

Right now, we see a few young boys and a girl, playing a game of catch with a ball, on a beach near the ocean. The shortest one was going after the ball, and then suddenly… the ground just rumbles like an earthquake, knocking everyone down. The rumble in the ground only lasted about a few second before it stopped. The boys were knocked to the ground, but they got back up. They were getting questionable about what they notice happened. “What just happened?” a young girl asked the boy. “I don’t know.” “Is there another giant monster attack; that will really…” said by the oldest boy in the group, before the ground rumbles again. They were knocked out again, but now they are screaming in fear, and then a girl then looks out into the ocean. “Oh my, look at that?”

Suddenly, a water pillar explodes, and then suddenly awakening from the oceans is Renazilla. The catgirl is now a 200ft monster, and it has just reached Japan. She is roaring and stomping just as she walks towards the city? Everyone on the beach was running for their lives, screaming in fear, all… except the girl.

“So it is true, there is a giant monster in the ocean. It’s over.” The girl said, just as she accepts her fate. When Renazilla reaches on shores, she was stomped. The once great city, is about to go to hell!
1353312.title: A Rip Off Scene Of The Godzilla Movie

135332.content: Option A: A deal with the death. It was an ordinary day for Rena, got up, ate breakfast, drove to work. It was the shear ordinariness that made what happened next such a shock. While driving to work, she heard a text message. Grabbing her phone she looked down at it for only a second barley reading it... However it was enough. When she looked up, she was about to crash into someone. She swerved out of the way and crashed into a fire hydrant. Her seat belt broke off and she flew forward into her airbag. Somehow she managed to survive the impact... But the airbag malfunctioned and didn't retract properly. The same piece of equipment that had saved her life was now strangling her. As she gasped for breath and the world went dark she screamed in anger in her mind at the unfairness of it all. It was so unfair... However it seemed death agreed. It offered her the deal, that she would be able to return to the mortal world on the exception that she does so as a giantess and takes five lives in order to save her own. Not thinking of the lives she was agreeing to end, she took the deal instantly. However as she woke up she began to wonder, could she really kill five people to save herself?
135332.title: A deal with death?

choices: Revenge is a dish best served CRUSHED (Vengeance)
1353321.content:
As she woke, she looked to her right to see her clock. She was back in her bed in the morning, before the accident. She wondered if it was all a strange dream.
Her wonders were confirmed when she saw the mysterious cloaked figure known as Death at her left, nearly giving her a heart attack. “For every soul you take” Death spoke, “your maximum height increases tenfold. For now, you can expand to 50ft. and shrink back to your normal height. If you attain a soul, it shall be 500ft. and so on and so on. If you managed to attain five souls, you can still take more souls and increase your maximum height. But be warned if you fail to claim a soul by the Witching Hour of every day, you will lose one soul along with the increased height. And if you don't have souls by the next Witching hour, your life is forfeited.” The celestial being then faded away.
Rena began to contemplate on her situation. Could she really take away five souls just to save her own. She knew if she didn’t, she would die instead. And if she did, she’d be ending innocent lives. What to do, what to do?
1353321.title: A deal with death.

1353322.content:
Rena is a 21 year old catgirl with orange fur and black stripes like a tiger. She has sparkling green eyes, long red hair down to her shoulders, with a skinny figure with a flat chest and butt (but that's soon to change )


Rena was hiking through a thick jungle Amazon like Forest. She couldn't believe she got duped by her college professor into venturing this trek without the group just because he was lazy.


Rena had wondered into a lush section but didn't seem to notice the lack of wild life as she approached a clearing with a lake. The clearing was obscured and given cover by both several of the biggest trees imaginable as well as a mysterious Misty fog.

Rena hadn't noticed a very old decaying sign covered in moss with some kind of ancient text on it.
She also paid little noticed to the fact the lake was devoid of all life but also that the plant life nearest the lake as she approached was larger than it should be. In fact not just large huge.


She passed a few roses that were as tall or taller than her then some mushrooms 3 times her size. A virtual scene out of Alice In Wonderland. Finally she was at the lakes edge. She sat her stuff down exhausted and thirsty. Rena couldn't resist. The lake gave off a shiny mysterious glowing aura. She cupped her hands together and drank a few handfuls.

Rena couldn't believe the taste. Was this really water? It had a fruity minty crisp taste yet it was subtle and still had the consistency of water. As she sat on the shore staring at the lake she sampled. She was too mesmerized to notice her fatigue and hunger fade.


Her cuts and bruises started to heal yet she starred at the lake captivated. It seemed to be beckoning her the urge getting stronger and stronger. Her cat ears flicked. She realized she was dirty and sweaty. An idea popped into her head. She have a look around and a listen. Fully convinced no intelligent life was anywhere nearby she stripped all her clothing off. She looked at her surroundings and spotted the mushrooms.

"Wow this jungle is strange! At least there's a food source too" she said walking over to the giant shroom. She looked in awe. It had to be at least 16 feet tall the ones on either side slightly taller.

She reached forward dug in with both hands and broke off a size able piece to her at least at her size. She took a bite and walked back over to the lake. She didn't notice the spot she took from the mushroom grow back or the 3 mushrooms grow taller. As she walked back to the lake she felt odd but it soon passed.


She looked at her reflection. Something seemed off. She looked bigger?! Nah it couldn't be!

"I feel like Alice In Wonderland" she said. Then she ate the baseball sized piece of mushroom till it was gone.


"Of course even Alice wasn't this flat" she lamented looking at her reflection then putting her fingers her bug bite size nipples. "I swear without these I'd think I didn't have a chest area at all"


Finally she decided to make her way into the lake. She stopped once the water was waist high and sat down again a cool rock. She splashed some water over herself. She didn't notice as her fur seemed to vanish off her chest or hair disappear of her legs arms and neither parts. She was looking slightly more human but retained her cat ears and tail.

In fact she rubbed her orange tail with black stripes clean.

"Huh that's weird my tail feels longer? Thicker? ... Heavier?! "

Just then she started to feel strange again. Her eyes widened as her chest tingle then 2 mounds started to form under her nipples which now hardened and were normal size. She watched before her eyes as a pair of breasts formed then became A Cup , B Cup and stopped at mid C cups.

Not only had her dream come true but they were the perfect size to her. Luckily they weren't going to grow in cup size but had she not been preoccupied by her breasts she'd notice her body was growing the water from the lake seemingly being absorbed into her body. Her growth spurt left her at 10 feet tall as it stopped.
1353322.title: Give me MOAAAAR OPTIONS!

13533222.content:
Spell Mispeaken (intended misspelling)

Be it in modern times or some other time period, Rena gets her hands on a spell book, and tired of being being kind of short, lanky, flat chested, and basically small, Rena finds a spell to make her bigger. Still, being an amateur spell caster, Rena forgets a key component, that she has to apply a finish spell when she reached a size she liked.
13533222.title: Some other story line

135332222.content:
Power of Dragons

Rena, through whatever means the author chooses, discovers that she is the subject of a prophecy. While dragons are believed to be mythological, the truth is there are only ten dragons, immortal spirits that inhabit the bodies of animals and other creatures. For millenia the dragon spirits have been just floating aimlessly through the world, possessing things as they see fit. Rena's destiny is to collect the spirits, all ten, into her own body. This doesn't sound to bad at first, because a side benefit is that she'll gain elemental powers like control over Fire, Earth, and the such.

The disadvantage is, of course, that to contain all this mystical power and to use it her body will have to grow to mythological size. Also, if the author see's fit, this could also be a bit of a transformation thread as Rena, being influenced by the dragon spirits, becomes part dragon herself.

So, the prophecy will be fulfilled, but how big will Rena get. And, will she be the choosen one to stop evil, or be evil's tool for dominating/destroying the world
135332222.title: Another Storyline

1353322222.content:
Okay, here is the looney premise for this one. Rena was just an ordinary cat girl going to college to become a scientist. One day, she was making a invention that would allow her to travel across the world in seconds call the Instant Teleporter, and what ends up happening is an accident causes her to be teleported to somewhere, but not what she suspects. She sees tiny people and the tiny people sees her as a cat girl, and then she realizes that she has been transported to Littleput. Perhaps you will know how this one ends, based on your choices.

Want to teleport Rena to Littleput?

Rena's teleportation machine malfunctions
She's teleported to some woods but 2 feet taller.
What's worse is apparently the molecule reassembly process keeps reoccurring.
In short her teleporter is now akin to a growth ray and Rena keeps getting bigger and bigger and bigger.

Pick a storyline

Cleavage Cat - Rena gains superpowers, as well as a pair of double Z breasts. What does she do with these newfound powers? Become a superhero of course!

Malpractice- Rena goes into the doctor for a flu shot, but ends up getting an experimental breast enlargement formula instead, causing her to swell and lactate.

But the ring is in the possession of a powerful wizard, who has placed a curse upon it. Rena must return the ring or else her breasts will continue to expand indefinitely.
14.title: Breast Expansion

choices: Rena- Sexy Nerdy Superhero Cleavage Cat...
Rena- Glorious Subject Of The American People...
Rena- Busty And Beautyfull Villainess Extraordinare...
142.content:
Like with any great superhero in fictional material, a good origin is key to the character. It is what defines them as a person and what makes them tick. And like those men and women of fiction, our heroine Rena Westfall must have a tale of her own. One where she will find her goal to push toward. But since there is more then one writer for Rena's adventures, it's only fair that there should be more then one tale to tell. So, I decided instead of one, we should have three different origin tales for three different Renas.

Option One:
Rena is your average nerd. Good grades in collage, knowledge like a dictionary, and can talk for hours about how Deathstroke will always beat Deadpool or how Hulk could crush Superman any day of the week. Rena is also an avid collector of comic books, both Marvel, DC and a few rare titles. She loves superhero fiction the most out of all her different collections, and she has a secret wish that she would love to become a superhero herself, more than anything. But this is easier then she would think because in her world, super heroes and villains are real things, fighting crime or stealing jewels around the city as we speak. So as what might start as a normal day for Rena will become extremely abnormal as fate conspires to turn the nerdy, glasses-wearing cat-girl into a ultra-sexy super hero force of justice.

Option Two:
One of the greatest parts of writing is creating something that isn't just similar to norm. So in this story, the year is 2634, and America is a very different place. In this timeline, America is a fascist state. Everything from education to religion to how many children that are born is controlled by the Countrymen, a group of lords that live in the tower of heaven, which rises far into the atmosphere. The cities are split into two parts, with the rich and powerful men and women living on sky islands in total luxury, with robot servants and massive homes. The workers however, live in far poorer homes on the land, often cramped and badly made, pushing themselves just to get the required money to live. Gangs are rife and law is rare. Rena is lucky, having found work in the more dangerous genetic factories, getting to live in one of the better areas. However one day when Rena is caught in an accident with a female enhancement product and military chemicals that mix up her DNA. Rather then try to have the incident covered up, she is given better living conditions for her and her family in exchange for her taking care of the other mutants that are common in the city. But Rena is a kind person at heart, and she will always try to help if she can. Can she change the city of America into a better place, or will she become another pawn of the state?

Option Three:
The furthest from the original, in the year 2240, the water city of Elysian is one of the most advanced cities in the world, fitting a population of the worlds best and brightest citizens in luxury as they work for the betterment of humanity. Often a target of bullying as a child, here Rena is a cynical scientist that specialises in genetic engineering in order to speed up the evolution of humans in one of the most advanced science areas on earth. This has allowed her to find a way to enhance the human form to superhuman abilities. However, after having her funding cut for lack of results, she uses a prototype superhuman injection on herself to get back at the bumbling baboons in the higher office that are destroying her hard work. However, a genetic impurity in the injection causes her breasts to swell to a massive size. Becoming the super villain "Black Bosom", she is determined to get what she thinks she deserves from this city. Will she continue her super villainous ways to get what she wants no matter what, or will she find that she doesn't have the heart of be a selfish villain for to long?

And for all of those who want to read the original Cleavage Cat by Faceless One and System_Crash, use this link.

:http://www.furaffinity.net/view/4318103

Membership is required for some of the chapters.
142.title: Cleavage Cat Origins.

1421.content:
Fairtropolis, California. What could you say about it? It was an expansive city, larger than NYC, split into multiple districts according to their primary businesses. There was the industrial district, which was mainly factories, steel mills, power plants, etc. The entertainment district, comprised of theaters, both movie and stage, restaurants, sporting arenas and the like. There was also the business district, made up mostly of banks, corporate offices, and other such things. Lastly, there was the residential district , where the majority of the city's population lived. It was made up of homes, apartments, some of which were in better neighbourhoods than others.

It was certainly a nice place to visit, but not many would choose to live there. For you see, just like any other city, Fairtropolis had it's fair share of crime. There were gangs infesting the poorer neighbourhoods, the local mafia running prostitution and extortion rackets, and a number of other problems. But it wasn't all bad, thanks to the Union of Heroes, a global organization of superpowered beings dedicated to protecting the innocent and punishing evildoers.

In a quaint little home in this not so quaint city lived Rena Westfall, your typical average nerd. Graduated from the University of California at the top of her class, made the honor roll throughout grade school, and a master of anything electronic. You're probably thinking she must be a doctor, or some sort of scientist. But you would be wrong. For you see, Rena may have been a genius, and could easily have landed some high paying job in a lab or university, but instead, after she graduated, she choose to forsake all that in favor of working in a comic book store.

Why would someone with Rena's intellect work in a comic shop? There were a few reasons, actually. You see, Rena had always been a bit of a tomboy. Ever since she learned to read, Rena loved comics of all kinds. Newspaper comics, horror, mystery, adventure, but by far her favorite was superheros. She even had an entire room in her home that was used solely to store her comic collection and various collectibles she had acquired. If you were to ask her which comic company she preferred, she wouldn't be able to choose. Marvel, DC, Dark Horse, it didn't matter to her, as long as they told a good story.

Another reason was that her boss, Dexter Reed, the owner of the shop, had been good friends with her in school. He was a tall, thin man with short, curly blonde hair and glasses. Rena had just graduated college, and they ran into each other for the first time in years at a coffee shop. After Dexter had told her he now owned a comic shop, and had an opening available, Rena leaped at the chance, and accepted the job. The third reason Rena choose to stay at the shop was because she was a friend, and a great employee, Dexter gave her quite a considerable discount off anything in the store.

The day started out like any other for Rena. She woke up, ate breakfast, took a shower, and prepared for another day at the shop. She wore a plain green sweater, glasses, jeans and white sneakers. She didn't own a car, so she had to ride her bike to work everyday. After locking her bike to a streetlight in front of the shop, she stepped inside and took in a deep breath, inhaling the wonderful smell of new comics. The shelves of the store were lined with various comic books, posters, action figures, trading cards, basically a nerd's paradise. Behind the counter stood Dexter, a warm smile on his face. "Hello Rena." Rena walked up to Dexter and gave him a hug.

"Hi Dex. Anything new today?"

"Nope, nothing today. Hey, did you see the news last night?"

"No, why?"

"Professor Heinous tried to steal all the uranium from the power plant, but Valkyrie stopped him. They broadcast the entire battle on the news."

14213.title: Abduction

1423.content:
Elysian.

The pinnacle city the press called it. One of the greatest human creations of the 23rd century, it was a city the size of Wales that sailed across earths vast ocean and was teaming with incredible technological marvels, created for the purpose of the scientific advancement and the evolution of humanity. Elysian was the brain child of Multimillionaire and business owner Matthew Clay, a massive vessel with a population of 175,000 of the world’s top scientific minds, their families and the massive 2,000,000 strong work force. Rather than being built on a colony world like so many other science outposts, Elysian was made as a massive floating artificial island in the Pacific ocean of earth, both to keep it close to home, and use it as the symbol of Earth’s scientific developments.

While technically a state of America, Elysian is entirely self-ruled and self-reliant. Shaped like a sword and being held inside a massive dome, the city itself consists of three circular layers going outwards on the surface and a single scarcely populated layer layer beneath the other three that remains below the water line. The central and smallest layer is Amoria, right in the middle, where the most powerful businessmen and women live in complete comfort with a constant supply of good foods, fine wines and other rich things. But it doesn't stop there. The buildings here are said to look like they were made for gods. Massive mansions and villas that have been specially made for the owners, colored white and gold to keep the land looking pure with the sky behind it. Along with the homes here are large rolling green plains and calm sunny beaches, all placed on one single disc, kept aloft from the land below by eight truly massive pillars that spring out from the centre, and with the dome stopping around the edge of the layer to give the rich access to the sky. The people here live in harmony, kept comfortable by thousands of robotic servants that cook and clean everything with the help of C.R.O.N.U.S, the master A.I, in charge of all the systems that would be too difficult and costly to be handled by normal people. It is also one of the most secure places on earth, partly because of the powerful guests, but mostly because of sheer amount of secret data, documents and technology that are kept within the walls. This is because along with C.R.O.N.U.S, the Amoria layer contains all of the information gathered in the different fields of Elysian, years of research condensed into a single mass server, located in the absolute heart of the city. The server is a lucrative goldmine for those of ill intent, with the data located in that drive being worth millions to the right people.

The second layer, Eronia, is the business layer, where the less wealthy or important people work for long hours in hundreds of difference scientific fields, each trying to master its own skills until they have complete control and understanding over it. Unlike the first layer, and due to Eronia’s pure focus on work, this layer consists purely of grey factories on the outer circle and giant glass skyscrapers on the inner circle, many of which are actually tall enough to touch the fake sky from the roof. The area is not entirely dedicated to work however. Many building have their own lunch rooms in wide open garden areas with lush grass and trees, and the streets themselves hold many small shops for people to purchase items or order takeout. This is not all that the Eronia layer has in terms of comfort, but the other leisure’s are not worthy of note.

The third layer, Belierin, also has little of note. This is the home sector, where the people of Elysian return to their families after long days of hard labor. This is where the majority of homes are located, kept away from the eyesores such as factories or skyscrapers. Even though this layer is not nearly as important as the others, it is obvious that much time and effort was invested into making it. Almost all the buildings here are the utmost in home life, with the building being spacious, warm and having access on call to any leisure such as film, games, exercise equipment etc. For those with a lower pay grade, Elysian still has millions of lower quality houses that are still well beyond the standard of modern living, and still include many luxuries. Outside of housing, this layer is also dotted with many public sector buildings, such as swimming baths or zoos, and contains many other fun activities such as amusement parks or theaters, places of enjoyment for the many residents.

Apart from these 3 surface layers, there is only one more area worthy of note. Thalasia is the very last layer, underneath all of the fancy surface layers and always below the water line, it is what keeps the vast city afloat through stormy weather or frozen waters, and it suffers for it. Unlike the rest of the city above, Thalasia does not prosper from advanced scientific knowledge or a heavy technological influence. Rather, it is a mess of pipe works and rickety walkways, only meant for occasional visits and not an actual living space. There is no sunlight down there, only red lights that serve only illuminate the grime and not to help you feel at home. The people here are tough, alone, and often here illegally. This layer is the center of almost all crime in the city, and is impossible to purge without irreparable damage to the city above it.

But even though Elysian’s crime is rampant, that is not what the city is known for. And even though the city has technological marvels that surpass even the most fertile imagination, that is not what the city is known for either. Despite attempts from the government to keep it out of spotlight, the Eronia layer does hold one more building that many living in the city would view as by far the most important. A single building known as Anora; Heroes Palace, as some call it. Anora is the most recent addition to the city, a massive Pyramid shaped glass building, placed near the tip of the sword like vessel, connected by vast monorails to all parts of the city. It is here that the Legion of Guardians reside, a publicly funded organisation dedicated to helping the people of Elysian survive against the criminals and villains that reside within the cities walls. But unlike a conventional police force (which they still have), the Legion does not consist of normal men and women. Rather, the people in the Legion are people who go above and beyond. They are the Super Heroes of the city, Champions of Justice and Defenders of the Weak. They are the best of the best, each with their own unique Super Powers and unique abilities, ready to be used whenever they are needed.

And despite what the press might say, they are very much needed.

Because, for all of Elysian’s technological advancement and biological mastery, human nature still tries to erode the foundation of this so called perfect city. Just as a hammer can be used as a tool of creation, it does not take much to take that tool and turn it into a weapon. And this is all too common in Elysian. Since its creation 30 years ago, there have been those who have tried to take Elysian’s hard work and turn it into a tool of profit or revenge.

For every super hero in the city, there is a villain to counter them, someone who wants to turn the city on its head for personal gain. Some are former scientists of the city, angry at how they are treated despite their hard work. Others are crime bosses, dedicated to turning the city into their own personal playground. And some people are just rotten to begin with, hating perfection and wanting nothing more than to tear it all down and make sure it can never start again.

But overtime, this has now become all too common place, and the people no longer bat an eye as the next villain declares he will make Elysian his kingdom, nor when the next hero enters the fray promising to serve the city and protect the city. People have grown passive to the fighting, just as the heroes and villains have become passive to each other, leaving the city all but unprepared for what would happen when one woman decides she has just had enough.
