(This chapter was so long, I had to split it into multiple parts.)

Navato; an interesting planet in an otherwise unknown and unexplored universe where the local population has yet to develop their technology to the point of even understanding such things as planets, solar systems, and galaxies. A planet still in a medieval era, with some successful experiments in steam-powered machines and Roman-esque use of indoor plumbing (which led to more sanitized culture compared to the Middle Ages in our world), it is also notable for many advances in the art of magic, which compensated for and at times even encouraged it's technological progress. However, only people living near kingdom and castle towns, particularly the wealthy, the intellectual, or the royal have any real access to it on a daily basis.

Perhaps even more fascinating than its technological phrase combined with its use of magic is the fact that Navato appears to be a planet with only one gigantic land mass on one side of its surface (or so it is believed; there very well could be one or more continents on the other side but sailing has yet to developed to the point where the truth could be discovered without the voyage becoming a suicide mission...), an almost diamond-shaped land mass ranging from a world of deserts near the southern tip to a land of ice and snow at the northern tip. Known commonly as Onlon to the populace, it is the home of four sentient races.Living at the western tip is a large and vast kingdom of humans. Intentionally responsible for most of the technological and magical progress up to this point in time, they live more or less how humans are expected to act; a race sometimes cruel and sometimes merciful that is kept in check by a system of rule and law, with a few truly good souls if one looks hard enough. Their territory is mostly comprised of fields and meadows, along with a few mountains and streams here and there for abundant natural resources, and since they had the proper knowledge of crop rotation and farming techniques, it has become a successful agriculture force. Steam has been discovered for a still continuing exploration of its practical applications, though it will be a few years before the next technological leap can be made, at least one that could benefit the populace at large.Living at the Northern tip are the half-humans known as the Cranis; while the animal does not exist in this world, they are comparable to what we know in ours as dogs, in that their own kind has many races based on our breeds, short-haired varieties living in the warmer climates of their territories while thicker, longer-haired breeds are able to live in the cold mountains and tundra in the far north. While only a small area of the land is suitable for growing crops, and the land is covered with a strange grass that, while harmless for humans and half-humans alike, is actually poisonous to many farm animals and thankfully cannot grow in the other three regions. However, the Cranis have enjoyed a long and very successful alliance with the humans since before recorded history; as such, the Cranis often trade their even more abundant raw materials in exchange for additional crops and technological advances.The temperance of the Cranis is varied among their breeds and, while having exceptions, can usually be categorized by using having set characteristics depending on the breed of Cranis, the hybrids being the most unpredictable. As one might expect, pit bulls, Dobermans, and other fighting dogs are the more aggressive, usually either working in the kingdom military or simply becoming barbarians in their own right while more docile breeds like poodles, basset hounds, and golden retrievers are more concentrated in towns and cities. Due to the harsh weather at the eastern tip, their kingdom castle is actually in the center of their territory, though there is at least one lord castle in the eastern mountains offering safe refuge to the cold and lost...as long as they are either humans or Cranis, that is.In the eastern tip are the Falin, half-humans that again, while the animal does not exist on this world, could be comparable to cats in ours; the usual shorter "house cats" or domesticated breeds usually (but not always) being the members of the ruling and nobility classes while the taller and stronger "big cats" races tend to form the military and lower classes, though the merchant middle class is mostly mixed evenly of the two. Like the Cranis, both main races have many breeds, though because of the complex nature of the feline psyche, there are no cut and dry characteristics that can be attributed to their kind, though the big cats are known to be slightly more aggressive at times.The Falin live in a world of mostly forests, the northern parts mostly of redwood and evergreens while the southern and middle have the kind of trees one would expect in the North American and European continents in our world.

They do have farming techniques, mostly taken from observing the humans and Cranis, which, when combined with their fruit tree harvesting and their vast fish resources out at sea, make for a balanced diet among most of their kind. Their technological progress, however, is stunned due to the fact that the Cranis and Falin have been at odds with each other since ancient times. Wars have been fought and many more countless battles and while the two try to stay away from each other in recent times, it is not unlikely for Cranis thieves and barbarians to raid any of the Falin settlements bordering their territory. Due to their alliance with the Cranis, the humans are also very distrustful of the Falin, which is unfortunate since the Falin are a peace-loving race and probably would have gotten along with the humans otherwise.To the south are the Restros, the only half-human race that actually have animals based on their own kind; reptiles. The Restros themselves are a mixture of many different reptile species bundled into one sentient package: the jaws and teeth of alligators and crocodiles, long tails like snakes with a prehensile ability to strike against foes from behind them and even squeeze the life out of them if needed, and many characteristics of various lizards, including soft, smooth scales of various colors depending on heritage. Due to their slit snake eyes and scales, they have been persecuted by the humans for centauries and the Cranis are not very fond of them either. While it was at first an alliance of necessity at the beginning, the Restros and Falin have forged deep and friendly ties with each other in order to counteract the threat of human/Cranis dominance. And if nothing else, they can be united by their mutual love of sunbathing.While the Restros are actually warm-blooded, they do feel more energetic and active in warmer climates, which is why they have chosen to live in the southern tip of the world continent.


The northern reaches of their territory are filled with tropical rainforests while the rest of the area are deserts that, thankfully, are filled with many streams that provide live-preserving water; the Restros have such respect for their streams that they do not allow any boats to travel on them save for their royalty, though they do build roads to border them for the sake of travelers. Their towns are, predictably, built near springs, larger rivers, and the occasional oasis, their kingdom castle town built near the largest and most spectacular oasis of all. Their most treasured resource are heat stones, crystals that can actually absorb the sun's rays and store them until nightfall, where the temperature drops due to the nature of sand. With the heat stones, they can keep their houses warm at night and even use them to keep a steady fire going when traveling in the dessert; as long as they are in the presence of constant heat, they can be used for warmth later. Humans and Cranis have attempted to steal them but with little luck, as so far they are only willing to trade or sell heat stones to their Falin allies, who are quite fond of them as well.Thus, our story begins in one of the northern-west most Falin settlements, a small town that does not have a population more than a hundred and the nearest city is at least five miles away. Founded in a small clearing that is suitable for growing crops, raising animals, and harvesting fruits and mushrooms in the surrounding forests, it is a small community that, due to its lack of economic growth, is actually not taxed by the kingdom; instead, all the kingdom demands from them is that in times of war they send their men to fight while their women and older children would help tend to the sick and wounded; in exchange, the kingdom promises the safety of their younger children and offspring during trying times. It's not an exceptional life but it is an honest one, everyone having at least the basics of education such as reading and writing, simple mathematics and what is common knowledge about the world at large.

They even have a large heat stone in the center of their town and a small church where they can freely worship the beloved patron deity of the Falin, the great Gatoros. It is here that we find a young peasant woman, Rena Yaben, who works with her family in whatever way she can to help. Fairly young and still a bit underdeveloped, Rena helps by tending to the chickens, watering and gathering crops from the fields and plants from the forest, and looking after her younger brother and sister. Most would consider this a rather dull existence but Rena loved it, her parents kind and gentle and neighbors friendly, being able to live near the outdoors with the fresh air and the tress all around her.
14532.title: Milk Cow Part 1

145321.content:
"Mother, I'm going out to fetch some water and see if I can find any truffles while I'm gone."

"Did you feed the chickens?"

"Yes Mother and I placed the eggs in a basket by the kitchen window."

"Thank you, Rena. Take Karen with you; she's getting older now and should know how to fetch water. Karen, would you like to go with your sister and learn where to fetch the water?"

"Okay, Mommy." a younger tiger child said, dressed in a simple brown dress as she followed her older sister who usually wore leather pants mostly because it was warmer and more suited for working out in the fields. While she would have to use two hands to handle the twin buckets on the way back to the village, Rena was able to hold her sister's hand as they began their short trip to the river just outside of town, Karen carrying a smaller bucket in her other hand."Do you think we'll see any mushrooms out in the forest?" Karen asked; being only eight years old, this would be her first trip outside the village."That's what I'm hoping; you know which ones are okay to eat?"

"Only touch the ones that have a white, creamy color; if it's red, green, or spotted, leave it alone."

"That's right."

"Can I pick some flowers too?"

"You'll need both hands to carry your bucket when it’s full but I'll gather a few that you can wear in your hair, okay?"

"Alright, I guess that'll be good too."

After waving good bye to the local blacksmith at the edge of town, the two walked a bit to the west to another clearing where a small river flowed from one part of the forest to another, smooth pebbles and stones at the bottom for anyone who desires them. “I’ll get the water ready and you let me know if you see any mushrooms.” Rena said as she placed her buckets on the ground. “Do you know what we have to do after filling the buckets and bringing them home but before drinking or using the water for cooking or cleaning?”“We hafta boil it first for a few minutes; that’s why we do it at night, when the heat stone stops charging and gets hotter than normal. Why are you asking me easy questions?”“I just want to make sure you remember what I told you; sometimes the easy questions are the most important ones. Did you find any mushrooms?”“None here; maybe they’re deeper in the forest.”“We can search for the later; we still have other chores back home first.” Rena replied as she attached the shoulder mount to her buckets.“Wait, I want my flowers first.”“I did promised you, didn’t I? Let’s see….”Spying some blue flowers with five petals in a star pattern and three still enclosed in a tube-like manner, Rena plucked a single stalk with the largest flower in the bunch and gently placed it between her sister’s hair and ear, making sure it wouldn’t fall out by moving her sister’s ear around a few times.“There you go; I’m sure the other villagers will tell you how cute you look now.”Karen started to giggle but was cut off when both she and Rena heard shouting in the distance, then some sparks flying into the air and explode in a painful wail; someone was striking the heat stone with a hammer, which always sent streams of fire into the sky like a Roman candle, which could only mean the village was under attack and Rena could feel her heart sank. While raids happened every so often due to the fact that their village was close to the Cranis territory, it was still in a rather obscure location where horses would find the thick forest nearly impassible and the only way to attack was on foot; normally she, Karen, and her little brother Jacob were already home and her mother would have Rena hide with her brother and sister.

“R-Rena-” 

“It’s going to be okay.” Rena whispered. “We’ll walk slowly and carefully and sneak around the back way; if we hurry, we can walk behind the houses and get home without anyone knowing.”Unfortunately, the two barely took a few steps until some menacing figures came out into the clearing, knives and clubs drawn out and snarls on their faces, making Rena pale; there were Cranis, and not just any Cranis, but Pit Bull Cranis, one of the most feared and war-like of their kind. Rena heard many horrible stories of Falin who were captured by them, taken advantage of, then left for dead.“Rena!”“It’s okay; I’m going to distract them and I want you to run away as fast as you can.”“Shut up!” a gruff voice snarled. “You’re coming with us.”Rena growled and brandished a handful of claws with one hand and pushed Karen to run into the forest with the other. Unfortunately, one snuck up just enough to the side to suddenly rush at her and before she could scratch him back, he took out a rag soaked with a liquid that had a strong, nasty odor and shoved it on her muzzle. Feeling the world starting to go black, the last thing she saw was Karen running off to the side and then back towards the village, hearing one Cranis asking about the kid while another told him to let the “kitten” alone; at least Karen would be safe….
145321.title: Milk Cow Part 2

1453211.content:
When Rena came to, she gasped, half expecting to either wake up dead in the afterlife paradise of Hoben or at least by some campfire, being defiled by her Cranis attackers. Instead, she felt herself on polished wood, the floor rocking and creaking from side to side. After sitting up and taking note of the chains on her arms and legs, Rena could only guess she must have been taken outside of the forest clearing and into a horse-driven carriage. Scooting over to one side where a small hole leaked sunlight, Rena listened carefully, hearing some Cranis talking. While the other Cranis were riding on their horses, one of her attackers were riding next to a Chihuahua Cranis the driving carriage who was bundled up since his short fur meant he easily got cold in the north lands of Cranis territory.“Come on, tell me what happened; you know I love hearing about raids; you guys never take me on raids; how come you never let me go on raids again?” he spoke, his speech fast and nervous.“Cus’, you idiot, you’re the driver and a scrawny one at that; you take care of the horses and carriage and let us take care of raids.”“Well at least tell me what happened, you only brought one of them cats with you; why only brought one?“*sigh* If it will shut you up, fine. Okay, half of us approached the village all quiet like while the others went after a cat we saw near the river. The cat and her kitten didn’t see us but someone spotted the raiding party at the village first and the next thing we knew, we heard them shouting ‘Raiders! Raiders!’ and one of the cats struck one of those heat stones they love so much to warn everyone. I went after the cat and let her kitten go since David doesn’t accept kittens. Jonny over there says the blacksmith and his apprentice started shooting arrows while some other townsfolk did the same and they had to leave before it got worse.”“Anyone get shot?”“No, but Jonny says he hit a tiger with an eye patch over his left eye.”Rena felt herself go numb….father. He used to work over in the kingdom as a sniper bowman and was said to have terrific aim. However, while on an assignment, his group was attacked and while the rest of his party was simply slaughtered, he was just wounded and the Cranis, seeing his bow and arrow, decided to get “creative” and stabbed one of his eyes out. They probably would have gotten the other one but thankfully another war party came around and rescued him. He had to drop out of the village and wandered penniless and homeless for awhile until he one day came to Rena’s village and met her mother. He found a job helping someone with their crops and eventually he and his mother were married. With some help from the other villagers, he built a house and he and his wife had Rena and her siblings. But hearing he got shot…“Did he die, did you get him?”“No, Jonny said his aim was a bit off in the panic and he only gazed him on the arm; he’ll probably live.

The scary thing was even though he was half blind, he almost shot Jonny in the head and just barely missed his ear. Said something about a kid running to the village; must have been that kitten I chased off.”“Why didn’t you get anymore cats?”“Weren’t you listening?!? We got spotted, all the cats ran away except the ones that fought us.”Rena took a deep breath and released it in relief; so her sister made it back to the village and her father was going to be okay. She felt better to hear that they would be okay but…what was going to happen to her? Her clothes were intact and didn’t seem undone, so they didn’t touch her...and they said something about a “David” not accepting kittens…was she going to be sold into slavery? She didn’t hear many stories about Falin being slaves in Cranis territory but she wouldn’t put it past them. After a few more mundane conversations, Rena grew tired and hungry and soon fell asleep, dreaming of her peaceful days back at her beloved village. Would she ever get back home? Or was she doomed to live the rest of her life deep in Cranis territory?

Rena was woken up from her slumber when the carriage suddenly jolted and the door was flung open. A pit bull came in and forced her on her feet.“If you don’t want to cause trouble with yourself.” He warned. “Then keep quiet and come with us.”As much as Rena would have loved to rebelled, she wasn’t home anymore and she would have to obey to survive, if only for now. She sheepishly nodded her head and the pit bull smiled.“Good; maybe you cats aren’t so stupid after all.” He grinned smugly before dragging her with him. After a few steps, Rena saw herself in a strange place. The air, while not freezing, was cooler than back in the warm forest, and the ground had the strangest grass she ever saw, long, almost completely blue with black spots on them. She was next to some gated building complex and within viewing distance she saw a magnificent castle surrounded by a town proper; judging by the mark on the banners, Rena could only correctly guess she was so deep in Cranis territory, that she was actually in the very center where the capital city was located.

Still, she didn’t have time for sightseeing as she was lead by the pit bull where a Doberman and some of his cronies were waiting.“Greetings, Steven; I see you have a new calf for me. I’m surprised you only brought one this time, though.”“Calf”? Rena thought to herself. As in…a cow? What did they meant by that?“Hullo, David. We got spotted but one is one more than zero, ain’t it?”The Doberman chuckled a bit after replying with an “Indeed it is” and got closer to Rena; he first pressed the sides of her mouth, forcing her jaw to open and kept her head still with the other. For the sake of not getting hit, Rena didn’t resist; there wasn’t much one could do when you have chains on your arms and legs.“Hmmm….judging by her hair color and her teeth, she does look to be young and while healthy…but not as young as the last time you tried brining me a kitten. You. How old are you?”“T-twenty one….”“Not a bad age. I usually prefer a cow to be just a little bit younger, but she’ll do. You didn’t…take advantage of her, did you?”“Come on, David, you know I would never try to sell you a spoiled cat; I’ve got more pride than that, don’t I?”“Hmmm, yes, quite, and she is a rather good calf; I’ll pay her 200 Ulmins for her.”“Come on, David; this little trip was more costly than usual, at least give me 400.”

“250.”

“350.”

“300 and not a min more.”

“*sigh* A hard bargain but fair enough; she’s yours now.”

“Excellent. Robert, give the gentleman his money. You, calf, you will come with me now.”Rena was stunned, barely noticed as she was being dragged to the complex. Sold for a mere 300 units of some currency, as if she was a mere object. Being lead past an incredibly tall gate activated by many hidden gears, Rena was first taken into a small fenced in area where the gate behind her shut tight and a much smaller gate, one barely big enough for one person, was opened. Being lead into a large enclosed courtyard, Rena’s eyes widen and her jaw dropped. She saw some middle-aged Falin and Restros women being lead by some female Cranis on a mild jog, but that wasn’t what was so strange; what was shocking was that their breasts were *huge*. Not huge as in rather sizeable, no, they were abnormally large, unnaturally so, almost all of them three feet in diameter per breasts, easily covering most of their front body up to their knees. While they were at least moving, some of them had a look on their face like they were genuinely getting exhausted from carrying such heavy loads. As Rena walked past several buildings, one of them glanced at her with an expression of pity and turned away. What…what on earth was going on here and…would that happened to her too?Being lead to the largest building, past wide double doors and spacious hallways, Rena was lead up a staircase and lead to a huge room where there were at least fifty or so Falin and Restros, all of them with breasts equally as large as the older Falin and Restros women Rena just saw outside a few moments ago. All of them were lying down on their stomach on strange beds tilted at an angle between short stalls, their breasts facing the floor as strange, clear cups were mounted on the front of their breasts and some white liquid was being drawn out of them. All of them were eating off of tables that were attached to their beds and came on top of their breasts so that they could easily reach with their forks, knives, and spoons, only a thin, wide hole between the rest of the bed and the table where their breasts were interlocked. Starting to come up some theories but hoping for an official explanation, Rena was lead to an empty stall, or at least it looked like it was empty until one of David’s cronies pressed a button inside the stall and with a hiss of steam and some grinding of unseen gears, a small hole opened up in the floor and a tiny, miniature version of those strange tilted beds came up on a platform that perfectly fitted with the rest of the floor. Just before she was about to open her mouth and ask a question, another Cranis came forward and a strange stream of energy came out of his hands and the bed quickly grew many times its size until it was roughly the same size as the rest of the beds in the other stalls.“So, do you have a name, calf?”“Rena Yaben.” She replied, as a Cranis began writing on some cheap paper; if she remembered correctly, he also wrote down her age and some other notes.“Very well, Rena. Welcome to your new home. Prepare the solution and give her a shot of liquid strength."
1453211.title: Milk Cow Part 3

14532111.content:
Before Rena could say anything else, she felt a violent stab in her arm, yowling a bit but unable to move as some stronger Cranis held her still and she felt something being pushed into her body from a strange device with a needle at one end and the wound quickly covered up.“What was that?!?” Rena shouted, too much in pain to really care if she was a slave or not and whether she was speaking out of turn.“Just something that will help you in your new life.” David said just before a tube was shoved in her mouth and guided into her stomach. Loudly breathing through her nose, she felt something thick and heavy being pumped into her stomach and just as she thought she was going to burst, the same Cranis wizard began casting a spell on her.Rena could feel, it, even if her head was tilted up. The pain in her stomach was going away even as more stuff was being pumped into her but she first felt something pressing against her chest…no, something was coming *out* from her chest and she felt a strange weight on the front of her body; she was growing breasts and she could feel them getting bigger and heavier by the second. She could feel them against her ribs, her stomach, her hips, and then…her knees. The tube was taken out of her and by this time, Rena was grounded, her body lying top of gigantic breasts and Rena could only stare in fear and shock at the sight of it all.

Now she looked like all the others, just another Falin with freakishly large breasts. Trying not to cry, Rena could feel her body being lifted off the ground by another spell and then gently placed lying belly forward in the same bed, joining the other Falin and Restros victims.“Keep in mind that all of the cows are due for another milking cycle spell this week, so be sure to only give her one to last until Sunday; we need to keep a normal schedule to be efficient.”The wizard nodded before casting another spell on Rena, one that didn’t seem to have any effect before he and the rest of the Cranis walked away while one stayed behind and placed a padded collar around her stomach, locking her in place on the bed, as if she wasn’t already pinned down by the weight of her breasts alone. One of them placed a plate full of food in front of her before walking away. Struggling to not cry and show any more weakness in front of her captors than she already did, Rena ate but only because she didn’t have anything else eat for a day prior to coming here. What was going on and what did she do to deserve this? Was she being punished or was there some reason she couldn’t understand that Gatoros would allow something so cruel like this to happen to her and others of her kind?After cleaning her plate, another one was brought by a Cranis that was dropping off meals with a cart and gathering empty dishes in another section of it. She ate the second plate, filling full, but was surprised when not a few minutes later, yet another plate was placed in front of her. Rena ignored it, no longer having any desire to eat and starting to let loose some silent tears when a harsh voice grabbed her attention.

“If you know what’s good for you, you’ll keep eating. Don’t make this any harder on yourself than you have to.”Rena looked to her left to see a cheetah woman. She was probably older than her, though not that much older, and she had beautiful black hair and a healthy fur coat, but it was spoiled by just one little flaw; she had a scar that ran from her forehead down to her cheek over her left eye, which was completely shut. As curious as Rena was, she decided not to ask and instead simply express her disgust about her situation.

“But I’m not hungry anymore…”“Idiot! You will be soon enough and you better be eating when he gets back. They don’t mind if you’re not done with your plate yet.” She said as she shoved food in her mouth and began chewing. “But you got to at least be eating.”This lady had a very gruff demeanor about her, one that frighten Rena almost as much as the Cranis themselves. Rena obeyed, surprised to find she actually wasn’t quiet as full as she thought, then turned to the cheetah.“What’s going on here? Why was I brought here?”“I’ll tell you but only if you keep eating.” The cheetah replied, after shoving another bite-full in her mouth and taking a drink of water. “To put it simply, you’re a cow now.”“A cow?”“I don’t expect you to understand; this is a very well-kept secret of the Cranis; even the humans have no idea that this is going on and I doubt even they would ever support such a thing. I’ve been here since I was fifteen and I’ve heard enough here and there to put the pieces together. You saw the grass outside?”Rena nodded as she continued eating, surprised to find out she was able to eat after all….“Well, apparently that stuff is poisonous for real cows and they can’t grow normal grass out here because they get choked by the plants that are already here. They used to just get their milk from the cows of humans but….well, somewhere the line they developed a taste for our breast milk; don’t ask me how, that much I *don’t* know. But apparently they like it and even claim it can actually be used for baking, just like a real cow’s milk. So they use they use magic and grow our breasts out like this so we can store and produce more milk. That spell that wizard casted on you earlier; it puts your body into an over-productive milk cycle. Aside from the occasional calf such as yourself, they keep casting that on us once every month; that’s why we never get completely full and we just keep on eating and keep on making milk. You wouldn’t think so but we make so much milk, that just the two hundred or so of us in this entire facility is enough to produce milk for their entire kingdom and it’s gotten to the point that even the men prefer our milk to beer. And of course, they can ship that stuff around with ice magic, so this is thankfully the only milking facility here.”“What would happen if they didn’t cast that milking spell?”
14532111.title: Milk Cow Part 4

145321111.content:
“Nothing; we would just be Falins with oversized breasts. But they *do* cast it on us and most of what we eat becomes milk. That’s how they can afford to feed us so much; they get their investment back in milk and then some. I’ve lost track of how many meals I have to eat in one day.”“But so much food…and wouldn’t our mouths hurt or teeth rot?”“They use some strange magic on us every day to keep our mouths and teeth strong and they keep brushing our teeth for us. And the humans always produce too much food, so they sell most of it to those Cranis bastards. That’s how they can keep feeding us so ‘generously’. They go through all this ‘trouble’ to fix us nice, warm meals and give us ‘comfy’ seats and beds and warm blankets at night and even feed us gourmet meals during their holidays. They treat their cows humanely, they say, as if that makes it all better; all I want is my freedom but they do all this other crap to ease their conscience, assuming they even have any in the first place.”“So…what’s was going on outside? I saw some old women running around….or trying to anyways…”“Yeah, the older cows. I’ll give you a short verbal tour, because I had to learn it the hard way and I’m feeling generous today. This building is divided up into four sections. This is the highest floor, where they keep everyone aged 15-30. That Restros to your right is only 15 but she’s been here a few weeks longer than you. The floor below us is where everyone 30-45 is kept. I’ll get back to why they were outside in a minute. Below that is where everyone 45-60 is at. And the very first floor is where everyone 60 or older is kept.”

“Th-they milk us that long?!? How is that-”

“It’s that damn magic they use to screw with nature. It doesn’t work once someone reaches around 80 though; after that, they’re taken to an enclosed area and sleep in a smaller building where they still get feed and such but they aren’t milked anymore; think of it as being put out to pasture. But most women die from grief long before that, so it’s not very full…“Now then, there is a strict schedule they keep to daily; you’re lucky you got here on a Monday, makes the transition go smoother. At eight o’clock sharp, they wake you up so they can get the milk you made during the night and empty you out. Then they will lead you and everyone else outside to a building where you can use the bathroom; they got that indoor plumbing that’s all the rage in the cities. Then they bring you back here and it’s back to work. We eat and eat and eat until twelve; we get a short bathroom break and then they make us walk or jog around, depending on their mood. They exercise to keep us healthy and live longer so they can keep milking us. Then we go back and continue eating until four where we are generously given another bathroom break and another one at eight. “On Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, they bathe us at eight after using the bathroom; make us walk to another building and have us stand in line naked like cattle where two spell casters use their magic to lift up our breasts while some female Cranis wash us. We’re given some clean pants and then shipped back to our stalls. I suppose the only good thing about it is that at least all the bathers are female; men aren’t allowed inside ever. Then we eat until ten o’ clock, where we get magic to sooth our sore mouths and they brush our teeth; then they get these beds out, though it’s really more like falling asleep in a chair, and they tuck us in with blankets. On Sundays, they do keep milking us but they don’t exercise us; they just let us wander around the courtyard as we please for an hour; some of us visit others and mingle a bit; if they noticed some ladies becoming friends, they’ll try to move them together, keep them happy…well, happier I should say, really, we’re all miserable here as if that wasn’t apparent enough. Don’t ask me how the schedule works for the other floors, I have no idea but it’s probably similar; you just caught the next group below us on their exercise routine. Get used to it, because that’s what your new life is like; you’re just another faceless cow in a milking farm.”

“What was that stuff they pumped in my stomach?”

“Oh, that? Some sort of mixture of meat and lard; helps speed up the breast growth. You should be grateful; in the old days, they had to force-feed it to the cows and back then, the food-to-milk ratio wasn’t as high as it used to be. I heard the first few generations of cows got so fat they couldn’t stand anymore and most of them died from disease in a few short years. Not that being here healthy for so long is really that much better…”“How long have you been here?”“I told you I was here since I was fifteen; I’ve been here for ten years since…”“T-ten years?!? Has anyone ever tried escaping?”“Escape?!? You’re out of your mind. There’s no escape. We can barely job anymore, let alone run. The only reason we can even move under our own power is because they inject us with something that makes our muscles stronger. Even if someone were to escape to the courtyard, they don’t allow us to go too near the gate, and if you haven’t noticed, it’s barely big enough for a normal person to squeeze through. We could never fit through and the only times I ever heard of cows being outside here was when some were shipped to the castle to serve his royal highness, the king bastard of all Cranis. The only thing we can do is pray to Gatoros to smite all of them from the face of the earth, or at least the ones that work here and are responsible for our enslavement.“Yeah, now shut up and eat your damn food; I don’t feel like talking anymore….” With that, the cheetah began to ready bite and chew through her food, as if she was taking out her aggression on her meals. She obviously was upset and didn’t want to talk anymore and Rena was starting to get hungry herself, the milking spell taking full effect on her body.
145321111.title: Milk Cow Part 5

1453211111.content:
The day pretty much went exactly as the cheetah said it would. Throughout the day, she felt her breast slowly get heavier and she could swore they will slightly larger, as if they were being filled up with something. When they came to give her a bathroom break, Rena was surprised she could actually stand up and walk, though like most of the women, she walked at a spirit-broken slow pace and put into one of the lines waiting to use the restroom. It was a simple procedure; after someone left, they went in, a female Cranis pulled a curtain on them so they could do their business in private and wipe themselves clean, then they would pull the curtain back and wash the hands of the Falin or Restros and call the next person in line. 14533.title: No More A-cups

It was a cloudless night during summer. The moon was shining, the stars however were only barely visible due to the lights from the city. It was a big one, with colossal buildings reaching for the sky, containing hotels, company headquarters, apartments and so forth. Between the gray giants, small parks had been planted throughout the city so people could escape the smoke of the streets. Before anyone could get to the inner city though he had first to pass the out-skirts of the town, mostly residential areas. Just like the skyscrapers in the city, the small one-family houses had been built in a strict structure, the street net of the town almost looking like a chessboard from above. The rest of the town was industrial region. Immense amounts of smoke were coming from the factories all day and night, the wind however always blew it off the town. Half a mile to the east, a baseball stadium was located, crowded on weekends, now empty. On the west side, the city was limited by the Pacific ocean, a small harbor being built at the northern end to import materials for the city's factories and export finished goods.

But the majority of the coast was taken by a large beach, going beyond the city limits until it united with
the desert in the south. In the daylight, the sand was sparkling golden in the sun, creating a tropic scenery alongside the aquamarine water. Many people never noticed this natural beauty though, as they were distracted by another beauty - a beauty which visited the beach every day, considered by many to be the city's true treasure. It was this beauty, not the sky-scrapers, parks, factories, baseball stadium or the beautiful coast that had shaped the name of the relatively young town:

Santa Bikini.

In this night, however, the beach was empty except for a few couples, holding hands under the moonlight. The beach was located lower than the rest of the town, only reachable through staircases. Above the beach was the promenade, palms and grass planted along it. Behind the parking-lots was a large street, four lines on every side to gain a bit distance from the sky-scrapers. Between the large buildings, one could easily get lost in this urban maze if it was not for the many signs located at every corner, every street cross, and near every large building. In front of one of this buildings, there was a small court with a well in the middle of it. And next to this well, somebody was standing.

One could not tell if it was a woman or a man: The person was wearing a long orange coat, and a large cloak hung deep into his or her face. Just standing there, the cloaked figure wasn't doing anything significant - in fact, it wasn't doing anything at all. It didn't even seem as if he or she was waiting for someone, never turning the head to see if someone was coming. As if the person was frozen to the ground it rested at its place, solid like a mountain, unmovable.

Until someone came and kicked him or her into the face.
Two feet hit the head directly, sending the body backwards against the wall of the building. The impact was heavy enough to demolish the concrete, some pieces falling to the ground alongside the lifeless body. It was given no rest though as a swarm of bullets crashed into it, piercing holes through the orange coat. As the rain of bullets ended, the cloaked head fell onto its chest, all color vanishing out of the body.

Spinning a pair of twin pistols like a cowboy, the killer looked down at the corpse on the ground, showing no signs of regret or sorrow. Unlike its victim's, the gender of this person was pretty obvious as the most distinctive features were presented quite generously: Above a big booty and slender waist, the killer's torso was crowned by a large amount of cleavage covered in gray fur, a tight black leather suit underlining the female curves. She had a deep rift on the front of her clothes, wearing no bra so the world could see her delightful assets in all their glory.

With a quick motion, the cat-woman put her guns into their halters. During the entire time, she had kept a smoke between her lips. Pulling out a lighter from her cleavage, she ignited it now, puffing out a cloud of smoke into the night sky.

K I T T Y

A breeze came up, blowing some of Kitty's short white hair into her face. As she pulled it back, her cold, yellow eyes were still looking at the body on the ground. She kept her glance at it as she turned around, and when she could no longer stare at her victim, focused on the moon. It was not a full moon, not quite, a small piece missing at the edge. A large grin suddenly formed on the killer's face, showing her sharp fangs. Looking straight ahead now, the curvy assassin left the scene, her hips and tail swaying from side to side to the rhythmic clapping of her high-heels.

"Hold it!"

Kitty stopped. Puffing out another cloud, she slowly turned her head around. On the place the corpse had rested a moment ago the orange coat was now lying on the ground. Another cat-woman was standing on top of it, though this one had a much slender figure than Kitty. Her fur was orange-coloured with some black stripes along it, her red hair going down to her shoulders. On the front of her red tank-top, a black skull was imprinted; below it read "DEAD HEAD". Her eyes were covered by yellow sun-glasses, her legs by blue jeans which were neither really loose nor really tight. In her hand, she was holding a strange metal object, looking like a long lamp-holder with a grip on it.

RENA
WESTFALL

Kitty turned around, putting the cigarette out of her mouth. After swaying her hip as far to the side as possible, she put a hand on her side. "Oh my" she grinned, smoke coming out between her teeth. "They didn't tell me my target was a lil' girl." Placing the smoke between her lips again, she added: "Not that it would have changed anything."

Rena smiled back at her, shouldering her metal bar. "And they didn't tell me MY target was an old hag
who tries to act cool and sexy.", she said, adding after a while: "Not that it would have changed anything."

With a hand on her knee, Rena's opponent leaned forward, her breasts hanging down as far as they
could in the tight suit, while she put her other hand above her eyes as if she was looking for something. "I'm sorry, my dear, but even with my night-sight eyes, I can't seem to locate any kind of curves on your body. Or is it popular right now to be flat? Now Kitty stood upright again. Putting her arms above her head, she stretched herself as much as
possible, sticking out her chest while shifting her hips slightly from side to side. "Oh, don't you know? We cat-women are supposed to be sex-symbols! Japanese manga authors put us as running gags into their stories, always pointing towards a sexual context. The world wide web is full of pictures from pervy little men, showing us with big busts in provocative poses. From the moment she is born, the world expects a cat-woman to be sexy!" She relaxed her pose, putting one hand on her hip and taking the smoke in the other again. "You, my dear lil' girl however, would not even be considered 'sexy' if you were a normal human. Actually, not even if you were a normal cat." That was it. Rena pressed a button on her metal bar, and a shining laser stream appeared between its ends, it's light narrowing the eyes of her opponent.

"Nice lil' laser sword you got there." Kitty said, licking her lips. "Bought it at eBay?"

Kitty put the cigarette in again. Grinning with sharp teeth and looking at the incoming Tigress with an

tightly in her hands. "Hear the lullaby? Rest in peace, lil'girl!" Both cat-girls charged forward, getting closer with every second, ready to kill once being close enough. However, as they got in range, they just passed each other, and it seemed like nothing had happened. But shortly after, both of them stopped, their weapons in a position as if they had struck just now.

There was a moment of silence. The girls didn't move, each touching the ground with one knee. They

This morning however, when I wanted to buy a new set of bras, I found there was no money in my pocket. I had spent everything at this stupid restaurant! So, I had no choice but to grab my bras and run out of the market, carrying the underwear under my arms. You can imagine how embarrassing this was. I decided to get this job as an assassin so something like this would never happen again. So, if you dirty rat aren't going to pay me now, you can pick up your little shithead from--"

"I said I didn't intend to pay you with money" he interrupted her, snapping his fingers. "Not that I wouldn't pay you at all."

"This town, Santa Bikini, is a city of global economic relevance. Many concerns from all over the world have built HQ's here, earning the town millions of dollars of tax money each year. However, the world is rough, and any day, these concerns could decide to leave the town and move somewhere else. So the question is: What could make the bosses of these global companies want to stay here instead of moving to Tokyo, London or New York? What does it have what these towns don't possess?"


Mark stopped behind Rena for a moment. "The answer: We have the most buxom women in the entire country." He started walking directly towards Rena, always observed by her. In the year 1714, on an island somewhere in the Caribbean, lay the town of Briston. It was an English settlement, with a population of some five hundred civilians, and protected by a fort, manned by three hundred troops. It was a pleasant little town, unless you happened to be named Rena. For Rena, Briston was the most miserable place on Earth. For you see, Rena's race, cat-people, were used as slave labor for centuries, and as such, she was treated like some ignorant beast by everyone in Briston, who viewed her as nothing more than the property of Josiah Blunt, the owner of the local tavern, The Sunken Brig.'For Rena, the tavern was aptly named, because that's what it felt like to her. The brig of a ship. A prison. Her prison.

Mr. Blunt had owned Rena since she was six years old, having been separated from her parents when they were sold at an auction in Havana. For fifteen long, miserable years, Rena dressed in nothing but rags, ate nothing but table scraps, and had been abused by Blunt, physically and verbally. If Rena's body had developed more in her teenage years, she had no doubt Blunt would have used her for more than just house work.

"RENA!" Came the voice of Blunt, loud as a trumpet. It seemed like whenever he spoke, it was always loudly, whether he was happy or angry, and he was usually the latter, especially to Rena. Rena immediately rose up from scrubbing the floor and stood at attention. "Y-y-yes, master?" Blunt stood before her, a scowl on his face. He was a big, beefy man, with a large and bushy mustache, making him look very much like a walrus.

"I want you to go clean out the chamber pots, and bring up a barrel of whiskey from the cellar. After that, clean this place from top to bottom. The governor himself is coming tonight, and I want this place in tip top shape! Make sure he knows this is the best tavern in Briston!"'

"But master, isn't this the only tavern in Briston?"'Rena was rewarded for her question with a backhand across her face. "Don't talk back to me, you wretched alley cat!" Thundered Blunt "Question me again, and you'll get an extra beating tonight, am I clear?" Rena nodded, tears flowing down her cheeks. "Good. Now get to work!" Rena spent the entire day cleaning every nook and cranny of The Sunken Brig, after which there wasn't one part of her body that didn't ache like the devil.

She wished she could just retire to her pile of hay in the cellar and cry herself to sleep, as she usually did. But to make matters worse, Blunt had her serving as a bar wench that night for the governor's visit, serving drinks.' It was a packed house that night, with every table occupied by either sailors, drunkards, or both. All except one table, where the governor and his wife sat. "Mr. Blunt" Said the governor "These premises are hardly what you promised me when you said this was the best tavern in Briston, but I have heard a great deal about your famous brew."

"Trust me, my lord, when I say we have the best beer in the Caribbean. I shall fetch you a mug at once."' He poured two mugs full of drink, beer for the governor, wine for his wife. He handed the mugs to Rena. "Take these to the governor's table at once." Rena did so, but just as she approached the governor, she tripped on a loose floorboard, sending a wave of alcohol splashing onto the governor and his wife, drenching them. Needless to say, they were furious, especially the governor's wife, because Rena had just ruined her best dress. Without a word, the two of them simply left the tavern, never to return.'

"RENA!"

Rena braced herself, knowing what was coming. In front of the entire tavern, Blunt grabbed Rena by the hair, and dragged her upstairs. After giving Rena quite the beating with his belt, Blunt proceeded to reprimand Rena for ruining his big chance with the governor, as Rena cowered in the corner."This is the final straw, you miserable sack of dung! First thing tomorrow, I'm sending you to-"'

But Rena never found out where it was that Blunt would send her, because at that moment,there was an explosion in the distance, and a cannonball came flying through the wall, and took of Mr. Blunt's head. Rena could only sit there in horror, as she stared at the headless body of her former master. She heard screaming and more explosions coming from downstairs and outside. Rena fearfully peeked out a nearby window to see people screaming in the streets, running helter skelter in a mass hysteria as more cannonballs rained down onto the buildings of Briston. In the distance, Rena could see that the fort that protected the town was in flames, and she could make out just beyond that, a massive black man o'war, launching the deadly projectiles at the town. There was only one logical conclusion. Pirates. Panicking, and not thinking clearly, Rena ran downstairs and out of the now empty tavern, into the street. She knew she had to find a place to hide. The jungle! If she could just get to it, they'd never find her in there.

Then after that...she didn't know what she'd do then, but she'd figure it out when she got there. Now there was complete chaos in the streets. Citizens running in fear, pirates raiding houses and shops, carrying their ill-gotten goods back to their longboats to take back to their ship. Before Rena could decide which direction she should run, she felt a sharp pain on the back of her head, and everything went black. Rena awoke with her hands tied behind her back, and a sack that reeked of dead fish over her head. She had a throbbing headache from whatever had hit her, and she felt herself kneeling on a hard surface. From outside the sack, she could hear voices.

"Did we get anyone worth ransoming?"'

"Aye, this island is full of some of the richest families in the West Indies. This lot is bound to fetch us a hefty sum."

"What about this one?" Rena felt whoever was speaking nudge her with their boot. "She don't look rich, probably a slave. She's of no worth to us." "Let the captain decide what to do with her. He'll probably just throw her overboard."

This last statement filled Rena with fear. She couldn't swim, and was sure to drown, or be eaten by sharks. Just then, she heard footsteps approaching, and two more voices spoke, one of them with a thick African accent.' "What's going on here?" "We captured this slave girl in town. Shall we toss her over the side, sir? Or maybe put her to work in the galley?"'

"Neither! You know how I feel about slaves! Get that bag off her head, let me see her face."'

"But sir-"'

"Don't argue with the captain! Just do it!"'

The sack lifted away, and Rena saw she was on the deck of a ship, in a row of prisoners, tied and sacked as she had been. She looked up at the four men standing over her. One of them was a leopard-man, dressed in a leather vest, pants and boots. It was he who spoke with the accent.'Then Rena looked up at the captain, a white furred lion man with a red eyepatch and a large scar running down his neck. The man wore a red jacket with a jolly roger printed on it resembling a cat's eye and crossbones. Rena looked in fear before the captain looked down on her and let out a slight growl."I see they're still keeping cats as slaves. This hornet's nest hasn't changed. Fire more cannonballs. I feel like giving those cowards a little more of what they deserve. As for our guest, we have a prisoner in the brig who'll swap clothes with her. Willing or not."'"Yes sir." said one crew member resembling a minotaur. Rena was escorted away by the bull man as the pirates released a final shot on Briston. She even closed her eyes in fear.

The leopard man walked up to the lion captain as both of them observed Rena. "You aren't actually going to induct that woman into the crew are you Captain Ritter?" The lion nodded his head. "She knows all too well how cruel the world can be. I saw it in her green eyes Ben." Ben lets out a slight laugh. "Are you sure you weren't looking in on her for another reason captain?"Captain Ritter glared at his first mate and Ben just gave a smug look. "Aye, aye Captain." With that Ben decided to follow Rena down into the brig. Rena saw several of the Briston elite locked up in jail cells. There was one lone woman in the pirates' holding cells, a mouse woman with long blonde hair who was wearing a bright red dress.The bull pirate walked towards the cell with the woman who just gave him a glare. "You bloody pirates," says the mouse woman. "My father is an officer in the royal navy. You'll all hang soon. Just the mongrels of society who'd take pity only on the worthless." "Shut it Lucinda," said the bull man. "You're still our prisoner. The captain says our new crew member needs a change of clothes and since you're the only other gal on board."

Rena watched as the bull got ready to strip Lucinda down. The mouse screamed as her dress was forcibly removed. In the process, it was torn slightly but Rena didn't mind. She even ripped off the bottom half of the skirt so as not to look too much like her oppressors. "There," said the bull man. "Now you look more like a pirate.... uh, what did you say your name was?""Rena," replies Rena. "And thank you. Nobody has..." Rena lowers her head before she hears footsteps. "I'll take it from here Nat." The bull man walked off as Ben came up to Rena. "Better get used to the sea Rena. You're part of our crew now." Lucinda let out a scoff. "Lot of good that does her since you're sailing to the lost ocean."Rena looked at Ben in confusion. "Lost ocean? What is she talking about?" Ben just let out a scoff. "You don't have to worry about that right now. We have our heading. Our next stop...
154.title: Pirate Booty

1551211.content:
This addition originally M-man8.

Rena was at home getting ready to jog. Then, there was a knock at the door and she went to see who was there. See looked out the through the little glass window on her door. She saw three people outside the door. There were two men and a woman. The shorter man and the woman seemed to be non-threatening. The man behind them was quite muscular and scary. This time they rang the doorbell, so Rena opened the door.

The woman rushed into the room and started looking around strangely muttering to herself." Let’s see no pointy objects, and nothing that could bump her belly..." She obviously continued to talk but she was spoken over by the shorter man."Good day madam, I'm Dr. Seaman, that's Dr. Virginia..." Pointing at the lady doctor examining the ceiling, " and this is Mr. Smith. My associates and I are here in the name of science and I would like ask if we could come into your home to discuss business." "Why sure," Thinking for a minute, "are you guys legit?" "Why yes my dear here read this paper for me would you." He handed her a piece of official papers that told her about what they had come to visit for.

A Minute later...

They were all seated in her living room with a few pieces of paper in front of them. The woman was still looking around the room for things, but the short man was focusing all his attention on Rena. Mr. Smith was still outside the door, but it was unlocked at Dr. Seaman’s request. " So you want me to get pregnant to save my species?" Rena asked curiously. "Umm...I kind of don't want a relationship right now and I am still young I want to do so much.""Well we would appreciate if you would consider our offer." The Doctor said pleasantly. "We are prepared to offer the following." He hands her a list of offered perks for excepting.

1. All food that you will receive will be free. Any craving will be addressed and you will be able to keep it down with special pills that cancel out morning sickness, and it won't harm the unborn fetuses in any way. You will have staff to feed you also if you want. 

2. You will be able to exercise as much as you want or feel need to until you are to be on bed rest.

3 We will use a skin relaxant that will make you not have stretch marks, you will not be any danger of any crisis’s of your belly not being able to hold all the babies you will carry.

4. If you feel the need for companionship there will be men for your immediate needs.

5. You may see the babies after birth until they are old enough to be away from you. You will have a lot of staff to help you with the babies. Also you will be able to contact them at any time.

Here are the conditions:

1. You will be weighed, measured, and videotaped for scientific analysis.

2. You will have to be naked for us to watch for any physical problems.

3. Your activity outside the house will be prohibited.

4. Mr. Smith will watch you. (Don't worry about him seeing you naked he's gay anyway.)

"So Rena, what is your decision?" Dr. Seaman asks
1551211.title: Repopulating The Species

15512111.content:
This addition originally by System Crash.

"I still really don't understand all of this. There are lots of cat people in the world. I don't really think I need to repopulate my species." "Ah," Dr. Seamen said, "but you are mistaken in that. You are not a cat-woman, you are a tiger-woman. We have found that you are the last pure blood of a long ancient race of people. While you are distinctively similar to cat-people, you are unique." "I don't know..." Rena said, trailing off as she gently rubbed her stomach."You, of course, can make any request you would like. My superiors will do whatever we can to ensure your experience is safe and that you are happy during the entire process. Your job will alerted, so that once the process is done you will be able to return to work. This contract is for a year and a half. Nine months of pregnancy, up to six months of helping us take care of the babies, and after that you'll enjoy three months of our services where you can do whatever you wish. We want to make sure that you leave our little program in the same condition you came in."

Rena bit her lip for a moment, trying to decide what she wanted to do. She had always been curious about being pregnant, but was this really the way to do it. "All right, I think I might agree, but how are you going to... you know."Dr. Seamen chuckled a little, "Of course, we can handle it in two ways. We can do it naturally, or we can do it artificially. Still, we'll worry about that later. There are a few more terms I want to discuss with you."

"What's that."

"Well, our superiors realize that for this program we'll be pulling you out of society for a quiet a while, and we want to compensate your time as well. Your going to be paid, but that payment will be based on the number of babies your willing to carry. It's all that simple.""And why does it have to be me?" Rena asked, "Aren't there others.""Well, yes, there are other tiger-people. The problem is that you are the last female. All the others we've come across are all males, and in such will be the donors for our little program. Still, your the only female we can find. Thus, you see why you are so important. If we had not found you, the tiger - humanoid species would be doomed to extinction. We had almost lost hope when we finally tracked you down."Rena stood up from her couch, slowly starting to pace. This was a big decision. The way they were talking, she was going to get really pregnant, probably with at least four kids. She also would be pulled away from her friends and family for a year and a half. That is a long time.

Still, Rena also didn't want to see her species end, and they were going to care for her and pay for her time."All right, I think I'm interested in doing this, but I don't want to do it here. My neighbors will surely see, and I rather they think I just went away than what they could think if they saw me pregnant."Dr. Seaman just smiled, standing up, "Of course my dear. Our supervisors actually were hoping they could bring you to a more controlled environment, but we didn't want to suggest it. Still, if that is what you want, pack up any personal items you want. You don't need to bother with clothing, if you do recall part of our terms, but anything else that you want for entertainment or sentimental values is welcome." Rena just nodded, and while she still wasn't sure there wasn't any harm in going with them. If she really didn't want to, surely she could get out of it. The real point of no return was when she finally got pregnant, but until then she could still back out. After packing a suitcase with her music player, pictures, some books, and her favorite blanket Rena went down stairs. Dr. Seamen, Virginia, and Mr. Smith quickly led her out to a sleek, black car that was parked on the street. With a roar of the engine the car pulled away, Rena turning around to look at her house for a moment before sitting quietly in her seat.It was nearly an hour of driving later that the car pulled up to a large, research facility that was in the mountains north of the city. Mr. Smith grabbed Rena's suitcase, carrying it on his shoulder while Dr. Seamen and Virginia showed Rena inside the very modern styled building.

"Welcome to our facility, the Mount Olympus Research Facility. Here, we work on a number of very important research projects. We are trying to develop a cure for cancer, and we also have a large staff of inventors that pump out new devices to make our modern world even better."Rena just gawked, looking through some of the windows into the very impressive labs. "Who pays for all of this?""We get some of our money from government grants, most it it comes from the payments for companies to manufacture the inventions produced by our staff, and we also have a economics research section that play the stock market. They alone make enough money to keep this whole facility afloat, but we like to build up as much assets as we can for new projects, such as you."

"And just why are you so concerned with the tiger people, which I'm supposedly one of."

"Ah, the tiger-people you speak off are the subject of great amount of research in our lab. You have some very interesting genetics, and on top of that our head researchers, Dr. Stanton, is one of those old softies that doesn't want to see anything go extinct. He sees extinction as the loss of something more than a species, but as millions of years of evolution slipping away. Still, that is all the technical stuff you don't realy need to concern yourself with. Now, let me show you your home for the next year and a half."

With that the two doctors took Rena into the back of the facility, into a huge white room dotted with black furniture. Eight camera's encircled the room, one in each corner and one half way between each pair of corner cameras. The room, in all essence, was like a Studio apartment. Everything was in a single room except for the bathroom, which Rena could only assume was the small room that was against the back wall. A large bed took up part of the room, a kitchen, dinning table, and a living area with what had to be the most elaborate entertainment center Rena had ever seen. There were also several book shelves, stacked high with a wide variety of books. There was almost a computer, a pretty nice one at that. "As you can see, we've tried to provide you with everything you could need and, if something is missing, we will be sure to obtain that item or set of items as quickly as possible. Now, you would be watched through these eight camera's and, if you'll notice along the right hand wall, there are three two way mirrors. You will be kept under constant surveillance from there by Mr. Smith."Rena tensed a little, she'd be watched by that big bruiser. Dr. Seamen, seeing Rena's reaction, just smiled and said, "Don't worry, he's big and scary but he's the kindest man on staff. He'll be living in an a joining room, watching you when ever he can and sleeping at the same time you do. You also don't have to worry about him seeing you naked, Mr. Smith is a proud homosexual."

Rena tried to smile, though she didn't know if the fact Mr. Smith was gay would make much difference that he was going to be watching her everyday, completely naked. That was a fact that kept slipping Rena's mind. Still, the trio didn't linger in the main living unit for long before Rena was lead across the hall to another room. The other room was much smaller, but it had a very large bed and the same array of eight cameras."Now, this is our study room. Everyday, in the morning, you will be brought in here to be weighed and measured so that we can track your progress, and every week this is where you will get a careful examination to make sure everything is well. This is also where, if you agree to aid our program, that you will be impregnated. Again, I assure that you will be allowed to choose the means."With that Rena was shown around a little more of the facility, and after grabbing lunch with the doctors the moment of truth came. Rena remained silent for a time, debating with herself before finally turning to the doctors and, smiling gently, she said, "Well, if its to save a race of people, how can I say no?"
15512111.title: Rena accepts

choices: Just a little prick with a needle
155121111.content:
"Wonderful." Dr. Seamen said, quickly shooing Dr. Virginia off, "We will begin preparations immediately. Your house will be secured and monitored to make sure no one bothers it. We will alert your employer, and we will lock down all of your finances to ensure no one tries to use your identity. We will also alert your friends and family that you have been chosen for a research project, and that you will return in a year and a half. We will not give them the details, since I assume not all of them would approve of your choice."Rena forced a smile, rubbing the back of her neck, "Yeah, dad wouldn't really like this decision." "Don't worry, we'll create a convincing cover story so that they think your helping save many lives instead of rearing them. Now, you may head to the living unit and enjoy the rests of the day. Take the time to familiarizes yourself with everything. We'll start the program tomorrow morning.""All right," Rena said before Dr. Seamen quickly stood up and left. Rena stood up a few moments later, only to feel a shadow fall over her. She turned, letting out a smeel Eeep of fear to see Mr. Smith standing over her.

This was the first time she had gotten such a good look at Mr. Smith. He had a deep, dark tone to his skin, and Rena couldn't help but think he looked like a bouncer for some night club. Still, after putting on a friendly smile he swept his arm towards the door of the facilities cafeteria, saying in his deep but still comforting voice, "Please, follow me."Rena just nodded her head, falling in line behind Mr. Smith. Soon, the pair found their way to the living unit. Mr. Smith led Rena across the room to the kitchen where he pointed to a black metal control panel in the wall. "You'll notice that there is one of these panels in each section of the room. These are intercoms that connected directly to my adjoining space. If you need anything, you simply have to press this button and tell me. I will ensure that your request is filled, even if I must do something myself."Rena forced a smile, "Thank you, but..."Mr. Smith laughed, "Don't worry about anything. Now, I'm going to the monitoring station. Dr. Seamen has asked that you go ahead and get undressed now. If you haven't noticed, there is a ninth camera in the center of the ceiling. It a special scanner that can quickly analyze every aspect of your body and its current state. We need to get some control records so that we have something to compare against when you've begun the program."

With that Mr. Smith gently waved Rena good bye, stepping out of the room and shutting the door. Rena was expecting for the door to lock, but instead of that metal walls began to expand from the floor, and basically locked off access to the main door. Rena was starting to wonder if she had made the right decision, but still everyone seemed really nice.Rena, though a little anxious at first, got undressed. It was so weird to just be standing naked in such a large room. Of course she had her fur, so her sensitive parts weren't really exposed. Still, Rena didn't even like standing naked in her own house. She always wore something, even if it was her night gown. This would be the biggest thing to adjust to.Once she had gotten used to standing completely exposed Rena began to poke around the room. She first tried out the bed, and found it was one of those special swedish beds. It was really comfortable, and Rena couldn't help but purr. After resting on the bed for a time Rena jumped up, going over to the kitchen and poking through the cupboards and refrigerator. Finding some milk, Rena poured herself a glass and drank form it slowly as she explored the rest of the living unit.The part of the space Rena would consider a living room had a large couch, a small coffee table, and a huge television mounted up on the wall. it was one of those HD TV's, and it was massive. It was like being in a theater. Below the TV was even more. A satellite TV box with built in TiVo, a VCR/DVD player, one of each of the new gaming systems, and something else Rena didn't even no existed. It was a voice command unit. She tried it quickly, and to her surprise it actually worked. She could control everything just by saying things, expect the game systems but playing a game with your voice would be really hard. Still, she could turn them on and off with her voice, and that was a pretty nice feature."We can also bring you whatever movie you wish to see. We've got a Netflix account." Mr. Smith's voice echoed from the nearby intercom, making Rena quickly turn around and looked at the two way mirror where a light flicked on and she could see Mr. Smith sitting there, waving with a wide smile on his face.

Rena, instinctively, tried to cover herself up, but after standing awkwardly for a few minutes sher realized that she had been walking around for at least fifteen minutes. If he hadn't seen everything already, there was no point in hiding now. He'd see every part of her sooner or later.After poking around for a little longer Rena made herself a meal. Thankfully, there was a clock on the wall so Rena at least knew what time it was. Soon, after picking up and reading book for a while before watching a movie on HBO, it had gotten pretty late. Rena was starting to get nervous, gently rubbing her stomach as she looked at the clock. Did she really want to go through with this, making herself pregnant. Still, she decided to head to bed. She could probably make a better decision after a good nights sleep. She could still turn back, she hadn't passed the point of no return. At least, not yet.

In the morning Dr. Seamen will arive, and after some thinking Rena's sure she wants to go through with this. Now, there is only more decision to make.

Option 1: Dr. Seamen voices his concerns about the artificial insemination and how it could lead to some undesired effects in the children. Because of this, Rena decides to go the more natural route. After taking a set of pills from Dr. Seamen, Rena is allowed to the fathers.

Option 2: Rena, not wanting to loose her virginity before she finds someone she wants to marry, asks to be impregnated artificially.
155121111.title: Rena accepts Part 2

1551211111.content:
Dr. Seamen said to Rena, "We know you might not want to lose your virginity but there are risks with the artificial route." Rena said, "Let me guess the children could have unexpected mutations am I right?" Seamen nodded. Even though Rena didn't want to lose her virginity until marriage the risks of mutations in the children were enough to make her consider losing her virginity the lesser of the two evils. Rena said, "I've decided I'll go the natural route to be on the safer end." Dr. Seamen said, "Nice move which means we can reveal the male were tigers to you so you can decide which one you want to have his children from. But first off take this pill. It will force your body to produce more egg cells far quicker. It should make you able to have I assume octuplets." Rena consumed the pill and met the candidates. She wanted the offspring to be strong yet smart as well and have good looks to boot. She decided on the one she could sense was the best choice and the other were tigers left understanding if she was to have children they needed to have good traits. The duo went at it until sometime later. Rena said farewell to her choice and said to herself as her 8 eggs were fertilized to eventually create four boys and four girls, "I know I wanted to wait until marriage but thing is I know how I am the sole female of my race. If I backed out I'd probably doom my race so by ensuring I have the best case scenario I have that weight off my mind which is this exact one I'm currently experiencing right now."

Note by chapter creator: Apologies if this one was short compared to most writing real chapters is a pain. Anyways I've decided to have the choices be based around how long has passed.
1551211111.title: Oh Natural

1551212.content: Surrogate: Strapped for cash, Rena signs up for a surrogate mothers program, which means she will give birth to a child for a couple that, for whatever reason, can't have one of their own.
1551212.title: More Pregnancy Choices

15512121.content:
The door of Rena's apartment swung open, and the catgirl herself came strutting in, carrying a box, which was a little heavy, judging from the slight struggle she had with it.
She placed it down on the counter with a thud, sighing in relief as she did so.
"What a day!" Rena thought, feeling weary.
And what a day it was: she the whole morning and a of an afternoon in a hot lobby (the air-con was broken), waiting her turn for insemination.
It was likely a quick process, and Rena was given a box afterwards, filled with the necessary equipment she needed for the pregnancy, courtesy of the business taking care of its employees.
Frankly, Rena never wanted to do the surrogate program, but she had little choice; she lost her job a week ago, and she was desperate for cash. So, she took the job, for it payed a good salary.
Rena paused and touched her mid section. There was life inside. It felt strange being pregnant with someone else's child. She was never told who the a parents were, but she knew they were felines at least (apparently the were panthers).
Rena turned her attention back to the box on the table. She took a knife and opened it, searching the content inside: there was package full of special tea she had to drink during the pregnancy, a breast-pump, and a selection of help-me guides meant for gravid women.
Being payed for sitting around all day could be rather boring, so she decided to read one of the guide books. They were interesting, but being constantly reminded that she had to go through the painful process known as birth terrified her.
So, to take her mind off of it, she took a shower and got ready to go to bed early. But that night, strangely, she dreamed of her playing with a kitten that looked a lot like her...
15512121.title: The surrogate program.

15512122.content:
Some more 'creative options.

Hangover.

During a party at one of Rena's friends houses, Rena ends up getting drunk, more drunk than she's ever gotten before, blacking out during the night, only to wake up with a belly like a yoga ball, now, Rena has to piece together the events of the previous night in order to find out just what has happened to her, and why...

So much for protection.

Rena has been worried about getting pregnant ever since she hooked up with her boyfriend, worried about what would happen to her life if she did.
However, Rena discovers a new brand of pills supposed to be the ultimate protection, thinking it was a dream come true, she bought a bottle, taking them and having the romp of her life with her man, however, what happens when she wakes up with morning sickness?

More, i can come up with these all day.
