155122211.content:
Not wanting to waste an entire day feeling sorry for herself, Rena got up, stretching a bit, then taking the time to retuck her blue and green stripped sweater back into her loose blue-jeans.“Well…I suppose I might as well clean out the attic…been putting that off for awhile.”

Rena made her way to her house’s second floor, jumping a few times until she could grab the cord and pull it down, being sure to catch the ladder before it banged against the carpet. As Rena began to open boxes and start separating old clothes that she could give to Good Will with ones that she needed to wash and put up, Rena saw two small boxes that she missed when she first moved into her house. Gently undoing the tape with a claw, she opened it up to see a few knick-knacks that her mother put in for her when she moved out of the house. Putting that aside, Rena saw another box from her mother; opening it up revealed a few stuffed animals. At the top was her favorite, an orange tiger with black stripes that ran all over its body, including its white belly and muzzle, that Rena affectionately nicknamed “Charlie”. Picking it up and giving it a slight hug, seeing Charlie again really brought back memories.

As long as Rena could remember, she was always a bit different when growing up. Like many girls, she was cheerful and somewhat of a free-spirit; what made her odd was the way she displayed that same cheerfulness and free-spirited attitude. Growing up, she was a bit of a trouble maker. She hated dresses and skirts, so when she was very little, she would shred any given to her when no one else was around; no matter how many time-outs she got, she refuse to wear even one once without being practically forced into one. This of course caused a major rift between her and her mother; what kind of girl doesn’t like to wear dresses? But this was just the tip of the iceberg. Rena also refused to wear pink, or any pastel color for that matter, even when her mother gave it to her in the form of t-shirts or baseball caps. It was when Rena started school that Rena’s peculiarities really began to cause trouble. Almost on a daily basis, Rena would get into several fights a day, not because she got angry, but simply because she claimed “Fighting boys is fun!”

Her dad was always laid-back and accepted Rena just as she was but her mother couldn’t help but worry about her; why was her daughter acting like this? Proper girls don’t behave like that. She should be playing with dolls and making friends with other girls, not chasing after bugs and frogs and playing with boys when she wasn’t getting into fights with them.After several complaints from teachers and concerned parents, and after staying after school for the hundredth time in the row for getting into fights (“But wanted to fight me!”), it was suggested that Rena enroll in a karate class to burn off some extra energy and teach her some disciple about not using her fists to solve every problem. While it did cause her to behave better in school, it worried her mother even more, especially when Rena continued martial arts all the way into adulthood. Her daughter just wasn’t like other girls. Rena started to take an interest in video games, almost excessively. Her father decided that it was alright, so long as she kept up her studies in school and with any dojo she belonged to.

Then there was the fact that Rena had little or no interest in normal TV shows, like reality programs or sit-coms, but continued to watch cartoons and anime all the way through college. Rena liked reptiles, citing snakes as cute, especially the big ones, and wasn’t afraid of picking up spiders and inscects so she could wisk them away outside without stepping on them, and overall just didn’t act very feminate in any real definition of the word other than to grow her hair out and let it hang down over her shoulders. Still, at the insistence of her father, her mother tried to leave her to live her own life. One day, her mother gave Rena a little present, a stuffed tiger, just because. She was expecting Rena to reject this outright, of course, but she was surprised when Rena hugged her present and decided to keep him on her bed, calling him “Charlie”. Since that day, Charlie was special; he was the only present from her mother that Rena never asked for and yet never complained about. Over time, she would eagerly receive a few other stuffed animals, though most of them were rather simple and not overly cuddly or cute (and definitely not pink), including a dog, a cat, a fish, a crocodile, and even an “adorable snake” (that one really confused her mother). Eventually Rena sailed through college and got a job doing data entry. It wasn’t the best paying job in the world but it did allow Rena to telecommute from home and she got excellent insurance and benefits from it, allowing her enough money to pay for food and rent and still have enough to save a little in her bank and indulge in the occansional video game or anime DVD purchase.

Her mother was finally able to appreciate her daughter’s new found independence, she still couldn’t help but worry as always. While Rena continued her education with online schooling, she really didn’t have any real direction in her life and aside from going to a local dojo every Saturday and hanging out with some shy but friendly geeks at a comic shop every once in awhile during its after hours to play video games or watch cartoons (who were currently at a Dungeons and Dragons convention and out of town, hence her current boredom; she never did like table top RPG’s, only the faster video game kind), she really didn’t do anything with “real” friends and wasn’t actively seeking anyone for a relationship. Not that it really matter, her mother would sigh; no man would be interested in a girl who didn’t act like a girl. All she did was hang out with her geek friends or stay at home, a house that Rena was only able to afford at such a low price because someone was murdered in it many years ago and no one else wanted it.

Rena smiled and picked up the small box after putting everything else away, taking it downstairs to the washer and dryer; after all, they were in the attic for who knows how long and were probably flithy. After carefully reading the directions, Rena had her stuffed toys washed and dried, placing them proudly on her bed but taking Charlie with her. Plopping him on the couch, Rena flipped on the TV.“So, Charlie, would you like to watch Paranoia Agent with me? Or maybe Batman, the animated-“ was all Rena could say before being cutting off. Rena rubbed her eyes but right there was Charlie, standing up on two feet, with a rather strange look on his face, his eyes becoming large, blank white circles with sad eyebrows and his mouth hung open in weird manner.

“You were the one I was supposed to see? ………………………………you’re not what I was expecting….” The doll said, face turning down slightly in what might have been disappointment.Perhaps for the first time in her life, Rena couldn’t help but let out a rather girlish scream; it wasn’t everyday that a stuffed animal just talked to you…and it seemed like it was being possessed by something.“W-who are you and what have you done to Charlie?!?” Rena snapped, trying her best to look frightening despite the fact she was hiding behind the arm of the couch.“I was sent here to....find a warrior of justice….I am Doperverti…you are Rena, right?” was all the figure could say. Rena slowly got up.“Y-yeah…how did you…Warrior of…what are you talking about?”

“I was sent here from beyond your dimension to find a girl with a warrior’s spirit to fight in the name of good and justice.”This got Rena’s attention.“You mean to become a superhero? Like Batman or Superman or the Green Latern?” Rena said, swaying her hips a bit from side to side while holding her fists close to her face in excitement; Rena always wanted to be a superhero; that would just be awesome!
155122211.title: A Tomboy Catgirl

1551222111.content:
“Sort of, but…this is all wrong. You seem so………tomboyish?”

“Uh….so? What’s wrong with that?” Rena said, crossing her arms definiatly. If anything, being a bit of a tomboy would only make it all the more easier; how many other girls knew several forms of karate or could actually defend themselves in a fight?

“But tomboys don’t like to……………………………………..”

Rena got tense as she waited for him to finish before she got impatient. “Tomboys don’t like to what?” “Tomboys don’t like to wear short, skimpy skirts.” Was all Doperverti could say just before earning a light smack on the back of the head from Rena.

“What the hell are you talking about?!? What does that have to do with anything?!?”

“I was sent here to make a girl who would fight for justice a superhero but….well….you’re not what I was expecting, yet my search brought me here.”

“Okay, fine, you don’t like me, find someone else.”

“But…..I have to use a girl with a warrior’s spirit…..”

“Well, got into fights at school growing up and I still attend the dojo on Saturdays. I’m their best student if that’s what you mean.”

“Are the other girls there more…….girly?”

“I’m the only female student.” Rena said, causing Doperverti’s face to become….blue?n“N-no! This can’t be right! I mean….” “Look, just what is going on here? And do you have to use Charlie? He was my favorite….”

“I….guess I have no other choice….you said you wanted to be a superhero, right?”

“Sure! What powers will I have? Heat vision? Super strength? The greatest detective mind in the world?!?”

“Not…exactly….have you seen……Sailor Moon?”

“That show sucks ass.” Was all Rena could say before Doperverti started shouting, his face still retaining it’s open mouth look.

“SAILOR MOON WAS A PIONEER IN THE GENRE OF FANSERVICE AND DEMANDS TO BE RESPECTED!!!”

Rena flinched at hearing that; what the heck was that about? “…wait, what? You’re not making any sense…”

“I was sent here to find someone so I could turn her into a warrior of justice…I choose the magical girl model.”

“Oh, no, no, no, HELL no. That anime genre sucks, it’s lame, stupid…no! No, I’m not going to be your very own pet Sailor Moon. Find someone else.”

“I can’t…I have to use a girl with a warrior’s spirit…and every other girl I found that was suitable to my taste doesn’t have a warrior spirit. Oh, why did it have to be a tomboy?”

“What’s wrong with being a tomboy?!?” Rena in yelled frustration, starting to get tense with anger; this jerk was just as bad as mother, maybe even worse!“Tomboys don’t like to participate in……………………………………….” Rena couldn’t help but lean in closer, swallowing a knot in her throat. “Tomboys don’t do fan-service.”

Rena gave him a solid smack in the back of the head.“What does ‘fanservice’ has to do with being a superhero? If you want someone to play a Sailor Moon fan-service bimbo for you, find someone else.” “It’s too late; I was sent here, so I have to use you.” Doperverti said as he started to move his stubby arms in a strange display.“What? NO! Get the hell out of my house! And further more-“

Rena was cut off as he saw Doperverti start to glow and a small little medallion the size of buckeye appeared and flew from his hands and landed on Rena’s chest, causing her to struggle in trying to take it off; it was pinned to her solidly by some invisible force, like a refrigator magnet.“GAH?!! What the heck is this thing?!? It’s so…so…pink! I hate pink! Get this off of me!” Rena yelled, starting to reach her boiling point. As angry as she was, she couldn’t help but start panicking as she could feel it start to press harder into her skin and actually begin to dig into her body. “What’s…what’s happening to me?” Rena whimpered.“It chose you as its owner because you have a warrior’s spirit. From now on, you are the world’s only super hero and the best hope for your city. You are…..Expansion Girl!” Doperverti exclaimed, pulling out two fans with Japan’s flag seemingly out of nowhere and taking a strange pose.

“…………..that’s a stupid name.”

“SHUT UP I DON’T CARE IF IT CHOSE YOU OR NOT YOU CAN’T MAKE FUN OF MY DREAM IT’S MY FANTASY DAMN IT!”

Rena just stare at him with a creeped out look on her face. All this talk about magical girls and fan service….just what did she get herself into? Why did it have to be her? Why not some other stupid girl that would actually enjoy any of this? And what did he meant by “Expansion Girl”, anyways?As Doperverti slowly calmed down, he looked at Rena with the same creepy, open-mouthed expression.“Now that it has chosen you, you will need to use your new powers to transform into a magical girl of my own design and fight crime and corruption where ever it breeds and help the weak….especially if it happens to be near a buffet line……god I hope so…”

“What? No, forget it, I’m not doing it!” Rena said, crossing her arms defiantly. It was right then that she felt strange all over, a sort of pins and needles pain that caused her to drop to her knees, holding her sides.“Ugh…I…I don’t feel so good….” “Ah…that what happens when you refuse to transform in the name of justice…”

“What?” Rena asked. Still, she could feel herself getting…heavier? Rena could only stare in silent horror as she saw herself starting to get wider, chest filling out, hips getting larger, belly pushing her sweater up, and rear starting to fill out her jeans.“W-what’s happening?” Rena said, feeling her clothes getting tighter.“Ah…sercurity measure.” Doperverti said, his open mouth showing just the slightest hint of a smile. “If you don’t transform, you’ll start getting larger until you reach about 400 lbs….don’t worry, it’s magical; you won’t get health problems from it and you will still be able to move around….oh, Rena-chan, you’re starting to look so beautiful…”
1551222111.title: A Tomboy Catgirl Part 2

15512221111.content:
“Tell me how to fix this, NOW!” Rena said, already pushing 245 and her clothes beginning to rip loudly; she was so frustrated and scared, she barely registered that creepy “so beautiful” comment.“Just yell ‘Expansion Power Activate’” the spirit said, smile vanishing as he realized that would return Rena to normal…somewhat. Rena wasted no time and, after floating in some strange, pink orb while her body slimmed down again, she quickly found herself wearing a mock sailor scout uniform, complete with a gold tiara with a green gem insert, red boots and gloves and a green giant bow with a green short skirt and matching green tight shorts underneath…well at least it offered some modesty; all things considered, it could have been worse….though this was a bit much…. “Oh….my….god…this is the stupidest thing I ever had to wear in my life. Someone is going to recognize me like this.” Expansion Girl mutter, hoping that this was just a really bad dream from eating one too bites of ice cream the night before.“No, no one can tell it’s you. You’re Expansion Girl now. Even if someone takes your photo or draws your picture, or even studies your face or body for an hour, they won’t be able to remember you. In videos, you’ll just be a blur and in memory, a shadow that no one can recall; only your code name and uniform will make any impression. Just make sure no one sees you transform or they’ll recognize your form no matter what.”

“Uh….right….okay, now what?” “I’ll let you know when it’s time to transform. Whenever evil is around, just say ‘Expansion Girl Teleport’ and you’ll be right there.”“Uh huh…okay…’Expansion Girl Teleport!’”No sooner had Expansion Girl said those words that she was wisked away in a white flash, only to see herself in front of the exit/enterance of a bank, several scared customers huddled on the floor and two armed men in ski masks panicking; apparently the same flash that happened in Rena’s house happened in here also.“W-who the hell is that?!?” the taller of the two robbers yelled out. “Stand back or I’ll s-shoot!”Expansion Girl shallowed hard but refused to buckle down. “Drop the cash right now or I’ll be forced to roughhouse ya!” she demanded, holding two fists up in a threatening manner.“The hell you will!” the stocker of the two said, aiming his pistol and firing several rounds, the taller one following suit.

Expansion Girl couldn’t help but shriek briefly as she instinctively covered her arms across her body; however, something caused her to yell an unusual phrase out-loud.“Rubber Girl Transformation!” Expansion Girl could feel bullets going into her skin….only they didn’t hurt…in fact, they felt more like they were gently poking her. Expansion Girl opened her eyes and looked at her body, seeing holes in her but no blood. Taking a moment to look back, she could feel her neck was able to stretch all the way back perfectly in a 180 degree direction to see behind her, almost like….rubber? Not only that, but she clearly saw what seemed like tubes of flesh and cloth appearing in her back and behind her arms.“Wh….what the…how hell did she…” was all the taller guy could say. Expansion Girl, however, figured out exactly what this was and could only smile devilishly as she evilly glared at the two would-be thieves. “Bullets don’t work on me.” No sooner had the words left her mouth did they bounced back off of her body, the holes snapping forward and taking their usual shape in her form. The taller guy just barely managed to miss getting hit. The shorter guy, however, took a bullet to the knee while the rest of the bullets dug into the wall.“GAAAH!!! I’ve been shot! For the love of all that is holy, someone call 911!” He screamed, dropping his gun as he fell to the floor and started cradling his knee cap.“Ah, you’ll live.” Expansion Girl said unsampathically as she started to walk over. “Now, do yourself a favor and give up, or I’ll be forced to take more drastic measures.” She said, the words dripping off of her mouth as she cracked her knuckles.

Unfortunately, this guy was more trouble than he looked as he immediately bolted for the door.“Wha-hey! Wait a minute, damn it! Get back here and face me like a man, you cowardly bastard!” Expansion Girl shouted as she chased after him. Unfortunately, she was finding that running was slightly more difficult; her legs felt a bit…wobbly. It was then that Expansion Girl got an idea and a smile on her face. Taking a good stance, she stretched her right arm out a bit behind her, reaching about thirty feet with seemingly no effort and causing anyone watching to stop and stare in awe.“Gomu Gomu no…” was uttered just before her arm started to come back forward at a terrifying speed as she started to shout. “PIS-TOOOOOOOOL!!!!” Expansion Girl’s fist sailed through the air, going even further forward than it was stretched out behind, stretching until it smacked the runner in the back of his right ribs, causing him to scream in pain as he spun a few times in the air before hitting the ground with a solid thud. He could only twitching in agony while he laid there, soundly defeated; anyone close by might have been lucky enough to hear a solid “crack” eminating from his body. Expansion Girl’s arm swung back as she held her lower right arm with her left hand, smiling triumphantly as it violently snapped back to its original position.

It was then that Expansion Girl noticed the extra attention her little stunt just pulled and yelled “Expansion Girl Teleport” before anyone could get close enough to start asking questions, hoping her guess was right. It was, as in another white flash, she was back home in her….bedroom? Well, gift-house, mouth, don’t look, right? Seeing that all of the blinds were closed, she announced “Rubber Girl Transformation” again, then sat down on Rena’s bed, hoping that little freak show would show up so she could turn back to normal…if she could…“Oh, Rena-chan, you were amazing! A complete natural!” Doperverti said, appearing at her side seemingly from nowhere.“GAH! Don’t scare me like that! Now that I did what you wanted, how do I turn back to normal? I’m not going to become fat again, am I?” Expansion Girl asked, remembering painfully what happened just a few minutes ago.

“No, Rena-chan, that was just a punishment to get you to perform your duties. Now that you did what you had to do, your original body is back to normal. But I have a question to ask you. What was that….Gomu thing you just said?”

“Huh, and here I thought you actually knew Japanese or something. ‘Gomu Gomu no Pistol’, roughly translates into ‘Rubber pistol’; Sorry, I just couldn’t resist; One Piece is my favorite anime series and that whole ‘rubber girl’ thing made me feel just like Luffy…….only not as dumb.”

“One Piece?………what is that?”

“Only one of the best anime series ever made! You mean to tell me you never even heard of it at least once before?”

“I only like to watch……………………………..…………”

“…WHAT?!?”

“I only like to watch fan service anime….” Expansion Girl sighed in disguist. “Say, can we do something about this dorky costume? And if I can turn into a rubber lady, wouldn’t ‘Rubber Girl’ or something along those lines be more appropreiate?”

“Oh, but, Rena-chan, stretching isn’t your only power.”

“………….it’s not?”

“No, you’re” Doperverti began, striking the same strange pose with the fans again “EXPANSION GIRL! You get your powers from all the forms of expansion thought up from the years, everything from rubberhose animations from black and white cartoons to the postings and drawings created on the World Wide Web!”

“I….don’t follow….” Rena said, growing strangely fearful for some reason.“Rubber transformation was just one ability. You also have Air Body Inflation, which…okay, that one is kind of worthless right now, but over time you’ll be able to control the winds themselves! Water Body Absorption and Water Girl Transformation, which will give you the power to control water! And your signature move, Pound Weight Gain, allowing you to increase your already super human strength several times over and control the very earth itself, from causing earthquakes and select point shockwaves and riffs to even performing Magic Alchemy on select, earthbound material! Of course there are other moves but I’ll only teach you those when you are ready.”Expansion Girl could only stare in confusion. Those didn’t so sound….great…especially that Weight Gain thing. Just what did she got herself into?
15512221111.title: A Tomboy Catgirl Part 3

155122211111.content:
“Right….okay, so, mission accomplished. Can you tell me how to return to normal now?”

“But….okay. All you have to do is shout ‘Expansion Power Deactivate.’ Just be sure to only transform when no one else is looking or else they will always recognize her.”

Expansion Girl nodded, not sure if that would really work but she would soon find out. After yelling those words, Rena found herself back to normal, thin as usual. Sighing in relief at seeing that even her clothes were no longer ripped, she turned her attention to Doperverti.“Now that I’m…me again…how were you able to see me when I was gone? Weren’t you here the whole time?” Rena asked. It was then that Doperverti vanished in front of Rena, only to reappear in front of her, levitating with the help of two black, leathery wings that were suddenly on his back.“I maybe not be allowed to fight…but I have powers too. Only you can see and hear my voice now.”

“Huh…that kind of makes you like a Death Note shinigami.”

“A what?”

“Ugh, never mind.” Rena said while shaking head as she got off her bed and grabbed her wallet. “And can you find some other toy to possess? I don’t like you using Charlie like that!”

“But….okay…” Doperverti said sadly, looking at the small assortment of stuffed animals on her bed. “How about this dog?”“

No, I like Jeffry. Begals are cute.”

“The clown fish.”

“No…”

“The cat.”

“If I didn’t want you to use Charlie, why would the cat be any better?”

“The snake? Crocodile?”

“You leave Leroy and Billy out of this!”

“The monkey?”

“…….eh, what the hell. I never really liked that one…man, I hate monkeys! If it wasn’t a gift from my mother…” Rena started, cutting off when Charlie fell on her bed, back to normal. His face had his usual black beady eyes and simple cat frown. Rena couldn’t help but squeal in delight as she picked him up and hugged him tightly.“Oh, Charlie, I’m so sorry! I’ll never let a crazy pervert spirit ever possess you again!”

“Speaking of which,” Doperverti said, his now monkey head sticking out of the pile of stuffed animals, his strange face now imposed on it. “I really like this new body.”

“Huh, oh, you’re still here. Why’s that, freakshow?”

“Oh, Rena-chan, you are so cruel. It’s simple.” Doperverti said, his mouth turning into a slight smile as he raised his hands. “This doll has fingers….”

“You…you stay away from me or I’ll kick your ass!”

“No, I wouldn’t dream of doing that to you, Rena-chan.” Rena sighed in relief.“You just don’t have any meat on your bones. Maybe later after you turn back into Expansion Girl and gain a little weight…” Rena just stared at Doperverti, eye brow starting to twitch. This guy just didn’t have any tact or bounderies, did he?. “Say…when you said that you needed a girl to be a superhero of your choosing…did you have to use this whole Sailor Moon rip off thing or could you have done anything different, you know, like normal super powers?”

“I could have done something different but….that wouldn’t be as fun for me…”

“Yeah, that’s what I thought. Later.” Rena said with a sigh as she started to walk away, putting Charlie in a sitting position on her couch. Doperverti followed, spouting his leathery wings as he followed about head’s height with Rena.“Where are we going, Rena-chan.”

“I want to check out a new gaming store that just opened up; I heard they specialize in old and rare games, so I might find something that’s old but still new to me.”

“I think we should practice your new powers more; you need to be prepared when evil strikes. Even if I coach you during fights, you’ll be more effective if you practice in the pocket dimension I have prepared for you. Besides, you really need to learn to control your strength. As Expansion Girl, your speed and strength are far beyond normal humans. You may not have noticed, but you broke a few of that guy’s ribs. If you had punched softer, he might not have even broken one. It’s a good thing you didn’t do that after using Weight Gain or….”

“I’m stuck with this for awhile, aren’t I?”

“At least until your fur starts to turn grey…or you turn 45, whichever happens first.”

“……yeah, I had a feeling you’ll something like say that.”

Rena just muttered while looking to the side; this was going to take some adjusting to.“How about it, Rena-chan?”Rena decideds to…..

====================================

#1. Just go to the game store as always and get a bite to eat at a sub sandwich shop. This is a lot to accept in one day and she really needs to burn off some steam. Charlie will follow and even comment a few times but since Rena doesn’t want to look like a crazy person, she’ll just ignore him.

#2. As much as she is afraid of what the rest of her powers will do…she needs to be prepared for whatever might happen later….so she reluctantly agrees as Doperverti takes her to his pocket dimension to train…and maybe get Expansion Girl a little something to eat after an intense training session…and by a little to eat, just a bit…maybe a buffet so she’ll gain some weight…
155122211111.title: A Tomboy Catgirl Part 4

155122212.content:
Rena's fur bristled slightly as she stretched on the couch, and she squeaked quietly with the effort. soon, however, she was bored of the stretching, and couldn't stand her house anymore. She stood up from the
couch, stretched one final time, and cast her eyes around her room, in an attempt to find something to do. She looked into the cupboard for a light snack, and found nothing there. Well, that was something. She would go out and pick up some snack food from the minimart down the street from her house.
She grabbed a light jacket on her way out, since the first cool winds of fall were starting to blow. The trees had yet to change, and the weather was beautiful. There was not a single cloud in the sky to block out the deep aqua sky, the air was crisp and clear, and smelled faintly of the first falling leaves.
Taking a deep breath of the fresh air, Rena smiled. "It's so nice out! Why didn't I think of taking a walk before?" she asked herself. After a few minutes of walking, however, she was starting to feel unexplainably nervous. She kept hearing strange sounds echoing down the street, and the street itself was so condusive to sound because thee was not a soul in sight. With a shifty glance into any strange nooks or crannies, Rena continued her walk.

Soon, within a block of her minimart, she found why there was such a strange feeling in the air. There was a crowd gathered around the parking lot, and inside she could see only two people inside. One was her favorite cashier, Mo, and the other two loked to be...robbers?!? One had a gun pointed at Rena's good friend Mo, and the other was shaking a bag at him. Mo had his hands up, but his slightly creased face was defiant, and his hands were not moving. It was clear even from the distance Rena was that the robbers were running out of patience. And what could she do, besides watch? She'd be shot if she tried anything! She fell to her knees, and let out a single sob, deep in her throat.




Just then, from a tree overhead, a small creature. It appeared to be some kind of very chubby rabbit with an X shaped mark on its forehead. held in it's puny arms was what appeared to be a short, transparent, hard plastic tube, topped on one end by what appeared to be a styliz ed, fat girl made to look like gold and gems, but was actually just spraypainted plastic. for a moment, Rena and this rabbit simply stared at each other.
"Whaddya waitin for, take the danged ExpandoRod!" the rabbit shouted, in a deep, rough voice sharply
contrasting it's soft and cuddly looks. Rena fell back on her butt, and the rabbits formerly serious face melted for a moment, his eyes watering slightly, his arms slackening their grip on the tube, and his fur rustling with delight. Rena's face couldn't have been a look of more disgust if she had tried. Just what she needed, some kind of crazy perverted rabbit while her good friend was getting robbed!

"Aw, c'mon toots, you need this to save your buddy in the store! Move it before he gets shot!" That snapped Rena out of her pit of self- pity and she grabbed the rod away from the rabbit.
"Now what?" she asked. She hadn't thought that far ahead. she realiz ed that nothing would just solve itself now.
"Just shout 'Expansion Girl Power Activate!' Also, you might want to hide. don't want everybody seeing you transform, do ya?"
"I'm not saying that." Rena stated flatly, and as soon as the words left her mouth, her body began to swell with fat at a frightening pace. She could feel the weight pulling her down, and after only a few seconds, her clothes were stretched to their limit, about to burst. Her chubby hands felt herself around, trying to figure out exactly what had happened.

T he rabbit squeez ed between his eyes, sighing. "That's what ya get fer not transforming in the face of evil.
Now, do it, or it'll get a whole lot worse for you and a whole lot better for me when you start to gain again. I
don't think your clothes will last much longer..." His words were more cautioning than his voice, which had slowly become more singsong and giddy until it was nearly dripping with pleasure. Again slightly disgusted at the rabbit's obvious perversion, she hurried into some short shrubs on either side of the road, and held the tube aloft. Just as clothes began to burst from the sudden movement, Rena called out "Expansion Girl Power Activate!"
Suddenly, she was back to her normal siz e, but seemed to be floating in a pink, slightly shimmery void. Then, a bright flash of neon pink whipped away her normal clothes, and she was bathed in light, conveniently obscuring her nude body from the rabbit, who had been peeking through the bushes, hoping that he would catch a glimpse when she transforming. Cursing his bad luck, he continued to watch. This show never got boring for him, even though it seemed the same each time.
Soon, the pink light coalesced into an extremely skimpy mock sailor suit, complete with a bow on the chest
and a shiny headpiece. the skirt was a joke, and Rena was glad to find short shorts underneath. What she had been expecting she wouldn't have said, but she was relieved. She also noticed that she could feel some kind of strange, new power coursing through her, which was not altogether unpleasant. In fact, he skin was tingling pleasantly, and she felt as if she could take on the world.

"Now, go in that minimart and show those robber's who not to mess with!" the rabbit suggested. "Oh, and if you get into trouble, just eat some of the snacks in there. They oughta fix ya right up." Expansion Girl grinned determinedly, if slightly confused, and the rabbit managed to give a thumbs-up with one paw. Expansion Girl nodded, her face becoming slightly more serious, and charged into the mart.
T he gun totting robber quickly changed targets when Expansion Girl burst through the door. and she truly burst them. One flew off it's hinges totally, and smacked into a rack of chips, the other barely held onto it's frame with one small twist of metal. The gun was a small automatic pistol, and Expansion Girl had a small panic attack to see it pointed at her, especially in the shaking and undoubtedly crazed man. He was dressed all in black sweat clothes, with a shoddy winter mask pulled over his face
"D-don't come any closer! I swear I'll...I'll shoot! Just...don't come any closer!" Mo looked at her, shocked by such strength. However, Rena slowly advanced. She didn't really know what she was doing, but she'd seen in movies where a superhero was able to intimidate the crooks into fleeing just by staring them down.


However, these two were real criminals. They had even pulled off a bank robbery once before, and just wanted to go for a little heist for some quick bucks. The one with the bag, who was shorter and stockier, leapt over the counter and took down Mo, while the other shot at Expansion Girl. The first one hit her in the shoulder, and the she started to dash at him, z ig z agging between bullets. He only managed to shoot 4 times, and none but the first hit. However, Expansion Girl's right straight did hit, and sent tall, dark and ugly flying into a wall.
"If you don't want to join your friend over there on top of the coffee machine" Expansion Girl threatened, "I
suggest you get off of M- - that citiz en. He grudgingly obeyed, slowly getting off him...then dashing for the door. Instinctively, Expansion Girl tapped her new power, and shouted "Rubber Girl Transformation!" She reached out for him, leaping unnecessarily, as her arm stretched and easily caught him, her fingers reaching all the way around him, and her arm sprung back, launching him onto his friend ungracefully slamming the two together. T hey moaned in pain, and Rena decided that they were well taken care of. "Rubber Girl Transformation" she said, still not totally understand why she'd said it in the first place or how she'd known what to do.
However, she had bigger concerns. Checking Mo, he seemed fine, but had hit his head when he was tackled, and was in a mild daz e. Satisfied that her work was done, she remembered what the strange rabbit had said, 'Oh, and if you get into trouble, just eat some of the snacks in there. They oughta fix ya right up.' An image of one of his perverted faces accompanied the memory, and Expansion Girl shook her head while she swung herself over the counter and walked over to the downed rack of potatoe chips.


She picked up a big bag of her favorite flavor, barbecue, and began to eat them casually, wondering what was supposed to happen. The wound had not hurt much, since she was Expansion Girl, but now any hint of pain was gone after the first few chips, and the wound was well closed once the bag was finished. However, she grabbed another bag, wanting to make sure that the wound didn't leave a mark. She quickly ate that bag, and checked the wound. It seemed to be fully closed and healed, but another bag couldn't hurt. I mean, her uniform was a little bloody. What if she'd lost too much blood? That couldn't be good for you. So, she had a third bag, for blood replenishing. Once she finished it, she did not feel light headed, and was satisfied that she was healed. she grabbed seven more bags, for snacks once she got home, and walked out to address the crowd, trying her best to ignore her loudly growling stomach, which seemed to stick out more than it had at first...
155122212.title: Enter the Heroine

1551222121.content:
"The situation is under control, people! The robbers are incapacitated, and the shopkeeper is safe! Someone notify the proper authorities, and get these clumsy oafs in jail! EXPANSION GIRL, TELEPORT!" she shouted dramatically, and suddenly she was back in her room.
Generat ed f rom



this had all been very strange, but she was too hungry to think about that now. She ripped open another bag of the crispy chips and began to munch. The crumbs stained the fingers of her gloves slightly, and there was a good pile of barbecue powder gathering in the folds of her uniform, turning her pink bow slightly more reddish. She didn't even notice, as she chomped the ships down, that she was beginning to gain weight from them. She finished off the last of the seven bags, and had gained a full 25 pounds. Her body was pleasantly soft to herself as she sat on the couch, enjoying her victory over hunger and evil.

However, she was snapped out of her reverie by a deep, familiar voice. "YOWZAA! You look nice with a little extra cushion." the strange rabbit hopped up from the floor in front f her couch, and sat on her lap. He snuggled into her exposed thighs, appearing almost to be the cuta animal that he most certainly was not.
"What are you doing?" EG asked, in slight outrage. "And why did you follow me home?"

155122222222221.content:
It was dead midnight, high moon casting a bright pallor to the deep jungle. There were a few insects chirping and frogs croaking every now and then, but otherwise it was silent. Down on the ground, in the shadows of the foliage, a lone figure crept across the earth, shuffling slowly and softly on it's belly. With grace and precision, the figure slinked over the jungle floor, one bright green eye scanning the environment. The figure approached the trunk of a wide tree, rising to a crouch behind it. Peeking around the tree, the figure squinted into the distance with it's one good eye, it's other eye covered by a black eye patch. Farther down into the jungle, there was an unnatural light glowing through the trees, a sure sign of sentient activity. Squinting further, the figure could just barely see the dark gray of steel walls hidden well behind vegetation.

Carefully, the figure reached up to the earpiece in it's large pointed feline ear. "HQ, come in." The figure whispered in a hushed feminine voice.

"This is HQ, agent, go ahead." A male voice responded through the earpiece.

"I've got visual on what looks like Zivargo's base. So far so good."

"Copy. How far are you from the base?"

The female agent reached for her belt and produced a pair of compact binoculars. "Um..." Despite the binoculars, she had to lean forward, trying to make her one eye see better. "... kinda far, I guess...?"

The earpiece was silent for a few moments. "...Rena. Are you wearing that stupid eye patch again?"

"NO." Rena responded much too quickly, self-consciously bringing one gloved paw up to the eye patch covering her left eye. "And it's not stupid. It's cool."

"Rena, both your eyes are fine. You don't need an eye patch."

"Yes I do! It makes me sneak better!" Rena cried out loudly as her earpiece sighed.

"You don't have any depth perception with it on, Rena."

"UGH. Fine." Rena groaned, pulling the black eye patch off of her head, revealing a perfectly healthy green eye behind it. "Dude, you're the worst handler ever, Dalton."

"Copy that, agent." Her handler, Dalton, said dryly. "How far are you from the base?"

Without an eye patch half blinding her, Rena could easily see the base through the binoculars. "Looks like... about 800 feet away."

"Copy. Approach with caution and keep us updated."

"Roger, HQ." Rena slipped her binoculars back into the pouch on her belt.

"And Rena... still friends?"

Standing up slowly, Rena yawned and stretched her slender arms over her bright orange head, red hair tied back in a ponytail, the rest of her thin body from the neck down covered with a skintight black stealth outfit, her orange and black striped tail sticking out the back. "Yeah, I guess."

"Good. Over and out." The earpiece clicked off, and Rena was alone again. Smacking her lips lazily, she though out loud to herself.

"Okay, alls I gotta do is catch the bad guy and steal his magic potion or whatever. Sounds easy enough."

Little did Agent Rena know...

1551222222222213.content:
"Oh, I don't think it'll be too easy." A sultry voice called behind Rena.

The cat girl whirled around, shocked to see an entire squad of armed guards donning full body armor pointing rifles at her. In the middle of them, stood a blue-eyed rabbit girl with a smug look on her face and her hands on her plentifully wide hips, two long incisors poking down out of her mouth and two long ears poking out the top of her blonde bob haircut. Presumably the leader, she wore a tight red jumpsuit that accentuated her generous curves, the top of it zipped down to her stomach and revealing an ample amount of furry white cleavage.

"Wha-! How'd you sneak up on me like that?!" Rena cried out.

"It wasn't hard, dear. You were so wrapped up yapping on your little radio, I could have had a picnic waiting for you to finish." The rabbit girl said in a slight French accent.

"Who the heck are you, anyway?"

"Ah, my manners! Lapin La Femme is the name, assassin and bodyguard for hire under employment by the good Dr. Zivargo." Lapin says, taking an exaggerated bow. "And you, petit minou, are now my prisoner."

Rena sighed a breath of relief. "Oh, good. I thought you were just gonna shoot me."

"Oh, we are. Just with a powerful tranquilizer instead of bullets. Zivargo wants you alive, after all."

"Oh." Rena says, disappointed, her ears drooping. "Well, that's not a whole lot better."

"I imagine not!"

"Hey, can I just ask one more question?"

"Oh, I suppose. Make it quick." Lapin said impatiently.

"Do you think if I was wearing an eyepatch, I woulda been harder to find?"

Lapin stared quizically at Rena for a second. She looked to her side at the armed guard next to her, who looked back at her and simply shrugged.

"FIRE!" Lapin shouted. The guards obeyed and shot a flurry of darts from their rifle, pumping Rena full of the tranqulizer and completely knocking her out in milliseconds.

---

After a deep, drug-induced sleep, Rena's mind started slippping back into lucidity. She blinked her eyes open, momentarily blinded by the bright lights above her. Still tired, she let out a loud yawn.

"Ah!" An elderly male voice exclaimed. "Our incompetent guest is awake at last!"

"And not a moment too soon..." The voice that Rena remembered as belonging to Lapin said, sounding annoyed. "Petit minou, you snore quite loudly!"

"Wha' happen...?" Rena mumbled, waking up slowly. From what she could tell, she was lying flat on her back on a hard cold surface of some kind, and she couldn't move her arms and legs.

"What happened, my dim friend, is you were captured by the genius of Dr. Zivargo! BEHOLD!" The surface Rena was lying on suddenly began to tilt forward, revealing a massive laboratory, huge mysterious machines lining the back walls, along with counter tops filled to the brim with beakers and vials of strange bubbling liquids. Directly in front of her were two people, one of them the same voluptuous rabbit she encountered in the jungle, the other a short gray furred goat man, dressed in a white lab coat covered with chemical stains of various colors and large circular glasses perched on his snout. Zivargo the goat doctor was grinning madly and wringing his hands, while Lapin was frowning at the short goat man, arms crossed under her bosom.

"Doctor, I do believe it was I who captured her, no?"

"Yes, yes, of course, whatever." Zivargo said, waving her away condescendingly. Lapin rolled her eyes but stayed where she was. "Now, agent, perhaps you're wondering why I haven't had you eliminated yet?"

"Sure, yeah, it crossed my mind." Rena replied, not paying very much attention to the goat doctor. Looking around, she could tell that she was strapped to some sort of operating table, wrists and ankles bound to it with shackles, which explained why should couldn't move. Her head wasn't strapped in though, so she could swivel her head around, noticing her pouches of gadgets missing from her belt. "Hey! You guys swiped my stuff!"

"That we did. I personally liberated you personal affects." Lapin said proudly, laying one white paw on her chest. "Never know what you secret agents might have up your sleeves, eh?" The rabbit then leaned forward and loudly pretended to whisper, pointing down at the doctor next to her. "You ought to thank me, minou. This little creep would have stripped you naked if I hadn't stopped him!"

"Bah! Who knows what gadgets and doodads she might have hidden in that suit of hers?! She's a secret agent, remember?" Zivargo argued, shaking his fist.

"Oh, please, she hardly has any doo dads at all! She's flat as a board!"

As the two villains bickered, Rena tuned them out and continued to examine her surroundings. To her left she saw a menacing looking robotic arm hanging from the ceiling, tipped with a large syringe filled with a glowing purple liquid. "Hey, what's that thing?"

Zivargo grit his teeth, angry at geting distracted so easily. "Don't get ahead of yourself, pussy cat! That is my masterpiece! The serum that will allow me to rule the pathetic peoples of this planet! The serum that only my master intellect could concoct with such effectiveness! That is why you still live! Understand?!"

Rena yawned, bored again. "Man, you talk too much."

"I agree." Lapin remarked, looking disinterested herself.

The goat man scowled. "F-fine! I'll just have to show you!"

With that, Zivargo produced a remote control from his lab coat and clicked a button on it. The robot arm sprang to life and with a mechanical whir, swiveled toward Rena. Before she could react, the arm reached forward and jabbed the needle into her neck, automatically injecting the purple liquid into her bloodstream. She winced, feeling the liquid pump through her veins. Zivargo watched, grinning like a madman, along with Lapin, appearing more interested in what was to come, as Rena felt strange rumblings inside her body...
1551222222222213.title: She was wrong, she gets caught immediately!

choices: Zivargo's right! Rena's forced to obey!
Zivargo's wrong! Rena's still free (metaphorically speaking)!
15512222222222131.content:
Rena suddenly felt exhausted and overheated, like she'd been running a marathon. She began to pant, tongue hanging out of her mouth; the bright laboratory lights seemed to abruptly feel much brighter and hotter, like heat lamps that were cooking her. Underneath her black suit, Rena's body was gradually becoming more athletic and sinewy, the tight material showing every emerging bulge of her muscles, her slim arms and narrow legs thickening, flat chest and belly thickening with subtle indications of strong pecs and abs.

The serum's effect ramped up quickly, though, and Rena's body went into overdrive. Muscles on her neck bulged out into powerful cables as her biceps and triceps rose like loaves of bread, pumping up to the size of bowling balls. Her legs, spread a bit by her shackles, packed on sizable bulk, thighs growing large and round enough inward to touch each other and outward to give Rena wider hips- rock hard super strong hips, but hips regardless- while her calves inflated like footballs, which with her bulging brawny buttocks were pressing her body away from the table she was strapped to. Abdominals swiftly grew from subtle to swollen, popping up into dense cobblestones on Rena's belly, obliques on her sides expanding with striated sinew, tapering down to her waist and giving her torso an undeniable V-shape. Rena's chest grew less and less flat with every passing second, bulging with big, heavy pectorals, protruding like an impressive shelf of muscle any bodybuilder would kill for.

Rena grit her sharp teeth as her changes slowed to a stop, her arms, legs and torso all lengthening, making her over a foot taller than when she started, her wrists and ankles straining against the metal shackles due to her increased size. The black stealth suit was stretched to it's limit from her growth, leaving none of her newly pumped physique to the imagination, her arms and legs having extended longer than the sleeves and legs of the outfit, exposing her arms halfway up her substantial forearms and her legs halfway up her huge round calves, exposing more of her orange and black fur between her gloves and boots and the overextended stealth suit.

Then, it was over- Rena stopped growing entirely, and she was suddenly filled with energy again, more vigor than she could ever remember feeling before. "Wowza!" She exclaimed, enjoying her sudden increase in vitality. "That's a heckuva cocktail you came up with, Doc!"

"I'll say, grande kitty!" Lapin said excitedly, strutting over the the table Rena was strapped to, clearly admiring the cat girl's new anatomy. "You are so... ripply!"

"Ha ha! Now do you see!?" Zivargo hollered, beaming. "I have the means to create an army of perfect soldiers, bring any creature to peak physical condition in mere moments! And best of all, my patented perfect obedience serum is included right in the mix! Any individual blessed enough to become a super soldier will also be blessed to obey my every genius command without question! Imagine, unstoppable armies at my beck and call! Total control is mine, agent! MINE! HA HA HA HA!!!"
15512222222222131.title: Rena grows into a muscular amazon cat!

choices: Zivargo's not worried- he's got back up plans!
Zivargo's very worried- he didn't expect this!
155122222222221312.content:
As entertaining as Zivargo's stupid laugh was, Rena had to interrupt him. "Um, Doc? I don't think the mind control stuff in your science potion is working right."

"It's not a potion, it's a SERUM!!" Zivargo screamed angrily. He fumed for a moment, but then Rena's words registered, and he looked genuinely surprised. "Wait, really? You don't feel compelled to do my bidding?"

"Mmmm, not in particular." She did her best to shrug her meaty shoulders, but couldn't quite pull it off due to the combined forces of her new mass and the metal straps holding her in place. "Go ahead, try to tell me to do something!"

Zivargo eyes her with suspicion and annoyance. "Very well then! Agent! Spill your secrets and tell me who you're working for!"

"No way, ya whack job!" Rena chimed, smiling cheerfully for a second before reverting back to an apathetic expression. "Yeah, see? Nothin'."

"Ack! Impossible!" Zivargo exclaimed, recoiling in horror. "All my projections predicted perfect results! What could have gone wrong?!"

"'Projections'?" Lapin question, tearing her eyes away from Rena to glare at the doctor. "Did you never actually test this concoction of yours?"

"Why would I test it?! My calculations are always correct!"

Lapin groaned, facepalming. "Imbecile, obviously not!"

"Yup, you're a bonehead alright!" Rena exclaimed, grinning like a
madwoman. "Alright, enough talk. Time for..." Rena took a deep breath, her chest flexing and expanding and her stealth suit creaked audibly.

"...aaaaactioooooooOOOOOOOON!!!" The cat girl screamed, pulling her arms and legs against the shackles binding them. All over her body her beefy muscles flexed, swelling even larger with effort. In seconds, Rena tore through the metal shackles like the were cardboard, her immense strength easily overwhelming the strong alloy. She fell the the cold lab floor below, landing on her hands and knees, revealing her equally well developed back muscles and her thickened tail, lengthened substantially longer and stronger as well, flicking back and forth in the air excitedly.

Laughing, Rena rose to her feet, well over six feet tall and towering over her adversaries. "Ha ha ha, rad!" She raised her arms up and flexed them, playfully admiring her biceps as they swelled to the size of volleyballs. "You do real good work, Doc!"
155122222222221312.title: Zivargo's wrong! Rena's still free (met...

choices: He's still in the lab, cowering in the corner!
He's still in the lab, and he's been busy!
He's gone, the wimp ran away!
1551222222222213122.content:
Meanwhile, Lapin and Zivargo had both backed away, surprised at Rena's sudden escape; Lapin tensed her own lean muscles, comparatively puny compared to the hulking cat girl before her, a nervous but professional look crossing her face, while Zivargo was practically wetting himself, stumbling backwards.

"ACK! A-a-agent, s-s-stay back!" The goat man stuttered.

"Nah!" Rena refused happily. With incredible speed, she leapt forward at Zivargo, wrapping her herculean arms around and and pulling him tight against her rock hard pecs, rolling into a somersault so as not to crush him and landing back on her feet gracefully, rising to her full height again with Zivargo in her grasp. Her bulky transformation did nothing to diminish her natural feline agility.

"Bluh...!" The doctor moaned, dizzy and constricted by Rena's actions. ""L-Lapin, do something!" The doctor cried, terrified of his own creation.

"Ugh! Why must I cover for your mistakes?" The rabbit girl said, annoyed.

"Because I'm paying you!" Zivargo retorted, but Lapin had already leapt into action. Running up behind Rena, who was distracted by the squirming screaming doctor she was bear hugging, she jumped and landed a flying kick on the amazon cat's huge back. It didn't hurt Rena in the slightest, but it did surprise her, causing her to stumble and drop Zivargo, who quickly scrambled away.

"Hey! What's the big idea?!" Rena yelled, annoyed, trying to look over her shoulder to glare at the rabbit but finding her swollen neck and shoulder too large to quite look behind her.

"Oh, did you expect me to let you simply walk off with my benefactor, kitty cat?" Lapin retorted, crouching on the floor after landing her last kick.

Frustrated, Rena whirled around, ready to pounce on Lapin, only to have Lapin's boot heel strike her face, having vaulted all the way up to the top of Rena. The cat girl's head was the only part of her that wasn't souped up with super muscles so Lapin's kick actually did hurt her that time, making Rena stagger. Landing gracefully, the assassin quickly pulled out a stiletto knife hidden in her boot- Zivargo may have wanted the secret agent alive for whatever prideful reasons, but she hardly believed at that point he would care if she killed the cat. She was an assassin, after all.

With the speed of an Olympic sprinter, Lapin rushed forward, jumped and brought both of her legs together, landing a drop kick square in the middle of Rena's chest. It felt to Lapin like she was bouncing off a brick wall and she seriously doubted that she even managed to move Rena, but as she back flipped back onto the floor and landed with the poise of an expert gymnast, Lapin was pleased to see Rena toppling backwards, arms flailing as she tried to keep her balance. She couldn't, and the secret agent fell onto her back with a powerful thud, shaking the floor like a miniature earthquake. Seizing her opportunity, Lapin leaped once more onto Rena, this time landing on the cat girl's chest, and quickly plunged the sharp knife down.

Unfortunately for Lapin, old habits are hard to break. She was so used to assassinating non-super strong targets that she instinctively aimed for Rena's heart, bringing the knife down onto her adamantine pectoral muscles. The knife simply bounced off, unable to pierce Rena's super developed body.

"Merde...!" Lapin cursed, feeling like an idiot; she'd gotten cocky and it had cost her. Rena, meanwhile, had fully recovered, and scowled at at the rabbit girl sitting on top of her. To Rena, the knife felt like someone had tried to poke her with a toothpick- hardly damaging, but certainly annoying. That, plus the whole kicking her in the face business, was really putting a damper on her mood.

Before Lapin could react, Rena's hand shot up and grabbed the assassin by the neck, holding her tightly but not choking her. Now that Lapin was in her grasp, Rena could get up safely, rising to her full height and effortlessly holding the rabbit girl up in the air.

"What's your problem, Easter bunny?!" Rena demanded. Her windpipe half blocked, Lapin was unable to respond, though she did glare daggers back at Rena. The cat girl rolled her green eyes and ignored her for the moment. Looking around, she tried to locate Zivargo...
1551222222222213122.title: Zivargo's very worried- he didn't expec...

choices: It works as expected, and Lapin grows even more muscled up than Rena!
It kinda works as expected, and Lapin grows huge muscles, among other things!

15512222222222131222.content:
After Lapin's assault had caused Rena to drop him, Dr. Zivargo had scurried away as quickly as he could, scrambling for one of his many workstations lining the walls of the lab. Lapin couldn't possibly hope to last long against the super soldier-ified secret agent- Zivargo knew his concoction made it's subject nearly invincible. But she could distract the huge cat girl long enough for his brilliant mind to piece together a new plan, one that should even the odds nicely.

As Lapin was jumping about and delivering kicks, Zivargo was quickly grabbing seemingly random beakers and pouring them into each other, chemicals mixing together and changing colors at a rapid pace; after a few seconds, he poured the entire mixture into one large beaker, it finally settling into the same shade of purple as the serum Rena was injected with. Zivargo heard and felt the thud as Rean was toppled to the floor but ignored it- he reached into his lab coat and pulled out what looked like a small water pistol, only tipped with a long needle at the end of the barrel. Carefully, he dipped the needle into the beaker and flicked a switch on the side of the gun, the purple liquid suddenly sucking into the gun. After a moment, the gun was full and Zivargo held it up admirably, smiling smugly at his handiwork.

Whirling around, gun at the ready, Zivargo saw that he had been correct- Lapin was no match, held in the air by the neck by the super sized agent. Rena was looking around, presumably for him, which was fairly terrifying. She finally spotted him and turned to face him, left hand on her large hip while the other still held Lapin. She did not look happy.

"Are you done being a mad scientist yet?!" Rena demanded.

He half-sneered, half-smirked. "Hardly!" He fired the gun, and with a tiny puff of air, an entire syringe shot out, a special dart gun of his own (self-described genius) design. "And I am not mad!"

Zivargo had surprisingly good aim, and the dart found it's target: Lapin. The needle pierced her just below her cleavage where her fur covered flesh was exposed, and the rabbit girl gasped as much as Rena's tight grip would let her. The new serum self-injected into Lapin and she could feel the chemicals begin to take effect almost instantly...

A parody of Harlan Ellison's "I have no mouth, and I must scream", Rena is a catgirl who has been taken captive by a rouge supercomputer name A.I., which has a hatred for organic life forms that knows no end. The story takes place one hundred years after the events of the Third World War in a underground facility that seems to stretch on forever. Along with a handful of other prisoners, Rena is tortured by A.I., doused with radiation and other harmful chemicals that make her inflate, grow and gain weight to extreme proportions.

One day, in the depth of Rena's despair, A.I., taking pity on the catgirl, offers her a chance to escape her horrid life. But there's a catch: she has to avoid obstacles set by the supercomputer on her way to freedom.

Can she leave the compound with the minimum alternation, or will she fall victim to yet another sadistic game of A.I.

155122222222222222.content: Rena wakes up in a lab with little knowledge of why she is there or who she is. While searching for her identity, and for a way to escape the complex, Rena encounters many odd experiments - impossibly muscular men, overflowing with testosterone, trying to capture the catgirl, strange insects that inflate you by touch, gas that boosts your libido, and many more strange things. But luckily there is hope in all of this madness: she also encounters other friendly experiments that want freedom just as badly as her. Can Rena escape this complex with her new friends?
155122222222222222.title: How did I get here?

1551222222222222221.content:
It was night. Not a single cloud hung in the sky, allowing the stars to twinkle brightly next to the full moon, which shined a blue color on the lush forest below. Built in a clearing in this forest, far far from any civilization, was a well-kept building.

This was a laboratory, and deep within the very bowels of this complex, many feet underground, was a catgirl. Laid upon a uncomfortable metal table, naked, her body began to stir as she woke up from her deep sleep.

Groaning, she sat up, rubbing her head, observing her surroundings with a dazed expression. She was in a square room, computers, chemical bottles, electrical cables, gas bottles, and many other scientific equipment surrounded her.

As her wits, which were dulled by sleep, began to sharpen, fear began to settle in.

"Where the hell am I?" she asked herself, her voice hoarse from disuse.

She clutched her head, trying to remember how she got here, but everything was a blank memory. The catgirl began to panic, but she calmed herself down by taking deep, slow breathes.

"Okay, keep calm. You can get yourself out of this...ah..."

She trailed off, unable to remember her own name, which frightened and frustrated her even more. She shook her head. No! She was not going to be scared by this; she was going to be brave and get out of this nightmare.

Jumping off the metal bed, she began to walk towards the end of the room. A metal door open automatically and unexpectedly, and the catgirl found herself looking down a long, gloomy hallway.

Swallowing nervously, she began to walk down it gingerly, her right hand covering her crotch while her left arm covered her breasts. She shivered, ten spite her white, fluffy fur, for the metal walls and tiled floors where cold.

She reached the end of a hallway, and another metal door opened, and this time it revealed something a little disturbing for the catgirl: rows upon rows of glass containers stood side by side, and inside these containers were both humans and anthros, unconscious, floating in bubbling green water.

There was what looked like gas masks attached to their faces, most likely supplying them with oxygen and preventing them from drowning. One thing the catgirl noticed was that all of them were male, their body's thick with muscle.

As she stood there examining them, she could have sworn she saw some of them expanding with more muscle, but she was suddenly interrupted when somebody shouting angrily behind her.

"Hey, you there!"

Her blood ran cold. While giving a "eep!" in surprise, and trying to cover herself even more, she whirled around and saw that it belonged to a brown bear, which had a body that could put even the strongest bodybuilders in the world to shame.

If she could guess, he would have stood over six feet tall, his black latex suit, a badge of a muscular arm flexing on his right shoulder, emphasizing his neck, pectoral, biceps, sixpack, and leg muscles.

A large bulge, the size of a melon, portrayed between his legs, and the catgirl could only guess that this was his manhood. His eyes had a strange green glow to it, which reminded the catgirl of one of those radioactive chemical barrels.

The bear studied her for a few moments, before his face twisted into a toothy grin. "Another experiment trying to escape, hey?" he said, "Time to put you back in your cage again."

He started towards her, the very ground shuddering under his impressive amount of bulk. She was rooted to the spot, terrified, watching as the bear approached like a looming storm.

But as his meaty hand reached out to grab her, his face suddenly contracted into one of pain. He gave a howl of pain, bolts of electricity running across his bulky frame. His body went stiff, his stomach convulsing, and he fell towards the floor.

The catgirl stood there dumbfounded, unable to grasp what just happened as she stared at the smoking body of the muscle-bound bear.

"That will be enough of that," said someone.

Looking into the direction where the voice had came from, she saw a kangaroo dressed in trench coat, a blue shirt, and a pair of long black shorts, in his hands a stun gun.

He turned his attention to the catgirl, a friendly smile appearing on his face, saying: "Greetings."
1551222222222222221.title: The awakening.

It was night. Not a single cloud hung in the sky, allowing the stars to twinkle brightly next to the full moon, which shined a blue color on the lush forest below. Built in a clearing in this forest, far far from any civilization, was a well-kept building.



This was a laboratory, and deep within the very bowels of this complex, many feet underground, was a catgirl. Laid upon a uncomfortable metal table, naked, her body began to stir as she woke up from her deep sleep.



Groaning, she sat up, rubbing her head, observing her surroundings with a dazed expression. She was in a square room, computers, chemical bottles, electrical cables, gas bottles, and many other scientific equipment surrounded her.


As her wits, which were dulled by sleep, began to sharpen, fear began to settle in.

"Where the hell am I?" she asked herself, her voice hoarse from disuse.


She clutched her head, trying to remember how she got here, but everything was a blank memory. The catgirl began to panic, but she calmed herself down by taking deep, slow breathes.


"Okay, keep calm. You can get yourself out of this...ah..."


She trailed off, unable to remember her own name, which frightened and frustrated her even more. She shook her head. No! She was not going to be scared by this; she was going to be brave and get out of this nightmare.


Jumping off the metal bed, she began to walk towards the end of the room. A metal door open automatically and unexpectedly, and the catgirl found herself looking down a long, gloomy hallway.


Swallowing nervously, she began to walk down it gingerly, her right hand covering her crotch while her left arm covered her breasts. She shivered, ten spite her white, fluffy fur, for the metal walls and tiled floors where cold.


She reached the end of a hallway, and another metal door opened, and this time it revealed another lab, this one quite huge with various equipment in it.


She walked inside and looked around.
After a few minutes of finding nothing that could help her escape or recover her memory she tripped and bumped some kind of computer monitor and keyboard.


As she got her bearings she was unaware of a laser like device descend from the ceiling behind her.


She read the screen.

Suddenly she heard a noise and turned in time to see a laser zap her but not harm or seemingly do anything to her yet.



The ray felt oddly good but she was brought out of her enjoyment by hearing someone coming. Quickly she turned around and tapped F2

As they leave her some anthros give introductions and learn that she's the only one with memory loss while others brush her off as useless unaware that the mode the size ray Rena had been exposed to was ________

15512222222222222223.content: Rena is on vacation and goes for a hike. While exploring off of the trail, the catgirl comes across a small set of ruins and a hidden chamber within those ruins, where an ancient shrine awaits someone to find it again. By finding the shrine Rena has been chosen to be a conduit for a goddess on Earth, however the skinny young woman doesn’t have a body befitting the embodiment of a goddess so she soon finds herself growing ever larger. Can she find some way to free herself from the goddess and to stop or even reverse the changes being made to her body, and for that matter will she even want to?
15512222222222222223.title: Goddess on Earth

155122222222222222231.content:
Rena had no idea how long she had been down in this small chamber, a number of hours at least. She had broken off of the trail sometime in the morning, and spent some time hiking through the jungle till she came across a small ruin nearly completely lost under the thick foliage choking the stones. Exploring the structure hadn’t revealed much except some old and much worn carvings that she could barely make out. She was about to head back the way she came and return to the beachside resort when a section of the floor gave way, dropping her into a room hidden by the collapse of the ruin above. After brushing herself off, her eyes fell on a small altar that instantly trapped her attention. Everything except the small stone shrine was pushed from her mind as she moved closer and knelt before it. Time seemed to both slow to a crawl and rocket past as Rena continued to stare the altar, her eyes tracing every curve and line that remained on the damaged stone. A pair of candles rested atop the stone, somehow still burning with cool blue flames despite how long the room had to have been sealed, not that Rena was thinking about that at all.

Eventually, the catgirl managed to blink her eyes, seemingly taking far longer than it should have, and when they opened again suddenly found herself stumbling along the hiking path with no idea how she had gotten there. The blazing sun long had since set and been replaced with the pale glow of the moon, which barely provided enough light through the thick canopy above to prevent her from tripping over every root and rock along the way. Another slow blink and she was now blundering through the soft sand with the surf softly crashing just to the side of her. Her hazy mind finally made the connection that she was heading for the bungalow she was staying in, and barely allowed her to avoid colliding with the few other people out enjoying the pleasant night. A third blink brought her to the pair of steps leading up to the veranda and soon enough into the pleasant front room of the bungalow. After passing through the threshold, Rena finally regained some control over herself and her mind, and there was only one thing on her mind now…
155122222222222222231.title: And so it begins

1551222222222222222312.content:
After passing through the threshold, Rena finally regained some control over herself and her mind, and there was only one thing on her mind now: her girlfriend. They had met more than a year before, and been dating for a large portion of that time. Things had been going so well that the catgirl should have been expecting something like this, but it was still quite a surprise when her lover had revealed plans for this vacation just a couple days before, and continued the shock by saying that she had gotten both of them time to get away to this wonderful resort. Today had been the first day in this paradise, and something seemed to draw Rena to go on that hike but hadn’t been able to convince her girlfriend to join her, the hike where she found… Her thoughts couldn’t quite connect with what she found, instead turning her mind back around to her girlfriend.

As she walked through the door into the next room, Rena shrugged off her shirt, her touch briefly lingering on her flat belly. As sometimes happened, she momentarily thought about how she disliked how her body hadn’t developed much at all, but something tickled at the back of her mind making her think that this might change soon enough. Turning her attention outward again, Rena now noticed how the lighting in the bedroom was dim, lit only by a large number of candles resting on nearly every horizontal surface in the room, but still no sign of her girlfriend. After she took this in, her shoes were kicked off and her pants joined her shirt on the floor.

The sound of this seemed to be a trigger, because it wasn’t even a moment later that a very familiar melodious voice called from the attached bathroom, “That you, Rena? You’ve been gone quite a while.”

“Yes, baby, just got back,” Rena replied, heading for the closed door.

“That’s good timing, I just got ready and was about to wait for you, be right out.”

Rena thought about heading on in, but decided to do as bade and returned to the bed. A breeze flowed in through the slats over the window, causing the candles to flicker vigorously and made the canopy hanging over the bed flutter. As everything stilled, the bathroom door lightly creaked open, admitting the focus of her desires who seemed to light up the room better than the candles.
1551222222222222222312.title: That special someone

choices: The woman was a fertility goddess.
A warrior goddess was visiting Rena’s slumbering mind.
She was another type of goddess.
15512222222222222223121.content:
Standing in the doorway to the bathroom was the lovely and divine Sarah, Rena’s girlfriend and lover. Clad in an open front negligee with matching panties, the bovine paused for a moment, letting Rena drink in the wonderful sight. Huge breasts stood out proudly from Sarah’s torso, casting a shadow over the rest of her body, and her wide hips and thighs completed the exaggerated hourglass shape. Thick waves of blood red hair cascaded from her head, reaching past her shapely rump, as well as framing her sensual face with those luminous blue eyes. Plump lips curled slightly as she enjoyed Rena’s wandering gaze, while her slender hands lightly ran through some of the short, luscious fur wrapped around her body. Rena was struck by the familiar envy she felt whenever she saw Sarah, as well as the only occasionally spoken question of why such a beauty would be with the comparatively plain young catgirl.

Unable to hold herself back any longer, Sarah sashayed up to Rena, reaching a hand up to lovingly caress the shorter woman’s cheek, before reaching her hand under the catgirl’s chin to ease her up into a kiss. Then – despite Rena’s obviously growing ardor – Sarah stepped back from the catgirl, a giggle escaping from the bovine as she did so. Once she had opened up a bit of space, Sarah lifted her hands over her head before ever so slowly starting to sway her hips. The motion gradually ramped up, soon setting her huge breasts quaking in time with the simple dance. Rena tried grabbing a hold of the cow, but her target escaped her grasp time and again, keeping just one step ahead and laughing the whole time. Rena was able to eventually corner Sarah against the bed, just in time for the bovine to run her hands through her hair, letting the thick locks fall where they may as her body continued to sway this way and that.

With her quarry “trapped” Rena pounced, knocking the both of them into a tangle of limbs on the bed. Their shared laughter died as their lips locked again, Rena’s hand reaching up to grasp one of Sarah’s meaty mounds. Breaking apart breathlessly, Sarah slipped out of her lingerie quickly with some hurried help from Rena, before the two of them collided again. Rena acted with a passion that neither of them had seen before, but it proved quite enjoyable to the couple, so much so that they hadn’t finished even when the last of the candles had flickered out with only a puff of smoke to mark their passing. When Sarah finally collapsed into the pillows completely spent, Rena could almost make out the wide smile splitting the bovine’s face in the wan moonlight. The catgirl yawned and felt the shroud of sleep falling over her too, so she rearranged what she could of the covers over the two of them before nuzzling into the best pillows she ever had: Sarah’s lovely breasts.

Soon, the catgirl was lulled to sleep by the steady motion and noise of Sarah beneath her, as well as the crashing of the waves on the beach outside. Her dreams were an odd mix that night, almost all of them featuring a single figure again and again in different ways. The person felt oddly familiar to Rena, even though she was sure that she had never seen her before. However, deep within her subconscious mind, the catgirl made a connection with what she was seeing.
